description.hltext_display: 【写真】パク・ジュミ、「お久しぶりです！」
All the President's Profs
description.content:
/p> December 13, 2010
December 7, 2010
FREE Daily News Alerts
Calling them Mr. Jefferson’s Justice League is somehow irresistible. Perhaps that’s because the University of Virginia’s Faculty Budget Advisory Committee resembles a gathering of superheros, where brainiacs of varied disciplines combine their powers to confront a common enemy.
Granted, the villain – deteriorating university resources – is not as sexy as, say, Lex Luthor. And the scholarly powers of endowed chairs are hardly gamma rays. At the same time, there’s a sense Virginia has responded to a difficult economic environment in part by assembling an astute assembly of professors on a campus founded 191 years ago by Thomas Jefferson.
The 13-member crew, whose membership is weighted toward those with some business or finance acumen, is charged to serve as an informal advisory group to Teresa A. Sullivan, the university’s recently minted president. But Sullivan says the committee is also designed to bring transparency to the institution’s often-mystifying budgeting process, connecting the university’s administrators with a diverse pool of faculty.
“It seemed to me a shame these two groups of smart people hadn’t sat down with each other before,” she says.
Unlike a standard faculty budget task force, the advisory committee isn’t necessarily engaged with a particular issue, such as where the university should cut or invest. Instead, they are grappling with more fundamental high-level questions, such as whether the university operates with sufficient liquidity – or cash on hand – to pay its bills if there were another huge economic plummet.
Another point of distinction for the budget committee is its make-up. Like most university-wide committees, the group includes professors across a range of disciplines. At the same time, Sullivan clearly sought a number of faculty with business orientations, and committee members were charged to "draw on on their own expertise in financial matters to provide advice."
While Sullivan says she wasn’t looking for a brain trust to tap for input on specific policy questions, she notes that she won’t “rule out the idea that as we make budgetary decisions I will consult this group.”
Moreover, Sullivan may well be inclined to turn to this committee for ideas, rather than using outside groups that offer such services for a fee, sometimes inviting faculty criticism.
"President Sullivan said that she would certainly go to this internal group for advice before resorting to the outside as a general matter," Carol Wood, a university spokeswoman, said in an e-mail. "Sometimes," she added, "there are issues of such technical complexity that you still need the right expert."
Virginia has faced budget cuts, like most institutions, but the fact that the university is less dependent upon the state than many other public colleges has proven something of an advantage. Only about 10 percent of the university's $1.4 billion budget -- excluding the medical center -- comes from taxpayer dollars, so the university's fate is not so intimately tied to the state's own financial struggles. But the portion of the university's budget that is linked to the state has taken a beating. Virginia has already lost about $32 million in appropriations in the last three years, and officials expect that total reduction to reach $50 million by the end of next year.
The committee's charge is to advise the president, but some members see a clear subtext to their defined duties. Members are likely to share what they’ve seen of the university’s inner financial workings with their colleagues, and those discussions could potentially shield Sullivan’s administration from the kind of suspicion and mistrust that can permeate a campus when difficult budget decisions are made.
“By drawing a group of faculty into reasonably intense discussions, that’s one way to make clear there’s no smoke and mirrors here, that people are acting responsibly as stewards of the university’s finances,” says Sarah Turner, a committee member and professor of education and economics.
Yet, the committee isn’t expected to just accept the administration’s party line. To the contrary, Turner says she and others in the committee’s first meeting questioned whether Virginia’s investment strategy is too conservative.
“I think it’s about asking not obnoxious questions but provocative questions,” she says. “Question your assumptions. What are the tradeoffs?”
Striking to Turner, for instance, was a PowerPoint slide that showed Virginia’s liquidity position relative to those of its peers. Virginia has enough liquid assets to sustain operations for about 213 days, more than all but two of eight selected institutions. By contrast, the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill had about 85 days of cash on hand, according to the slide.
The liquidity of Virginia’s assets likely helped spare the university from some of the problems encountered by institutions like Harvard University, which scrambled to sell off illiquid holdings in hedge funds and private equity after the market bust. But did Virginia also miss out on other investment opportunities by keeping so much cash on hand?
“One of the questions that was fairly put on the table [in the first committee meeting] was, 'What’s the cost of having another 50 days of liquidity?,' " Turner says. "What’s the right amount of liquidity you want to have so if the floor drops out tomorrow you’re not held hostage?”
Leonard Sandridge, the university’s executive vice president and chief executive officer, stresses that the committee’s work is not intended to subvert or replace the normal budgetary governance process. The provost, deans and other faculty still have their important roles to play, he says. It is also of note that the committee includes a member of the Faculty Senate and the chair-elect of the Senate, suggesting the committee's role is to complement -- not replace -- the Senate's function in budgetary discussions.
“Whether you’re talking about a public university or a private university today, they are much more focused as an institution on setting priorities and realizing what they can and cannot do,” Sandridge says. “I would say it only works if you can have the buy-in from the faculty that have to live with the results of those decisions. This is a vehicle for that happening to the maximum extent possible.”
To achieve faculty “buy-in,” as Sandridge suggests, professors need to feel like they’re getting the straight story, says Robert Kemp, a research professor in the McIntire School of Commerce and a committee member.
“It’s time the university evolved in numerous ways, but money is at the heart of it,” says Kemp, who is chair-elect of the Faculty Senate. “This initiative is [Sullivan’s] attempt to say, ‘I’m going to be very transparent about the money, folks.’ ”
“I think she will not say this directly,” he adds, “but I do believe that trust is an objective of this.”
This is not the first time Sullivan has assembled a team like the one at Virginia. After the fall of Lehman Brothers, when economic panic was at its peak, she pulled together a similar group at the University of Michigan at Ann Arbor, where she was provost from 2006 to early 2010. Even after Sullivan’s departure, the committee has stayed in place.
“They play an extremely important informal [role], which is that we stay in touch with the needs and interest of the faculty on campus,” says Martha Pollack, Michigan’s vice provost for academic and budgetary affairs.
And while the committee’s input is informal, Pollack stresses their work isn’t just a feel-good exercise held over from Sullivan’s tenure.
“I’m not in favor of meetings for their own sake,” she says. “It’s really easy in an administrative role to become isolated if you don’t make great efforts to stay in touch on campus.”

description.hltext_display: اے جی سندھ کے دفتر کا کمپیوٹر خراب‘ ادائیگیاں رک گئیں
description.content: PST میرپورخاص(نمائندہ جسارت)اکاﺅنٹنٹ جنرل سندھ کے آفس کا کمپیوٹر سسٹم خراب ہوگیا میرپورخاص میں پچھلے 4روز سے سرکاری ادائیگیاں تعطل کا شکار، ملازمین اور دیگر شہریوں کو سخت پریشانی کا سامنا، تفصیلات کے مطابق ٹریژری آفس میرپورخاص کا پچھلے 4روز سے کمپیوٹر سسٹم خراب ہونے کے باعث کسی بھی قسم کے سرکاری بلز اور سرکاری ادائیگیاں نہیں ہورہی ہیں اور نہ ہی کسی بھی سرکاری ملازم کو تنخواہ کی سلپ دی جارہی ہے اس سلسلے میں رابطہ کرنے پر ٹریژری آفس کے ذرائع نے بتایا کہ ہمارا کمپیوٹر نظام اکاﺅنٹنٹ جنرل سندھ کے آفس کے سسٹم سے منسلک ہے اور اے جی آفس کراچی میں کمپیوٹر سسٹم خراب ہونے سے ہمارا سسٹم بھی متاثر ہے اور بند ہے اور تمام کام بند ہے۔ عوامی حلقوں نے مطالبہ کیا ہے کہ فوری طورپر کمپیوٹر سسٹم کی خرابی کو دور کرکے عوام کو پریشانی سے نجات دلائی جائے۔

description.hltext_display: Ilmuwan Ciptakan Tikus Bersuara Seperti Burung
description.content: OSAKA - Sekelompok tim peneliti dari University of Osaka berhasil menciptakan seekor hewan yang berbeda dalam proyek bertajuk Evolved Mouse Project.Dilansir melalui Telegraph, Rabu (22/12/2010), para ilmuwan itu telah berhasil menciptakan seekor yang mampu 'bernyanyi' seperti burung. Mereka menggunakan anak yang telah direkayasa secara genetik dan berpotensi mengalami mutasi."Mutasi adalah kekuatan pendorong evolusi. Kami telah melakukan persilangan rekayasa genetika selama beberapa generasi untuk melihat apa yang akan terjadi selanjutnya," ujar ketua tim peneliti, Arikuni Uchimura."Kami memeriksa yang baru lahir satu per satu. Suatu hari kami menemukan seekor yang bernyanyi seperti burung," katanya. Uchimura menegaskan jika 'bernyanyi' telah lahir setelah mengalami rekayasa genetik dan karakter tersebut akan diteruskan kepada generasi mereka di masa depan.Para ilmuwan mengaku terkejut dengan hasil ini. Pasalnya mereka mengharapkan kelahiran yang berbeda dalam bentuk fisik. Pusat penelitian yang dikepalai Takeshi Yagi, profesor daru University of Osaka mengaku telah memiliki lebih dari 100 'bernyanyi' yang akan diberdayakan untuk penelitian lebih lanjut.Tim peneliti berharap mereka bisa mendapatkan pentunjuk mengenai cara bagaimana bahasa manusia berevolusi sehingga mereka bisa memahami asal usul bahasa manusia.Para ilmuwan juga menemukan bahwa burung pun menggunakan elemen suara yang berbeda, sama seperti bahasa manusia yang berbeda-beda dengan aturan linguistik tertentu. "Untuk diteliti, subyek lebih baik daripada burung karena mereka adalah mamalia dan lebih dekat kepada manusia, terkait struktur otak dan aspek biologis lainnya," kata Uchimura."Kami melihat bagaimana yang memancarkan suara baru akan mempengaruhi biasa dalam kelompok yang sama. Dengan kata lain jika memiliki konotasi sosial," katanya, seraya menambahkan bahwa biasa mencicit karena stres. (srn)

description.hltext_display: CyberTech celebrates 25th anniversary with double-digit growth
description.author: rss@it-analysis.com (CyberTech UK
description.content:
Continued sales growth makes CyberTech the voice recording company to watch in 2011 Published by: CyberTech UK Date: 21st December, 2010
CyberTech International, the world’s fastest-growing and 3rd largest call recording provider, is celebrating its 25th anniversary by reporting double-digit growth in 2010. During this successful period, the company has won a number of high profile global contracts, added a new office in India and increased headcount to meet the growing demand for voice recording solutions.
“As client needs evolve, CyberTech will continue to expand as we work to push the boundaries of innovation and achieve further success in key market sectors such as public safety, financial and contact centres,” said Ad Ketelaars, CEO of CyberTech International.
CyberTech has also introduced several industry firsts over the last year including CyberTech Myracle Plus, among the lowest per-channel voice recording solution that offers big system features in a smaller package and is designed to meet the needs of operations with less than 200 seats. Another innovation is CyberTech Max, an unlimited scalability voice recording system.
Other highlights of 2010 include: New global partnerships with industry leading suppliers of financial turrets, voice analytics and workforce management solutions New distribution partnerships across Europe, Asia, North America and South America Expanded platform certifications with Cisco, Avaya, Motorola and others Product of the Year award from Customer Interaction Solutions magazine Ketelaars added, “We anticipate that 2011 will be another successful year for CyberTech as we continue with our aggressive growth rate and pace of innovation to consolidate our position as the voice recording company to watch.”
About CyberTech International Founded in 1985, CyberTech International is the longest established and one of the largest global providers of call recording solutions. CyberTech is also currently the fastest growing and uses the latest, innovative recording technologies to provide the most secure, open and future-proof solutions that enable organisations to improve performance, optimise service, mitigate risk and maintain compliance at a lower cost. CyberTech UK has specialised in the provision of quality management and performance improvement solutions to contact centres, financial institutions, public safety operations and government organisations for over two decades. CyberTech UK is an integral part of the CyberTech International group of companies and supports over 1,000 customers in the UK and Ireland. For more information, visit www.cybertech-int.co.uk

Во Франции падение женщины в супермаркете обошлось ему в круглую сумму
description.content:
Пожилая француженка отсудила у супермаркета "Carrefour" компенсацию за травму, полученную ею в магазине.
Об этом сообщает "The Connexion".
По решению суда, сумма, которую руководство торговой точки должно будет выплатить 76-летней пенсионерке, составит 20 тысяч евро.
Инцидент, в результате которого женщина получила травму, произошел в супермаркете, расположенном в департаменте Эро на юге Франции, 31 декабря 2006 года. Тогда пожилая француженка поскользнулась на листке салата, упавшем на пол в фруктово-овощном отделе магазина. Женщина получила двойной перелом бедра и была госпитализирована.
Как пояснила адвокат пенсионерки Эммануэль Людо, после падения в супермаркете ее клиентка отказалась от какой-либо компенсации, однако теперь решила добиться от магазина возмещения ущерба. По словам адвоката, пенсионерка, поскользнувшаяся на салате, долгое время лечилась после падения и утратила более 10 процентов своей трудоспособности.
Для французского судопроизводства победа поскользнувшейся на салате пенсионерки стала первым подобным случаем. Предыдущее дело с похожими обстоятельствами - пострадавшей оказалась женщина, поскользнувшаяся на картошке в ресторане быстрого питания - было проиграно истцом.

description.hltext_display: Romeo Ferraris 500 Estremo, citycar da 260 cavalli
description.author: MAURILIO RIGO
description.content: Sempre pi scatenati i ragazzi della Romeo Ferraris. La factory milanese ci ha abituati a vetture elaborate, originali e dalle caratteristiche spinte, dedicate a chi vuole distinguersi non soltanto nell'estetica ma anche nelle prestazioni. Nell'ultima creazione, la 500 Estremo, elaborazione su base 500 Abarth, hanno decisamente "esagerato". D'altronde gi il nome dato alla vettura lascia ben poco all'immaginazione quando poi scopriamo che i cavalli sono stati quasi raddoppiati (dagli originali 135 ai 260 Cv), allora ci rendiamo conto che siamo davanti a un piccolo "mostro". Gi in passato i progettisti dell'officina di Opera avevano reso disponibile una simile potenza su un "cinquino" con la 500 Monza, limited edition dedicata al circuito milanese in tiratura di soli 10 esemplari. Oggi per con la Estremo siamo davanti alla prima 500 Abarth dotata del nuovo kit di potenziamento motore Romeo Ferraris che pu essere acquistato anche separatamente e installato su qualsiasi modello di 500 della casa dello scorpione, cabrio compresa. La Estremo comunque una vettura esclusiva e come tale si distingue dalla livrea in tinta "Blu Pozzi", colorazione riservata a dream care come Ferrari 612 Scaglietti e 599 GTB, per il resto, tranne qualche piccola scritta e il logo del sagittario Romeo Ferraris, la citycar non ostenta le sue doti nascoste sotto al cofano. All'interno trionfa la pelle primo fiore e l'alcantara color tabacco, tonalit calda e morbida riservata a tutti i rivestimenti, volante speciale della factory compreso. Per gli interventi effettuati sul motore lasciamo una breve descrizione ai tecnici della squadra corse della Romeo Ferraris: "L'esperienza maturata nello sviluppo del propulsore della 500 Monza ha rappresentato il punto di partenza per la 500 Estremo. Abbiamo fatto tesoro dei numerosi test condotti sulla vettura e degli accorgimenti tecnici utilizzati in precedenza, al fine di ottimizzare ulteriormente la fluidit di erogazione del propulsore a tutti i regimi. I 260 cavalli sono stati ottenuti modificando opportunamente i parametri della centralina elettronica e sostituendo la maggior parte dei componenti di serie del vano motore con prodotti ad alte prestazioni (turbina, iniettori, pistoni, alberi a camme, volano e intercooler frontale). All'incremento prestazionale concorrono gli alberi a camme pi spinti, la nuova turbina maggiorata, gli iniettori maggiorati, e l'intercooler frontale maggiorato, che raffredda l'aria in uscita dal compressore prima che venga immessa nel motore, riducendo il calo prestazionale dovuto al surriscaldamento dell'aria compressa. L'impianto di scarico stato inoltre completamente rivoluzionato con nuovi componenti realizzati interamente da noi, come il downpipe con catalizzatore metallico da 200 celle. Nuovo anche il terminale a due uscite che ha reso molto pi aggressivo il sound mentre per garantire la massima affidabilit il gruppo frizione stato sostituito con un kit speciale in materiale molto pi resistente e con volano modificato che non influenza negativamente l'uso della vettura nel traffico cittadino". Ovviamente per rispondere con sicurezza al vertiginoso aumento delle performance stato modificato anche l'assetto e l'impianto frenante stato adeguato sostituendo l'equipaggiamento di serie con un kit maggiorato Brembo, composto da dischi forati da 280 mm di diametro e pinze a 4 pompanti, rifinito con pastiglie a mescola racing per frenate sicure in ogni condizione. Infine tra gli optional disponibile il cambio sequenziale a sei marce con differenziale autobloccante, componente che, se richiesta, contribuisce a far salire il conto finale piuttosto salato (soltanto per la parte meccanica occorrono pi di 15.000 euro ai quali bisogna aggiungere il montaggio, il costo della vettura e la personalizzazione di interni ed esterni).

description.hltext_display: 雷诺纬度亮相广州车展 外观细节详解
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：TOM 汽车
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 09:23
2010年底最重要的汽车界盛事——第八届中国（广州）国际汽车展览会已经于12月20日隆重开幕。雷诺中国在本届车展中展出8款车型，其中包括梅甘娜CC、梅甘娜RS、Clio RS等车型，值得关注的是雷诺全球第一款中高级三厢轿车——纬度也将首次在亚洲地区亮相。下面就让我们一起来了解一下。
动力配备方面，纬度在海外共搭载2.5L和2.0L引擎，其中2.5L车型采用的是日产VQ25发动机，拥有176马力的功率和233牛•米的扭矩。变速器方面，纬度搭配并没有搭载与天籁一样的CVT变速器，而是采用6速手自一体变速器。
雷诺纬度的内饰采用了黑色、米色等三种风格供消费者选择搭，整体感觉清新大方，让人耳目一新。中控台面板属于简洁的类型，中控台的各按键、旋钮设计合理，使用简单方便。雷诺纬度的乘坐人数是5人，后排的中央扶手设计有杯架，方便后排的乘客使用。另外，这款车还采用了分区独立空调系统，8个出风口可照顾到车内的每一个乘客。
纬度采用了6碟CD播放器， 在中央扶手箱内带有AUX外接音源接口，虽然不是什么高科技配置了，不过对于喜爱听音乐的朋友来说，确实有了这个扩展口可以方便很多。另外这款车的驾驶员座椅功能异常丰富，初次上车的驾驶者可能要熟悉一段时间。 在内饰细节方面，纬度还是显示出了雷诺中高级轿车的特质；各个按键的质地精良，做工精细。手套箱的内部设计有植绒，小件物品不会随着车的晃动而移动。

description.hltext_display: Bundling Nokia dan XL, Bonus Glee
description.content: PROGRAM bundling terbaru PT XL Axiata Tbk (XL) cukup menarik.Sejak pertengahan bulan ini, XL meluncurkan bundling dengan Nokia X3-02 seharga Rp1,8 juta.Head of Marketing Nokia Indonesia Andrea Facchini mengungkap,Nokia X3-02 adalah ponsel terbaru Nokia yang hadir dengan konsep 'touch & type'. Teknologi layar sentuh memudahkan para penggunanya untuk menjelajahi internet, mengunduh berbagai konten dan aplikasi, juga bermain games. Sedangkan 'type' diwakili oleh keyboard yang memudahkan konsumen untuk SMS, email, chatting (Ovi Chat, Yahoo Messanger, Gtalk), dan tetap eksis di jejaring sosial.Selain mencakup berbagai manfaat layanan XL yang menyertai, Head of MDS Device Management XL Agung Wijanarko mengatakan bahwa ponsel tersebut menyediakan tombol khusus yang dengan sekali tekan akan membawa pemakainya memasuki portal XLgo. Pada paket dengan ponsel Nokia X3-02 'touch & type' berwarna biru, terdapat konten gratis serial musikal tersebut.Konten gratis tersebut berupa wallpaper Glee, RBT Glee, dan berbagai games.Selain itu,XL mengadakan kuis berhadiah tiket perjalanan ke Amerika untuk menonton konser secara langsung. Manfaat lain yang bisa didapatkan dari paket bundling XL dan Nokia X3-02 ini adalah kemudahan mengakses layanan data dari XL melalui one stop portal XLgo! hanya sekali tekan pada angka 0 lebih lama. Pengguna juga dapat mengakses berbagai layanan Ovi dari Nokia,yaitu Ovi Store,Ovi mail, Social dan Nokia Messaging untuk chatting dan push email.Nokia X3-02 juga dilengkapi dengan layanan Social yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk mengakses Facebook dan Twitter langsung dari layar utama. Ponsel dengan desain paling tipis di antara produk Nokia yang ada ini dilengkapi dengan kamera 5 megapixel dengan 4x digital zoom, Wi-Fi, dan radio FM. Paket bundlingXL dengan Nokia X3-02 (dan Reguler) bisa didapatkan di Nokia Store dan gerai resmi Nokia, seperti Okeshop, Erafone, Sentra Ponsel, serta XL Center. (Koran SI/ Danang Arradian) (srn)

description.hltext_display: 1 Dies in Puerto Rico Copter Crash; 5 Others Feared Dead
description.author: DANICA COTO
description.content:
| A Puerto Rico National Guard helicopter crashed in the ocean while en route to a drug raid. The body of one of the six people on board has been found and the remaining five are feared dead, officials said Tuesday.
The body was found nearly a mile off the coast in front of the Grand Melia resort late Tuesday morning, said Nino Correa, search-and-rescue director of the Emergency Management Agency. The victim has not yet been identified.
Crews are searching for the remaining passengers, and Police Chief Jose Figueroa Sancha told NotiUno radio station that officials found the fuselage of the UH-72 Lakota helicopter just north of the island.
It is unclear what caused the crash. The helicopter was headed for the neighboring island of Vieques when it disappeared late Monday just north of the coastal city of Rio Grande. One pilot had 10 years of experience and the other had at least six years, and neither reported any problems during the flight, said National Guard Gen. Antonio Vicens.
"The communication disappeared," he said.
The U.S. Coast Guard will continue searching throughout the night, officials said, even though the National Weather Service issued a high-surf advisory and warned of waves of up to 15 feet starting early today through at least Friday.
Two of the passengers are prosecutors with the local justice department and the other four are officials with the National Guard, three of them crew members, said U.S. Coast Guard spokesman Ricardo Castrodad.
They were identified as Col. Victor Torres Rodriguez, who was second in command of the Puerto Rico National Guard, pilots Hector Ramirez and Carlos Acevedo, and Sgt. Jose Omar Sostre.
Torres was always willing to help with any request, said Carlos Javier Torres, senator for Guayama.

description.hltext_display: GUEST COMMENTARY: Probation needs independent oversight (3)
description.content:
Arlington, Mass. —
No one knows when or where the probation scandal will end, as multiple panels and criminal investigators turn stones over. Although all deplore the idea of a few powerful legislators controlling probation jobs, I've received conflicting input from constituents as to solutions. I continue to give the issue a lot of thought, but I want to report back.
In my evolving view, the big picture is this: As long as certain agencies have extraordinary motivation to please legislators, there will be problems with patronage. The commissioner of probation is nominally a judicial branch employee, but nine years ago, the Legislature set the rules up so that the commissioner effectively reported to no one except powerful legislators. That's what led to the wholesale corruption of the hiring process.
For another example, some human service agencies that contract with the state are dependent on legislative earmarks. I had a constituent who felt that state disclosure of his criminal record was making him unemployable in human services. To get a feel for whether it was really the record that was the problem or perhaps other issues, I called a private human services provider. I made very clear that I was inquiring generally about industry attitudes towards criminal records to help me advise an unnamed constituent. I was stunned when the provider insisted that I send my constituent over in person so she could interview him for a job. She did not, in the end, hire him and perhaps never had any intention of hiring him, but the response indicated to me, at a minimum, that the provider had experience fending off patronage calls from legislators.
Some might argue that legislators can never advise or help individuals without causing favoritism or distorting the legitimate priorities of agencies — and I would agree that this case shows how careful we have to be. But the stronger point is that only certain agencies bend so easily to legislative influence — those that are fending for themselves in seeking legislative funding.
Patronage isn't everywhere in the state. Most agencies are under the supervision of the governor. They tightly control managerial contacts with legislators. In many executive branch agencies, a legislative recommendation can be a negative — most managers want to hire people who are qualified and motivated, as opposed to connected. Connected people are often arrogant and hard to manage.
To fix probation, the top priority should be to place it under the supervision of a powerful independent manager — either the governor or the top judges. In many respects, it makes most organizational sense to keep probation in the judiciary, but the judiciary is not a political force that can defend itself effectively. Some suggest that the judicial branch may even now be vulnerable to continuing legislative patronage requests in various support functions.
Some have urged greater disclosure of legislative referrals and I would certainly support this, although I think phone calls are hard to police. Others have urged an outright ban on any legislative referrals. It's hard for me to imagine writing a ban that would make conceptual sense. Many referrals based on personal knowledge of a candidate are perfectly legitimate; they do not cause favoritism if respectfully presented. It's also hard for me to imagine successfully enforcing a ban.
I'm most concerned to clean up arrangements that make weak agencies directly beholden to the Legislature for appropriations. We've abolished the Mass. Turnpike Authority. We'll definitely fix probation. I hope we'll look hard at the rest of the judicial branch. But we probably shouldn't stop there — some other rumored patronage havens do come to mind.
State Rep. Will Brownsberger, D-Belmont, represents Arlington, Belmont, and Cambridge on Beacon Hill.

description.hltext_display: Канадец собрал рекордную коллекцию Санта-Клаусов
description.content:
Канадец Жан-Ги Лакерр собрал крупнейшую в мире коллекцию Санта-Клаусов.
Как сообщает телеканал "Fox", всего 74-летнему коллекционеру удалось собрать 25 тысяч 189 различных изображений Санта-Клауса в виде декоративных фигурок, игрушек, посуды, постеров и других предметов.
По словам Лакерра, он начал собирать свою коллекцию в 1988 году, когда тетя его супруги подарила ему старинную фигурку Санта-Клауса из папье-маше. Канадский рекордсмен рассказал, что с тех пор он то сам покупает себе фигурки Санты, то получает их в подарок от друзей.
Достижение Лакерра было официально зарегистрировано и внесено в Книгу рекордов Гиннеса. Комментируя решение комитета Книги включить его коллекцию в очередное издание, канадец заявил, что чрезвычайно горд быть рекордсменом. "Это все равно что выиграть олимпийскую медаль", - подчеркнул пенсионер.
15 декабря Жан-Ги Лакерр решил предоставить всем желающим возможность взглянуть на его собрание Санта-Клаусов. Он открыл в подвале своего дома импровизированную экспозицию, в рамках которой выставил все 25 тысяч 189 Клаусов. Выставка будет открыта для посещения до 15 января 2011 года.

description.hltext_display: Britain May Call Troops In for Winter Chaos Britain May Call Troops In for Winter Chaos
description.content:
| The snow was melting off London's streets, but Heathrow Airport told infuriated passengers it won't restore full service until Thursday -- five days after a five-inch snowfall turned hundreds of thousands of holiday plans into a nightmare of canceled flights and painful nights sleeping on terminal floors.
Travelers' anger boiled over into politics as Britain's prime minister offered to put troops on snow-clearing duty and Europe's top transport official threatened tougher regulation of airports unable to cope with wintry weather.
"It's pathetic -- you would think this is a Third-World country," said 29-year-old Janice Phillips, who was trying to get back to Minneapolis.
"All they've been talking about was this snow forecast. You would think the government could do a better job."
"It's not even snowing!" said 19-year-old Candie Sparks, who was trying to get back to Santa Fe, N.M.
"It's crazy."
Days after a driving snowfall that ended Saturday after dumping five inches in an hour, the terminals at Heathrow were clogged Tuesday with passengers desperately looking at computer screens to see if they would be able to get to their destinations. So many people were sprawled on the floor that it was difficult to walk.
Some wore Santa hats decorated with vulgar signs making fun of their most un-merry Christmas.
Transportation experts said that after many years without heavy snowfall, underinvestment has left Heathrow and dozens of other airports across Britain and Ireland without enough equipment or personnel to cope with big storms.
"They have concluded they don't need snow clearance equipment, so we don't have the capability when bad weather comes in," aviation consultant Chris Yates said.
This was evident in the days after Saturday's snowstorm, when airports in Frankfurt, Prague, Amsterdam and other major cities in mainland Europe bounced back more quickly than Heathrow.
European Union transportation commissioner Siim Kallas threatened tougher regulation if performance does not improve.

event_or_fact.property: They have concluded they don't need snow clearance equipment, so we don't have the capability when bad weather comes in

description.hltext_display: 时尚经典家轿 马自达睿翼最高优惠2.8万
description.content:
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 10:06
近日，笔者从北京地区一汽马自达4S店了解到，店内睿翼部分车型现车销售，颜色方面以红色、灰色为主，现购车最高优惠达2.8万元，另外还有保险、导航、地胶脚垫、封釉等礼品相送。睿翼外形时尚，内部配置丰富，优化过的发动机系统最大程度地满足了大众消费者对运动的追求。感兴趣的朋友可以到店赏车试驾。
在保养方面，一汽马自达睿翼整车质保三年或6万公里，先到为准，新车行驶3000或5000公里（3个月）需要做免费首保。之后每5000公里或半年做一次小保养，里程未达到5000公里的，可以一年做两次小保养。更换机油和机滤的费用在400元左右。大保养周期为2万公里，费用在600元上下。另外，节气门需要1万公里时清洗，拆下来清洗的费用为100元，免拆清洗费用需要500多元。
● 编辑点评：
一汽马自达睿翼依然是一款动感十足的车子，外观设计流畅，而前脸给人的感觉特别犀利，内部空间上比想象中更大气，做工精致，设计人性化。而刚刚上市不久的睿翼轿跑最大的特点就是掀背式的尾部造型和运动尾翼。主打运动轿跑理念的睿翼轿跑车采用了掀背的车身结构，尾门开启的角度和范围都远大于三厢轿车车型。同时，运动感十足的尾翼是轿跑车型独有的配置，也是该车型的卖点之一。感兴趣的朋友可以到店了解详情。

description.hltext_display: Robot waiters in China never lose patience
Florida Grew 17 Percent in Past Decade, Gains 2 Electoral Votes
description.author: MICHAEL PELTIER
description.content:
| Even with the boom slowing, Florida still grew 17 percent in the past decade and will gain additional congressional clout, getting two more seats in Congress, Census officials announced Tuesday.
Now slated to hold 27 seats in the 435 member House, Florida continues a trend that began in 1930 by gaining at least one congressional seat during each of the past nine decennial redistributions of political power in a nation that continued to grow to the west and south.
Florida, with 18,801,310 residents as of April 1, remained the fourth-most-populous state. It will have the same number of seats in Congress as No. 3 New York, behind No. 2 Texas, which gained four seats -- the most of any state -- and California which saw no gain in congressional power, but remains the nation's largest state.
The biggest growth during the decade was in Nevada, which grew 35.1 percent, Census Director Robert Groves said in a conference call. Michigan was at the other end of the spectrum, with declines in automaking and other industries making it the only state to decline in population in the decade, losing 0.6 percent of its population.
Nationally, the population revelation looked like continuing good news for Republicans, who made major gains in the November election, and now will gain congressional seats in several Southern and Western states that are generally considered more red than blue. The states losing population are mostly northeastern and Rust Belt states that have traditionally voted more Democratic.
The exact location of Florida's two new congressional seats -- and what they will look like and who they will include -- now will be up to state legislators, who are scheduled to redraw the districts during the 2012 legislative session. How, exactly, the process will work this time around isn't totally clear because of a new constitutional requirement that lawmakers not create districts that favor incumbents or a particular political party.
"Now the work begins in the Florida Legislature as we draw new congressional districts as well as seats in the Florida House and Senate," said Senate President Mike Haridopolos, R-Merritt Island. "This will be a deliberative process and all Floridians will have a voice."
The change also has implications for future presidential elections, because it increases the clout of growing states - Southern and Western states - in the Electoral College, while reducing the strength of traditionally Democratic states like New Jersey, Michigan and New York.
Florida will now have 29 Electoral College votes.
"Already a 'must-win state' for presidential candidates, Florida becomes even more important with the addition of two more electoral votes as a result of gaining two more U.S House seats," Sen. Don Gaetz, R-Niceville, and the chairman of the Senate Reapportionment Committee, said in a statement.
The U.S. population on April 1 was reported as 308.7 million, reflecting a 9.7 percent increase since 2000. That's the slowest growth since the 1930s, according to the Census Bureau.
New York and Ohio each lose two congressional. States losing single seats are Iowa, Illinois, Missouri, Pennsylvania, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan and New Jersey.
The Census Bureau is constitutionally required to reapportion congressional seats every 10 years to give all 435 congressional districts roughly the same population. Under the new apportionment, the average population of a congressional district will be 710,767, compared with 646,942 in 2000.

event_or_fact.property: The biggest growth during the decade was in Nevada, which grew 35.1 percent

Now the work begins in the Florida Legislature as we draw new congressional districts as well as seats in the Florida House and Senate; This will be a deliberative process and all Floridians will have a voice.

description.hltext_display: Netanyahu to issue pre-Christmas call for Pollard release
description.content:
http://www.jpost.com/DiplomacyAndPolitics/Article.aspx?id=200446
PM's announces that he will formally call on Obama to release Israeli agent;
"Jonathan should have the right to live with his family and rehabilitate his
health after so many years in jail,” Netanyahu says.
Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu will issue a public, formal, and official
call in upcoming days for US President Barack Obama to release Israeli agent
Jonathan Pollard, the Prime Minister's Office announced in a press release
issued Tuesday.
Netanyahu will issue the call at the behest of Pollard, whose wife Esther
delivered him a request from her husband at the Knesset on Monday.
RELATED:
Ex-US defense official tells Knesset to appeal for Pollard
Rivlin sends Knesset letter asking US to free Pollard
"I intend to continue to act with determination to free Pollard, both
because of the ethical obligation Israel has toward him and because
Jonathan should have the right to live with his family and rehabilitate his
health after so many years in jail,” Netanyahu said in the press release.
Sources close to Netanyahu said he had consulted with American officials and
his advisers about whether issuing the formal call could be helpful or
whether it would do more harm than good.
Netanyahu's request is expected to take place ahead of Saturday's Christmas
holiday in an effort to take advantage of the holiday season's spirit of
goodwill in the United States.
"He will issue the request at the time that is best to bring Pollard home,”
a Netanyahu associate said.
Esther Pollard, who is a cancer survivor, heard about Netanyahu's press
release immediately after undergoing a biopsy. She will get the results next
week. She said that she and her husband were heartened by Netanyahu's
announcement.
“We want to strengthen the prime minister's hand and bless him with
success,” she said. “We ask all those who value the US-Israel special
relationship to come forward and support the prime minister's appeal for
justice and compassion at this special time of year. We pray that the
president of the US will see fit to extend his hand to Israel in compassion,
friendship, and in justice and send Jonathan home now.”
White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs responded to Netanyahu's
announcement by saying "I am not aware that that is something that the
president is looking at doing."
Former American assistant secretary of state Lawrence Korb, who started the
momentum in favor of Pollard's release welcomed Netanyahu's announcement and
said that he expects to see the prime minister take part in the effort to
get Pollard released as soon as possible.
MK Uri Ariel, who heads the Knesset's lobby for Pollard, expressed optimism
that Obama would grant clemency on New Year's Day.

event_or_fact.property: she and her husband were heartened by Netanyahu's announcement.

description.hltext_display: Challenges Ahead for Iraq's New Government
description.content:
| Iraq seated a freely elected government Tuesday after nine months of haggling, bringing together the main ethnic and religious groups in a fragile balance that could make it difficult to rebuild a nation devastated by war as American troops prepare for their final withdrawal.
One of the government's first priorities will be to decide whether to ask the Obama administration to keep thousands of U.S. soldiers in Iraq after their scheduled departure in December 2011.
Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki's new government solidifies the grip that Shiites have held on political power since Saddam Hussein's ouster. It leaves open the question of whether the country's disgruntled Sunni minority will play a meaningful role.
Despite tortuous negotiations that threatened to unravel the country's tenuous democratic gains, the public face of the new government will look remarkably like the outgoing one. The prime minister, president and foreign minister will remain the same.
The outcome was a huge victory for al-Maliki, who has made more than his share of enemies as prime minister since May 2006. Parliament originally tapped al-Maliki as a compromise candidate to lead Iraq after tumultuous elections in December 2005 during the height of the war.
The new government was sworn in Tuesday immediately after the Iraqi parliament voted to approve 34 Cabinet ministers including al-Maliki.

entity.property: prime minister , president and foreign minister

description.hltext_display: ［丸山大輔 目指せ！シングル］（１）スライス撲滅の第一歩はグリップから
Kral Abdullah, New York ta Tedavi Gördüğü Hastaneden ...
description.content:
Suudi Arabistan Kralı Abdullah'ın, New York'ta tedavi gördüğü hastaneden ayrıldığı bildirildi. Suudi Arabistan haber ajansı, Kral'ın dün gece New York Presbyterian Hastanesi Weill Cornell Sağlık Merkezi'nden ayrıldığını duyurdu. Açıklamada Kral'ın New York'taki evine gideceği belirtildi; ancak burada ne kadar kalacağı açıklanmadı.
Kral Abdullah, 24 Kasım ve 3 Aralık tarihlerinde iki kez ameliyat olmuştu. Kral, belkemiğindeki spinal diskte oluşan fıtığın ve sırt ağrısına yol açan kan pıhtılaşmasının tedavi edilmesi için Amerika'ya gitmişti.
86 yaşındaki Kral, yerine vekaleten kardeşi Veliaht Prens Sultan'ı bırakmıştı. Kral Abdullah'ın bir de Prens Nayef adlı kardeşi bulunuyor. Bu üç isim de 1932'de Suudi Arabistan'ı kuran Kral Abdülaziz Bin Saud'un oğlu.
Kral Abdullah, yönetimi 2005 yılında üvey kardeşi Kral Fahd'dan devralmıştı.
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 7 dakika önce.. [2430116]

description.hltext_display: Polk Bucks National Trend; Teen Births Up in 2009
description.author: Robin Williams Adams
description.content:
| Births increased last year for Polk County teens ages 15 to 19, counter to a nationwide decline that brought the birth rate for older teens to a historic low.
Discouraging as that may seem locally, teen pregnancy prevention advocates have reason to celebrate:
Polk girls between the ages of 10 and 17 had a significantly lower rate of births in 2009, more in keeping with national numbers that found lower rates among older teens, women in their 20s and 30s and in the nation's fertility overall.
"Births were down overall, so we're not really sure what this means," said Mary Jo Plews, executive director of the Healthy Start Coalition of Hardee, Highlands and Polk counties.
She and others with Healthy Start hope some of it reflects increased attendance at the coalition's annual teen summits and other events oriented to teens and the almost-teens known as tweens.
Polk County's birth rate in the 15-19 age group increased to 59.3 births per 1,000 in 2009, up from a 2008 rate of 58 per 1,000, Plews said.
This translates into 1,082 babies born in 2009, 12 more than in 2008.
Florida's rate for those older teens decreased to 37.4 births per 1,000 in 2009, down from 40.7 per 1,000 in 2008.
The rate nationwide was 39.1 per 1,000, according to National Center for Health Statistics data.
With girls younger than 18, Polk's rate decreased to 9.9 births per 1,000 in 2009, compared with 11.1 in 2008. Ten years earlier, in 1999, Polk had an 18.2 percent rate for those girls.
"Our focus is on underage women (those 10-17)," Plews said.
"They're not able to care for themselves. They have not gone out on their own."
Florida's birth rate for girls ages 10-17 dropped to 7.2 per 1,000 in 2009. It was 8.2 in 2008.
The economy could have had some impact on births among older teen girls, but it seems unlikely it had much impact on younger ones, Plews said.
Hardee County was highest in the state for births to underage girls in 2009. Its rate increased to 25.6 per 1,000 in 2009 from 19.9 per 1,000 in 2008. Highlands County saw a major drop, 7.2 births per 1,000 in 2009 compared with 14.9 in 2008, Plews said. [ can be reached at robin.adams@theledger.com or 863-802-7558. Read her blog at robinsrx.blogs.theledger.com. Follow on Twitter @ledgerROBIN. ]

description.hltext_display: 时尚运动家轿 现代i30最高优惠1.5万元
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：汽车点评网
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 10:11
近日，笔者走访了上海地区北京现代4S店了解到，店内现代i30部分车型现车销售，颜色方面以红色为主，现购车最高现金优惠达1.5万元。作为一款运动型轿车，i30的轴距达到了2.65米，为内部提供了绝对充足的空间。即使前排乘坐较高大的驾驶员，他身后的乘客也不会感到拘束。感兴趣的朋友可以到店赏车试驾。
在保养方面，北京现代i30享受发动机及变速箱5年或10万公里质保，整车两年或6万公里，首次保养免费，日常保养周期为5000公里，小保养的价格在150元左右，大保养根据车况而定，更换三滤的费用在250元左右。
● 编辑点评：
北京现代i30是专为年轻人推出的车型。该车外形时尚、大方、动感，前脸与尾部的线条都较为流畅，车身的整体比例高挑舒展。内部空间充裕，配置丰富，人性化设计不错，而且动力性在同级别中也属于较为领先的。是一款非常适合家用及年轻人实用的高性价比车型。感兴趣的朋友可以到店了解详情。

description.hltext_display: L'isola pedonale compie 30 anni
description.author: repubblicawww@repubblica.it (Redazione Repubblica.it
description.content: Trent'anni e non sentirli. Si tratta di uno dei compleanni pi strani della storia eppure cos: era il 30 dicembre 1980 quando a Roma venne istituita la prima isola pedonale d'Italia, nell'area del Colosseo. A distanza di trent'anni su 100 centri urbani monitorati da ACI e Legambiente sono 92 i capoluoghi di provincia che dispongono di isole pedonali e sono in media 34 ogni 100 abitanti i metri quadrati riservati esclusivamente ai pedoni. I comuni di Venezia, Verbania, Cremona e Terni addirittura superano la soglia di 100 metri quadrati ogni 100 abitanti. In occasione del trentennale dell'istituzione della prima isola pedonale, Automobile Club d'Italia e Legambiente presentano dunque "La citt ai nostri piedi", storia e numeri delle aree chiuse al traffico, condividendo l'esigenza di affrontare in modo incisivo i problemi legati alla mobilit e al trasporto urbano, aumentando al contempo la sicurezza e la qualit ambientale delle citt. In questo senso l'isola pedonale rientra tra le strategie che gli amministratori possono adottare per migliorare la mobilit urbana. Se ben progettata e ben inserita, infatti, l'isola pedonale ha dimostrato di produrre effetti positivi nell'immediato e sul lungo periodo: da subito una riduzione dei livelli di smog e rumore accompagnato da una crescita del numero di utenti del trasporto pubblico e poi una miglior tutela di monumenti e patrimonio storico-artistico, una valorizzazione turistica, un generale aumento della vivibilit cittadina. A questo si aggiunge il miglioramento della sicurezza stradale, dal momento che nei centri urbani che si verifica il maggior numero di incidenti (pi di tre quarti del totale), con 1.892 morti e 223.166 feriti nel 2009, pari rispettivamente al 44,7% ed al 72,6% del totale.

description.hltext_display: NKÜ Rektörü Şenköylü: İmkanları Arttırıyoruz
description.content: Namık Kemal Üniversitesi (NKÜ) Rektörü Prof. Dr. Nizamettin Şenköylü, 'Öğrencilerin, sosyal birer birey olarak gelişimlerine katkı sağlayacak imkanları sağlamaya çalışıyoruz' dedi. Şenköylü AA muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada, NKÜ'de öğrenci odaklı eğitimi gerçekleştirmek için çalıştıklarını ifade ederek kampüsün, öğrencilerin günlük yaşantılarının önemli bir kısmını oluşturduğunu söyledi. Şenköylü, 'Spor salonu, fitnes salonunda öğrenciler spor etkinliklerine katılıyor. Bununla birlikte, basketbol, voleybol, badminton, tırmanma gibi aktivitelerimiz de var. Kapalı yüzme havuzunun yapımı hızla devam ediyor. Her alanda öğrencilerin spor etkinliklerine katılması sağlanacak. Şimdi de kampus alanının içinde futbol ve tenis sahası yapmayı planlıyoruz' diye konuştu. Öğrencilerin kulüp kurarak sosyal faaliyetlerde bulunmasını da desteklediklerini bildiren Şenköylü, öğrencilerin sinama, tiyatro, şiir, folklor, yelken gibi sosyal faaliyetlerde bulunduklarını kaydetti. Şenköylü şöyle konuştu: 'Öğrencilerin, sosyal birer birey olarak gelişimlerine katkı sağlayacak imkanları sağlamaya çalışıyoruz. Üniversite deyince akla ilk gelen kütüphanedir. Kütüphanemiz, 52 binden fazla elektronik dergi ve kitapa sahip. Kitap sayımız 30 bine ulaştı. Ayrıca kütüphanemiz, Türkiye çapında, veri tabanına giriş bakımından dereceye girdi.' Şenköylü, yeni kurdukları kütüphanenin kısa zamanda büyük aşama kaydettiğini belirterek, kütüphanedeki kitap sayısının ise 30 bine yaklaştığını söyledi. (ERA-MEK-MTE) - TEKİRDAĞ (Anadolu Ajansı) 16 dakika önce.. [2430101]

description.hltext_display: BullGuard launches BullGuard Mobile Security 10 - more features for more platforms
description.author: rss@it-analysis.com (BullGuard
description.content:
Published by: BullGuard Date: 21st December, 2010
London, 21st December, 2010: Today, BullGuard announces the release of BullGuard Mobile Security 10 – a security solution for smartphones which offers superior protection, more features and covers more platforms than any other product available today. BullGuard has been working with mobile security technologies since 2005, when the company was among the very first to launch a mobile security product.
Features: Antivirus, Antispyware, Antitheft, Parental Control, Firewall, Spamfilter, Basic Backup, Support.
Operating Systems: BullGuard runs on Android, Symbian, Windows and Blackberry phones, covering more than 80% of the smartphone market.
Price: £19.95
Special launch promotion: To celebrate the launch, BullGuard is giving away 5,000 special edition of “BullGuard Mobile Antivirus” – the Antivirus module incorporated in BullGuard Mobile Security. Why? To give mobile enthusiasts a taste of what the full security suite is capable of. www.bullguard.com/mobilespecial
BullGuard Mobile Security protects smartphones by stopping viruses, spyware and hackers from accessing the phone, and keeps personal details safe even if the phone is lost or stolen.
Wireless communication is without doubt one of the biggest advances to modern technology in recent times. Being able to access data including personal media, files, services and websites on the move without being physically connected to a source has brought a massive amount of convenience to our lives, as well as putting a wide range of technologies in the palm of our hands.
“It’s important to be aware of the potential dangers that may be involved, though,” stated Morten Rinder Stengaard, Product Manager at BullGuard. “We’ve come a long way from the antiquated “brick” that simply offered the ability to make calls on the move, and modern mobiles now offer access to the internet, allow you to perform financial transactions, place product orders, access emails, download games and applications and stream media all from the comfort of a handheld, as well as communicate with other users within range using wireless protocols such as Bluetooth.”
He continued: “All the risks that are a part of your life when you go online from your computer are just as real when you use your phone to check for Facebook updates and news, to receive e-mails and access your bank account. Viruses and other types of malware don’t care what device you use. They just need your phone to be switched on - that way they can call paid services, send text messages, steal and exploit personal information such as credit card details, passwords and phone numbers. In short, a smartphone without proper protection puts you at risk.”
Over the past year there has been an alarming increase in mobile-based viruses and malware. The rise in threats has led to an increasing demand for security software that is tailor-made for mobile devices. Mobile security is essentially a stripped down version of a security suite that might typically be found on a PC, but BullGuard Mobile Security also includes mobile-specific protection such as an antitheft module to allow users to remotely delete data, lock a device or locate it using GPS. Tailor-made backup tools can help to ensure that your contacts and other data is safely secured in another location for easy retrieval and spam filters screen text messages and calls.
BullGuard Mobile Security has more features and covers more platforms than any other product available.
The fact that BullGuard can be used on all major OSs means that users can easily transfer their security subscription to a new phone, regardless of which platform it runs on. As always with BullGuard products, the mobile solution is simple to use, logical and functional.

description.hltext_display: Former Arlington state senator's trial delayed (again) (3)
description.content:
A trial date of Dec. 6 has been set for former state Senator James Marzilli, left. Here he is talking with his wife, Susan Shaer.
Arlington, Mass. —
The trial for former state Senator James Marzilli, D-Arlington, will be rescheduled again come Jan. 20, the Lowell Superior Court and Marzilli’s attorney Terrence Kennedy confirmed.
The trial has been rescheduled several times, most recently on Dec. 16, for more than two years now. In June 2008, Marzilli was arrested on multiple charges of allegedly assaulting women in Lowell and attempting to run away from police. This event was preceded by allegations from an Arlington woman that Marzilli inappropriately touched her after driving her home from a public function. Those allegations were later dropped after the district attorney’s investigation claimed there was insufficient evidence.
On Jan. 20, attorneys will meet with the judge presiding over the case. The court’s criminal clerk’s office said that could mean the defense is changing its plea, but Kennedy dismissed the possibility.
“It’s not very likely,” said Kennedy, who recently won a seat on the Governor’s Council. “I expect what we’ll end up doing is picking a trial date.”
Marzilli pleaded not guilty in July 2008 to four charges of annoying and accosting a person of the opposite sex, attempting to commit a crime (indecent assault and battery), disorderly conduct and resisting arrest. Marzilli was a state representative for the 23rd Middlesex District for 17 years before winning the Fourth Middlesex District seat in a Dec. 2007 special election.
Staff Writer Maria Chutchian can be reached by e-mailing mchutchi@cnc.com.

description.hltext_display: 有少量现车可提 英朗GT最高优惠3000元
description.content:
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 10:30
近日，编辑从通用别克西安一4S店了解到，目前店内的英朗GT有少量现车。现在购买1.6L新锐运动版车型还有最高3000元现金优惠。英朗XT具体优惠详情参见下表：
英朗GT是XT的三厢版，其外观设计延续了XT运动化外观。其标志性的直瀑镀铬进气格栅，充分展现其家族特征。1.6T新锐运动版配备了穿透性更强、寿命更长的氙气大灯，具备大灯动态水平高度调整功能，晶蓝示宽灯也是区别其它车型的显著特征。外观上与其他配置车型最大的不同，还在于尾箱盖上增加的尾翼。
动力方面，英朗拥有同级车中最强悍的1.6T涡轮增压发动机，最大功率为135kw/5800rpm，最大扭矩为235Nm/2200-5600rpm。按下中控面板上方的Sport按键，蓝灯亮起，同时仪表盘切换为红色背光，变速箱转入运动模式。
● 编辑点评：
别克英朗GT 1.6T新锐运动版不仅在外观方面很运动，内饰也全面进化。红黑主色调配银色装饰条，这就是1.6T新锐运动版英朗GT的内饰风格。铝制脚踏板和包裹性不错的前排座椅，时刻给你带来运动气息。遗憾的是该车型并没有配备一般运动版车型标配的真皮座椅，而是采用普通的织布面料。

description.hltext_display: Japan may halve time for rights issues -sources
description.content:
TOKYO
Rights issues, in which all existing shareholders are given an option to buy newly issued shares, have rarely been used in Japan because it can take as long as three months to process applications.
The government is considering making changes to laws and rules governing rights issue to shorten fund-raising to about a month and half, said two sources, who declined to be identified because they were not authorised to talk about the matter publicly. (Reporting by Noriyuki Hirata, editing by Taiga Uranaka and Tim Kelly; Editing by Michael Watson)

description.hltext_display: Hiring Professional Packers and Movers for Smooth Moving
description.content: To relocate from one place to another has been an essential part of life. Often people have to move from one place to another, no matter what are the reasons. In most case moving to a new place happens all of sudden. The process of moving is difficult and complicated enough to make a mane tired and stressful. If a person is moving for the first time will be in chaotic and problematic situation thinking about the process of move and how it will be executed. Indeed, it is very boring, annoying and tiresome undertaking because the process involves many problematic works such as packing of household things, loading & unloading of goods, unpacking of goods, etc. These all works are enough to make your extremely tired. But you can make your move easier with the help of professional moving company. Let's know what a professional moving (also called Packers Movers) can do for you. Today the activity of moving from one place to another is carried on by professional packers and movers companies also called moving agencies, packers & movers companies, movers, removal companies, etc. A truly professional moving company in India will certainly give you hassle-free and happy relocation experience. A good mover provides a wide range of moving services in order to simplify your various relocation needs such as residential relocation, commercial relocation, local household goods shifting, industrial goods shifting, domestic shifting, international shifting, etc. Not all movers provide but most domestic movers deal in all kinds of moving & relocation situations. A good moving company provides door to door professional services to assist you at your door step. You have option to choose full move service or customize the service according to your needs, preferences and budgets. Most commonly services offered by professional Packers and Movers companies are packing service, moving service, loading service, unloading service, unpacking service, insurance coverage policy, etc. Many of professional Movers Packers also provide car carrier & transportation services, warehousing & storage service, air cargo services, domestic & international courier service, freight forwarding & international logistical service, custom clearance service, etc. Hence, a good mover can make your move easy and smooth. But make sure, you choose a good mover that is experienced and registered also. Article Source:- http://www.buzzle.com/articles/hiring-professional-packers-and-movers-for-smooth-moving.html

description.hltext_display: Kittitas crash hospitalizes two
description.content:
CLE ELUM Two men were hospitalized Monday afternoon after a three-car crash on Interstate 90 east of this small, upper Kittitas County town.
Doyle Budd, 21, of Port Orchard and Bruce Phillips, 38, of Deary, Idaho, sustained leg injuries, according to a Washington State Patrol news release. Both were taken to Kittitas Valley Community Hosptial in Ellensburg. Condition updates were not immediately available this morning.
The crash occurred after a 1999 Ford Escort driven by Budd spun out and came to rest, partially blocking the highways right lane. A 2001 Pontiac Grand Am driven by 27-year-old Benjamin Anderson of Tacoma collided with the Escort, ejecting Budd from the car. The Grand Am then collided with the 2006 Chevrolet Uplander Phillips had parked on the shoulder.
All three men were wearing seatbelts
The State Patrol news release listed driver inattention on the part Anderson and exceeding safe speeds as the cause of the crash. Charges are pending. Pat Muir

description.hltext_display: Tarsus ta Trafik Kazası: 1 Yaralı
description.content: Mersin'in Tarsus ilçesinde kaza sonucu kamyonun içinde sıkışan sürücü, yaklaşık 20 dakikalık çalışmanın ardından kurtarıldı. Alınan bilgiye göre, Mehmut Uçar idaresindeki 34 YJ 8354 plakalı beton mikser kamyon, D-400 kara yolu Musalla Kavşağı mevkisinde, henüz belirlenemeyen bir nedenle, önünde seyreden Ali Aydın yönetimindeki 33 NJM 45 plakalı tıra arkadan çarptı. Yaralanan sürücü Uçar, kamyonda sıkıştı. Kazayı gören vatandaşların ihbarıyla olay yerine gelen polis ve 112 ekipleri, Uçar'ı 20 dakika süren bir çalışmanın ardından kamyonun içinden çıkarmayı başardı. Tarsus Devlet Hastanesine kaldırılan Uçar'ın sağlık durumunun iyi olduğu öğrenildi. (ACE-AYC-YHO) - MERSİN (Anadolu Ajansı) 16 dakika önce.. [2430099]

description.hltext_display: House Backs Science Research Bill, Ensuring Passage
description.content: As lawmakers rushed to finish the work of the 111th Congress, the House of Representatives on Tuesday approved the Senate's version of the America COMPETES Act, ensuring passage of the long-delayed science research bill. By a vote of 228-130, the House passed legislation that had cleared the Senate late last week after many months of false starts and numerous iterations. The legislation renews the 2007 America COMPETES Act, which authorized major increases for research at the National Science Foundation, new programs to encourage innovation, and significant increases in support for math and science teacher education. The renewal, which was criticized by Republican leaders for proposing too-large boosts in spending, was applauded by higher education officials. "COMPETES provides a framework for our nation’s investment in research and education that will strengthen our nation’s innovative capacity and lay the foundation for long-term economic growth," Robert M. Berdahl, president of the Association of American Universities, said in a prepared statement.

event_or_fact.property: COMPETES provides a framework for our nation?s investment in research and education that will strengthen our nation?s innovative capacity and lay the foundation for long-term economic growth

description.hltext_display: 대구시 "간� 도로 교통� �체 해소"…TF팀 구성
description.content:
대구시 "간선도로 교통정체 해소"…TF팀 구성
대구시 "간선도로 교통정체 해소"…TF팀 구성
[연합] 입력 2010.12.22 16:11
내블로그에 저장
대구시는 2011 세계육상선수권대회와 대구방문의 해를 맞아 시내 주요 간선도로의 교통 정체와 혼잡을 해소하기 위해 '교통대책 TF팀'을 신설해 본격 가동한다고 22일 밝혔다.
이에 따라 교통대책 TF팀은 상시 체제로 운영하면서 매일 시내 전역의 교통상황을 점검해 교통유발 요소를 사전에 해소할 계획이다.
이를 효과적으로 운영하기 위해 교통관련 기관과 전문가, 언론매체 등과 협력 체계를 구축해 상습 정체ㆍ혼잡 지역을 상시 모니티링하는 한편 문제점을 집중 분석해 교통소통 대책을 마련할 방침이다.
게다가 교통대책 TF팀은 앞으로 교통 체증 및 혼잡이 빚어지면 현장에 즉시 출동해 그 원인을 분석하고 교통정보센터, 버스운행관리시스템, 교통통신원 등을 통해 교통 상황을 파악해 흐름이 원활하지 못한 곳은 관계부서와 협의해 바로 개선한다.
대구시 곽영길 교통정책과장은 "시내 주요 간선도로와 시내 다중이용시설을 찾는 외국인과 시민들의 불편을 해소하고 교통 흐름을 원활하게 하기 위해 교통대책 TF팀을 신설키로 했다"고 말했다. (연합뉴스)
내블로그에 저장
대구시 "간선도로 교통정체 해소"…TF팀 구성 대구시는 2011 세계육상선수권대회와 대구방문의 해를 맞아 시내 주요 간선도로의 교통 정체와 혼잡을 해소하기 위해 '교통대책 TF팀'을 신설해 본격 가동한다고 22일 밝혔다.
이에 따라 교통대책 TF팀은 상시 체제로 운영하면서 매일 시내 전역의 교통상황을 점검해 교통유발 요소를 사전에 해소할 계획이다.
이를 효과적으로 운영하기 위해 교통관련 기관과 전문가, 언론매체 등과 협력 체계를 구축해 상습 정체ㆍ혼잡 지역을 상시 모니티링하는 한편 문제점을 집중 분석해 교통소통 대책을 마련할 방침이다.
게다가 교통대책 TF팀은 앞으로 교통 체증 및 혼잡이 빚어지면 현장에 즉시 출동해 그 원인을 분석하고 교통정보센터, 버스운행관리시스템, 교통통신원 등을 통해 교통 상황을 파악해 흐름이 원활하지 못한 곳은 관계부서와 협의해 바로 개선한다.
대구시 곽영길 교통정책과장은 "시내 주요 간선도로와 시내 다중이용시설을 찾는 외국인과 시민들의 불편을 해소하고 교통 흐름을 원활하게 하기 위해 교통대책 TF팀을 신설키로 했다"고 말했다. (연합뉴스)

description.hltext_display: The Best Areas To Reside in Aberdeen
description.content:
Aberdeen is a lively and prosperous city set in spectacular surroundings. The city's excellent educational opportunities, thriving social scene and excellent quality of life are what attracts many to this area. With a vast range of properties to rent you are sure to find a property to suit you, whether you would prefer to live in a traditional granite building or a more modern development.
Rosemount is a popular area to live within Aberdeen with property in this area being mainly Victorian with grey tenement blocks. The area maintains a lot of traditional premises with many specialist boutiques and independent shops lining the streets including a butcher, baker and cheese shop, making the area a very busy place for shoppers. Rosemount is also home to Victoria Park, a beautiful park displaying beautiful flower beds as well as a greenhouse and conservatory which are open during the summer months.
The Aberdeen City Centre is also a sought after area to live in due to its vibrant social scene and shopping facilities, offering the city's main shopping malls, restaurants, nightclubs and cinemas right on your doorstep. There are excellent transport facilities to Aberdeen's main universities, the University of Aberdeen and Robert Gordon University making it a perfect area for students to live.
Ferryhill is situated within walking distance of Aberdeen's City Centre and is home to several schools and a library making it a perfect area to locate for families with children. The Beautiful Duthie Park is located a short distance from the area, boasting one of the largest winter gardens in the world perfect for a pleasant walk. Aberdeen Bus and Train Station are located nearby making it a convenient area to live for those who travel frequently.
However if you would prefer to live in a quieter area, away from the hustle and bustle of central Aberdeen, perhaps Cults is the area for you. Situated on the western edge of the city, it is a popular option amongst families as there are four main schools in the village, including Cults Academy, one of Scotland's top performing state schools. The area is also home to a range of shops to serve your daily needs.
If you are looking for a flat to rent in Aberdeen, whether you want to be in the middle of the busy city centre, or in the quieter suburbs, Aberdeen is guaranteed to have a property to meet your preferences and taste.

description.hltext_display: Santa comes to Abney Park despite the blizzard
description.content:
The snow fell heavily as Santa visited Abney Park, and the Stoke Newington cemetery became an enchanting Winter Wonderland.
To send a link to this page to a friend, simply enter their email address below.
The message will include the name and email address you gave us when you signed up.
Email address
Send link
To send a link to this page to a friend, you must be logged in.
Despite blizzards on Saturday December 18, families arrived full of festive cheer and children waiting with anticipation to see Father Christmas.
As they entered Abney Park in Stoke Newington Church Street, they were led to Santa’s Secret Grotto and emerged with a smile and a present.
The Woodland Grotto event was organized by Abney Park Cemetary Trust, which aims to maintain the cemetery as a nature reserve.
There were also stalls selling books, jewelry, photography, mince pies, mulled wine and bric-a-brac and children made Christmas hats and delved into a lucky dip.
Local band The Cosmics provided brass renditions of Christmas Carols.

description.hltext_display: "贺岁帝"葛优成牺牲品？ 衬托姜文难夺影帝(图)
description.content:
《非诚勿扰2》今日全国公映，至此，“贺岁帝”葛优终于可以长舒一口气，坐了近百小时火车走遍全国十多个城市做宣传，他真的累了。
宣传尽职尽责，演戏交足功课，把葛优视作当今国内影坛第一劳模毫无争议。不过，纵观葛优的三部贺岁档电影，《赵氏孤儿》故事失控限制发挥、《让子弹飞》姜文一人独大，到了《非诚勿扰2》葛优甚至和孙红雷平分戏份。我们赫然发现，付出最多的劳模葛优，在次年的影帝之争中或将成为被牺牲的那一个。
《赵氏孤儿》故事多硬伤
今年的三部贺岁大片，《赵氏孤儿》悲、《让子弹飞》喜、《非诚勿扰2》又悲又喜，就表演难度来说，《赵氏孤儿》无疑最大。显然，为了证明自己的演技，葛优等待这样一个角色已经很久了。“葛优扮演冯小刚电影里的那个葛优已经好多年，《赵氏孤儿》可以算是他表演上的一次回归。把一个小人物走投无路、逼上梁山的无助，傻乎乎抱着理想主义复仇的轴劲，到矛盾激发的爆发力，演得层次感分明。”影评人毕成功表示。上海大学影视学院副教授葛颖看来，葛优在隐忍和克制的大环境下，用有限的肢体语言将人物的情绪刻画得分分精到，丝毫不过火。“演悲剧的难度就在于如何把握火候，特别是男人，更不能大哭大嚎，葛优用克制的步伐、顾盼、手势等细微的小形体动作，交上了一份完美的答卷。可以说是他近年来最好的一次表演。” 纯论表演，葛优这个影帝当之无愧，可遗憾的是，由于电影本身的硬伤和故事进行到后半部分几近失控，在明年度的评奖中，程婴这个角色的气势显然要短掉一截。
《让子弹飞》姜文一人独大
毋庸置疑《让子弹飞》是部好戏，三大影帝同台飙戏的快感也是难得一见的影坛盛事。可以说，葛优是《让子弹飞》中的一大亮点，失去了他的“子弹”绝对失分不少。对于葛优来说，“子弹”的表演驾轻就熟，他的出彩之处在于平衡了另外两位主演之间过爆的火花。毕成功用“橡皮糖”来定义葛优在“子弹”中的表演，“姜文和周润发是互不相让的较劲，但他俩绝对不是碰撞出火花，而是绝对独立的各自精彩。聪明如葛优，绝对感知到这种微妙的戏剧张力，所以他的表演起到了一个粘合剂的作用。”而葛颖甚至用“葛优的出彩承托出姜文更出彩”来形容葛优在“子弹”中的意义。“‘子弹’里的每个角色各有分工，周润发癫狂了，成了小丑，葛优狂放了，成了桥梁，就属姜文最高大全，他的自恋一览无余。”，
三大影帝同台飙戏，也必定同台争奖，在《让子弹飞》中，姜文舍我其谁的气场绝对拥有压倒性的优势。在毕成功看来，三个人同时报名影帝，葛优显然是被牺牲的那一个。
《非诚勿扰2》主角配角分不清楚
《非2》今日杀到。提前看过电影的观众都有一个疑问，葛优怎么就成了配角？为了这事，冯小刚还特地给葛优道歉：“这回真对不起优子，不过他贺岁档那么多戏，也不差这一部。”
冯小刚在《非2》中与王朔携手玩了一把深沉。毕成功分析：“冯小刚用葛优和舒淇的试婚的段落展示了婚姻本身生老病死，得了癌症的孙红雷则是生命过程的缩影。两条线一明一暗，是冯小刚与王朔两个中年男人对婚姻、人生终极意义的探讨。两个主题都如此重要，葛优的角色注定只能占到一半。”
就表演而言，葛优虽然是第一次诠释续集中的人物，角色衔接自然，在表现欲很强的孙红雷面前，葛优的克制同样起到了平衡作用。可是，凭半部戏的演出要博一个影帝，难度很大。

description.hltext_display: Body recovered from Roza Canal
description.content:
SELAH, Wash. The body of a man believed to have accidentally fallen into the Roza Canal was found late this morning, authorities said.
An autopsy will be scheduled today or tomorrow to confirm initial indications that Miguel Lopez Margarito, 23, of Lake Stevens, Wash., drowned, Yakima County Coroner Jack Hawkins said. Sheriffs officials had been searching for him since Monday. He left the Pomona View Mobile Park about midnight Sunday and apparently fell into the water while trying to go around an adjacent fence. The canal is within a quarter-mile of the mobile park, which is on State Route 821.
Lopez Margarito was found a little more than two miles downstream.
The Bureau of Reclamation had been lowering the water level in the canal to aid the search. Sheriffs Lt. Brian Winter said searchers spotted the body this morning after several passes along the bank.
Lopez Margarito, who was shoeless, had been drinking and making suicidal statements before he disappeared, authorities said.
He was living with a relative at the mobile park while looking for work.
-- Mark Morey

event_or_fact.property: searchers spotted the body this morning after several passes along the bank

description.hltext_display: Saint Agnes teacher named 'Science Teacher of the Week'
description.content:
Paul Perrone, the seventh- and eighth-grade science teacher at Saint Agnes School was named the “Science Teacher of the Week” by Cubist Pharmaceuticals and the sports radio station 98.5, which they’ve been doing every week through the Patriots season.
Teachers selected will be eligible for a Cubist Pharmaceuticals Science Education Leadership Award. If Perrone wins the grand prize, he could take part in a special meet and greet with Patriots broadcasters at the last home game on Jan. 2, receive a $1,000 check to the Saint Agnes school science program, and host a Patriot alum in his classroom at the end of the season.
Perrone, a Stoneham resident, began teaching at Saint Agnes School last year. He holds a bachelor’s degree in science from Salem State College. He currently teaches seventh-grade life science and eighth-grade earth science.
Perrone’s selection as “Teacher of the Week” came about as a result of a nominating essay written by eighth-grade student, Jacob Fulton.

description.hltext_display: Moving Boxes Rentals - Move Peacefully And Secure!
description.content: Moving is very stressful job and requires moving all your important belongings along with you. You can hire a professional mover and transport truck to help you in moving. But these require a lot of money for their service. The professional movers help to pack and transport all the items and promises to deliver the best service. There are many moving boxes rentals companies that can help in moving. You can hire any of the company to assist you in moving. Before this you need to review all the comments and feedback from the previous customers of that company. If there are more positive points then it will give you more confidence on the company. This step must be followed to eliminate last moment anxiety in case the company fails to arrive much before time. The background of the company is very much required for this reason.Moving boxes Rentals Company will also assist you in selecting the best moving boxes. It advises you to list all the items that you need to transport. Depending on the number and sizes you can easily decide what kind of boxes you require. You can find different type of boxes in the market. They are available in different colors, sizes, shapes and styles. The boxes also come with labels. This helps you to list all the contents of the box on the label which becomes helpful while unpacking. You can hire rental companies online. There are many websites that offer information on these companies for free. An alternative method to approach this company is that you can directly visit these companies and can select the one which is economic.Always go for discount moving boxes rentals company so that you can save on your expenses. If you are not ready to spend much on your expenses you can always go for second hand boxes. The company that you hire helps you in getting used boxes. Most of the people go for used boxes as they are available at a cheaper rate. There are mainly two types of boxes that are popular. They are plastic moving boxes and cardboard moving boxes. Both have heir own advantages and disadvantages. If you are often involved in moving then you can go for plastic boxes as they are very durable otherwise cardboard boxes are preferred as they are environmental friendly. Selecting a good moving boxes rentals company will reduce your stress and expenses on moving.

description.hltext_display: Un Natale solidale per Autogrill
description.author: repubblicawww@repubblica.it (Redazione Repubblica.it
description.content: . L'iniziativa "Compra Veneto" a sostegno delle popolazioni colpite dalle alluvioni nel Veneto si svolger nelle giornate di Natale e Santo Stefano negli oltre 450 punti vendita sulle autostrade. I viaggiatori potranno cos acquistare in questi due giorni circa 70 prodotti made in Veneto, il cui ricavato sar interamente destinato alla rinascita delle aree colpite.I prodotti tipici disponibili, provenienti dalla migliore tradizione agroalimentare veneta, spazieranno dai panettoni al Pan del Doge, al Dolse de le Comari, al Bussol di Burano e vini come, ad esempio, Bianco di Custoza, Valpolicella, Soave Classico, Amarone, Bardolino e poi salumi come la Sopressa Veneta o la Sopressa Vicentina Dop e ancora i formaggi come l'Asiago Dop. Sulle confezioni oggetto della campagna di solidariet sar apposta un'apposita etichetta che aiuter i clienti a riconoscere i prodotti di "Compra Veneto".Soddisfazione per l'iniziativa solidale stata espressa dal presidente della Regione Veneto, Luca Zaia, Commissario delegato per il superamento dell'emergenza alluvione: "Ringrazio la societ Autogrill per questo impegno concreto che ci d una mano ad affrettare i tempi del ritorno alla normalit per le imprese e le famiglie devastate dall'acqua. La ritengo una operazione di grande significato, in un Paese che sa essere capace di dare esempi di questo genere".Secondo Gianmario Tondato Da Ruos, amministratore delegato di Autogrill: "Con l'impegno della rete di Autogrill, come di altre aziende nazionali ci si augura che l'alluvione veneta divenga un fattore condiviso e di sensibilizzazione del consumatore italiano, come stato per le altre calamit che hanno afflitto ma anche dato stimoli di crescita ai territori".Da segnalare che il sistema agroalimentare uno dei settori trainanti dell'economia del Veneto e non solo, con oltre il 13% dell'intero export agroalimentare italiano che proviene da questa regione. Dei quasi 20 miliardi di euro in generi agroalimentari che l'Italia ha esportato nel 2009 nel mondo, pi di un miliardo deriva dalle sole produzioni enologiche venete. Il Veneto infine vanta, rispetto alle altre regioni italiane, il maggior numero di prodotti certificati (Dop e Igp), ovvero su 211 riconoscimenti a livello nazionale, ben 33 appartengono al territorio veneto. Insomma oltre ha rappresentare un regalo "last minute" i prodotti acquistati in questi due giorni negli Autogrill possono contribuire a fare del bene. (m. r.)

description.hltext_display: Burn ban upgraded
description.content:
YAKIMA, Wash.A burn ban issued earlier today has already been upgraded to a Stage 2 ban.
In addition to prohibiting outdoor burning, a Stage 2 ban includes the use of any solid-fuel burning fireplace, stove or insert unless it is the only adequate means of heating a home. Solid fuels include wood, manufactured logs, pellets and coal.
The Yakima Regional Clean Air Agency said the ban will continue into Thursday. Yakama Nation lands are not affected.

description.hltext_display: Magical cup is brimming with promise
description.content:
We have one mission at TownNews.com: Help newspapers survive and thrive in the New Media age. We understand the special role that you as newspapers play in your communities.
We understand how the Internet is changing media consumption. And we're using that knowledge to help newspapers "own the Internet" in their markets by providing easy-to-use content management systems and revenue generating tools.
Our roots are in newspapers. TownNews.com started in 1989 in the backroom of a weekly newspaper in Bigfork, Montana. But don't let the name fool you. While we revel in our roots in small-town community journalism, we've become the biggest company of our kind in North America. We serve newspapers with circulation ranging from 900 weekly to 300,000-plus daily. We have offices in Moline, Illinois; Rensselaer, New York; and New York City, New York. Our majority owner, Lee Enterprises, is one of the largest newspaper groups in the nation.
Don't let the ".com" in our name fool you. We were publishing newspapers long before we developed our first Web site. We believe in local newspapers today, and we see a bright future for papers that learn to adapt.
Our slogan is "Online Solutions, Bottom Line Results" because we know we need to combine technology with business plans that are rooted in reality, not hype. Our products and services help you - our friends - remain the dominant information providers in your communities.

description.hltext_display: 怎样治疗胃病
description.content:
引起胃病的原因诸多。凡是遭受寒凉、饮食不节或情志失调都可以成为胃痛的病因。如平素饮食不节、饥饱失常或者贪食生冷、辛辣或者嗜酒无度损伤胃气，可以形成胃痛；而情志失调，气郁伤肝则横逆犯胃，也会引发胃痛；经常感受寒凉，则会邪侵中阳，也是发生胃痛的常见原因。这些因素又往往互相影响，使发病频繁，缠绵不愈。胃病的病位在胄，但脾与胃，一脏一腑，有表里关系。脾运胃纳，一升一降，阴阳共济，共司消化。而在消化过程中又有肝的疏泄作用，脾与肝有互相制约的关系。所以本病与胃、肝、脾有关。 如果胃热挟滞、或者肝气犯胃、或者胃阴不足都可以引起胃痛。若中阳不振，寒自内生，脾虚不运，胃气不降，也可以积而成病。肝气郁结、脾虚气滞，都能导致血滞不行，损伤胃络，转成血淤，或者引起吐血或者引起便血。如果胃病迁延不愈还很可能造成胃粘膜性受损，甚至发生恶变，加大了治疗难度。这是胃病反复发作的主要原因。
胃病患者都会深有体会，有些。西药起效快，但亦有不良反应。长期服用会对身体其他器官产生危害，并且不能除根。而天然的中草药，避免了化学药物的不良反应。有些中草药还具备调理和治疗的双重作用。更主要的是中药在对脾胃治疗的同时也能调和肝胃，可谓因果皆治。临床上中医根据胃病患者的不同情况，予以辩证施治。通常中医将“胃脘痛’分为五种类型。即胃气不和、食滞不化型；肝郁气滞、胃失和降型；胃阴不足、虚热内扰型；中阳不振、胃脾胃虚弱型；血行不畅、胃络瘀阻型。
根据症状不同，进行辨证分型，服用中药或配以针灸，疗效显著。例如肝郁气滞、胃失和降型，主要症状为，胃脘胀满，疼痛连及两胁，按之减轻，嗳气频作，呃逆呕恶，每因气怒时，就痛发加重。苔多薄白，脉象沉弦，用柴胡、枳实、白芍、甘草、陈皮、左金、旋复花、生赭石等多味中药加减，疏肝解郁、理气和胃。亦可用针、炙疗法、针炙并施。其主要穴位是：中脘、内关、章门、胃俞、胸8一12夹脊穴，更要注重随症配穴。更多资讯请您致电已有百年历史的单氏中医。 (摘自加拿大《星星生活报》)

description.hltext_display: What Are The Advantages Of Plastic Moving Boxes?
description.content: Moving from one place to another is a very stressful job. Moving may include moving to a new house, moving from or to a big city, moving from a small room to corridor or moving from top floor to ground floor. In all of these it is required to move your belongings along with you. There are many companies that help in moving and you can contact any one as a helping hand for moving. You should also hire a transport truck and a professional mover. Hence, moving becomes a very expensive job. People who are not ready to spend much on moving can always do the work on themselves. To help them out in this, there are moving boxes available in the market and among those, the most preferred ones are plastic moving boxes.There are different types of moving boxes available in the market like cardboard boxes, plastic boxes, boxes made of cloth, nylon and so on. People who go to buy them will be very confused as to which box to select. For this reason they have to first bundle the belongings they want to move. It becomes easier to select the moving box of your needs once you have a rough idea of the size, etc. Plastic moving boxes are preferred by many instead of cardboard boxes as they are durable, strong and can be reused. Plastic boxes have a really long life period and hence they need not be treated as waste after one use. Unlike cardboard boxes, we don't require cutting down of trees to manufacture plastic moving boxes.These plastic moving boxes can also be used to move delicate and fragile items. These items must be covered by cloth before placing in the box for extra protection. If you want to order the boxes in bulk then you can order them online. There are many websites that provide information on these boxes for free. People who want to save on their expenses can go for used boxes. These boxes are available in big factories, book stalls, schools and so on. You can also make money by selling the boxes after their use. You can use basic advertising methods to popularize your business. People also prefer to buy these used boxes as they are available at a cheaper rate.Plastic moving boxes have many disadvantages like they occupy large space for their storage unlike cardboard boxes that can be folded and stacked upon. They are also not made of bio degradable material and they can harm the nature when they are thrown as wastes. But cardboard boxes are environmental friendly. Because of this reusable plastic boxes are now being manufactured.
