description.hltext_display: Pequim proíbe uso do inglês em textos chineses
description.content:
PEQUIM, 22 dez 2010 (AFP) -Para preservar a "pureza" da língua chinesa, os jornais, revistas, livros e sites da China ficarão proibidos de utilizar termos em inglês, anunciou uma agência governamental.
"O uso crescente de palavras e abreviaturas em inglês prejudica gravemente a padronização e a pureza da língua escrita e oral chinesa", afirma uma diretriz divulgada na segunda-feira pela Administração Geral da Imprensa e Edição, e publicada nesta quarta-feira pelos jornais.
"Este hábito destrói um entorno linguístico e cultural saudável e harmonioso, e exerce uma influência nefasta na sociedade", completa o texto.
"Em consequência fica proibido introduzir termos estrangeiros como palavras ou abreviaturas inglesas nas publicações em chinês e criar termos que não são chineses nem estrangeiros, de significado pouco claro".
As empresas que não respeitarem a diretriz podem receber sanções administrativas.
Algumas siglas em inglês são usadas regularmente pela imprensa chinesa, como NBA (a liga de basquete profissional dos Estados Unidos), GDP (Produto Interno Bruto, PIB em português), CPI (índice de preços ao consumidor) e WTO (Organização Mundial do Comércio, OMC em português).
A Administração permite, no entanto, a possibilidade do uso de termos estrangeiro em caso de necessidade, seguidos da tradução ou de uma explicação em chinês.
Os nomes dos locais ou de pessoas deverão ser igualmente traduzidos, segundo o jornal de língua inglesa China Daily, que publica as declarações do diretor de uma editora de Pequim com críticas à medida.
"A intenção de proteger a língua chinesa é boa, mas com a globalização, quando certas siglas em inglês como WTO (Organização Mundial do Comércio) são amplamente aceitos pelos leitores, eliminá-las me parece exagerado", declarou a fonte, que pediu para não ser identificado.
"Na conversa, as pessoas também utilizam estas palavras todo o tempo, a regulamentação pode distanciar a língua escrita da oral", considerou.

description.hltext_display: 沪指两阴夹一阳 谁导演了午后两级跳？
description.content:
周三A股市场未能延续昨日强势，盘中惊现“两级跳”。虽然有美三大股指创下两年以来收盘新高，以及欧洲股市触及27个月收盘新高等外盘良好表现的刺激，但因油价上调、中国2011年的新增贷款目标可能较今年人民币7.5万亿元的目标缩减10%和央行拟根据资本充足率指导信贷投放等三侧消息冲击大盘，昨日逞强的部分周期品种反手做空，股指全日整体呈现震荡下挫走势。截至收盘，上证综指报2877.90点，下跌0.90%；深证成指报12767.0点，下跌0.82%。沪市成交为1276亿；深市成交为1138亿。两市合计成交2414亿，较昨日有所萎缩。 盘面观察，受外盘强劲表现带动，今日早盘沪深两市股指承接昨日尾盘的强势纷纷小幅高开，但随后在石油、煤炭、有色等板块的带动下，沪指欲震荡上行，但此时以创业板为首的中小盘个股震荡走低，“两桶油”高开低走，市场强势气氛迅速降温，沪指无奈震荡回落，期间2900点和多条均线再度被击穿。午后，大盘翻红未果，13：30左右，在煤炭、金融等权重板块跌幅扩大的拖累下，主力发动了两波恐慌性跳水，但因钢铁、有色板块顽强抵抗，股指重心滑落并不十分明显。
从本周沪指三天的走势来看，振幅相对于上周的缩量阴跌呈现明显的扩大趋势，但整体而言股指重心稳步上移。而在这种背景下，为什么大盘未能延续昨日的强势，而盘中又是谁导演的惊魂跳水呢？首先，昨日的上涨缺乏量能的有效支撑，而今日早盘未见补量，且有中小盘个股拆台，市场继续向上动力不足。其次，投资者短线操作思维浓厚。从11月份调整以来，股指上涨的持续性较差，导致投资者持股心态不稳，高抛低吸的思维较重，导致昨日大涨的获利盘见今日中小盘个股形势不妙，即利用高开震荡出逃。第三，金融、煤炭等午后跌幅扩大，导致股指二度小幅回落。昨日《人民日报》社主办的《国际金融报》报导称，为控制信贷规模，中国2011年的新增贷款目标可能较今年人民币7.5万亿元的目标缩减10%。今日又有消息称，央行拟建立新信贷管理体制，根据资本充足率等指导信贷投放等。在各种传闻的影响下，银行股甚至整个A股市场风声鹤唳。不过，让人欣喜的是这种恐慌情绪持续性不强，股指调整过程中呈现一定的下跌抵抗形态。
整体来看，昨日逞强的地产、金融等板块再现一日游行情，这些板块的重新走弱，不仅损伤了市场积极做多的热情，同时对股指重心形成明显拖累，导致盘中股指出现了惊险的两级跳。技术上看，沪指盘中下跌出现了明显的抵抗情绪，日线上虽然是“两阴夹一阳”看淡形态，但股指重心仍相对稳步上移。目前距离元旦还剩下7个交易日，中短期均线胶着的状态未发生改变，预计市场这种震荡格局将延续，建议投资者半仓应对震荡，在大盘未出现明显的方向选择之前，追涨杀跌均不可取。 （中证投资 张索清）

description.hltext_display: Nicole Kidman opens up about adopted children
description.content:
Nicole Kidman would ?love? her and ex-husband Tom Cruise?s adopted children to live with her.
The 43-year-old Hollywood actress and actor Tom divorced in 2001, with their two adoptive kids Isabella, 18, and 15-year-old Connor choosing to spend most of their time with their father at his Los Angeles home.
Nicole lives in Nashville with her second husband, country singer Keith Urban, and they have a two-year-old daughter named Sunday Rose together. While the actress is immensely happy, Nicole would like to see more of Isabella and Connor.
"They live with Tom, which was their choice," she told the British edition of Hello! magazine.
Nicole admits it would be a dream if the teenagers came to live with her and Keith, although she understands their choice and completely respects it. The star has taken a philosophical approach to their decision, and has no plans to pressurise them. She also seeks solace in the fact that she has a gorgeous baby daughter to keep her occupied, and is thrilled to have had a child later in life.
"I'd love them to live with us, but what can you do?" she mused. ?It's a beautiful thing at 43 to have a two-and-half year old!? The movie actress is very proud of the way her ex-husband Tom, 48, has raised Isabella and Connor too. Nicole says she has no grounds to complain, and is acutely aware of how fortunate she has been in life.
"They are healthy and sane and together and are great, great people," she said recently. "So I'm not one of those people that needs to be reminded of what I have." � Cover Media

it would be a dream if the teenagers came to live with her and Keith, although she understands their choice and completely respects it

description.hltext_display: Former Prosser mayor faces more sex charges
description.content:
KENNEWICK, Wash. Two additional charges have been filed against former Prosser Mayor Linda Lusk, accusing her of communication with a minor for immoral purposes and third-degree rape of a child.
The new charges allege Lusk invited a 14-year-old boy to her home for a sexual encounter and that she sent sexually explicit text messages to him.
Lusk already was facing a charge of third-degree child molestation involving the boy. She has a Jan. 3 hearing in Benton County Superior Court to review the status of her case, said Lusk's attorney, Scott Johnson.
Lusk, 49, is charged with inviting the Prosser High School boy to her home in late April for the brief sexual encounter.
Her husband, Kevin Lusk, is principal of the high school.
The new charges were filed Monday. Also Monday, prosecutors asked the court to review the conditions of Lusk's release after she recently texted the victim.
Johnson said Lusk got a new cell phone number and sent an automatic message to everyone in her address book, including the boy. She is prohibited from contacting the victim. That issue also will be discussed at the Jan. 3 hearing.

event_or_fact.property: She has a Jan. 3 hearing in Benton County Superior Court to review the status of her case
inviting the Prosser High School boy to her home in late April
Lusk got a new cell phone number and sent an automatic message to everyone in her address book, including the boy

description.hltext_display: U.S. State Department Spokesman not aware of Pollard initiative
description.content:
U.S. State Department Spokesman Philip Crowley responded Tuesday to Prime
Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's decision to issue a formal public request to
the U.S. president for the release of Jonathan Pollard, saying only that the
convicted spy currently remains in prison.
"Prime Minister Netanyahu has raised this from time to time, both in his
current incarnation and in his previous incarnation,' Crowley said, adding
that "all I can tell you is Jonathan Pollard remains in prison".
Former U.S. naval intelligence clerk Jonathan Pollard speaks during an
interview, May 15, 1998
Photo by: AP
"If the prime minister wants to raise this with the United States government
again, obviously it is his option to do so," he added.
If Netanyahu issues the request, it will mark the first formal appeal by
Israel for the release of Pollard.
Earlier, White House Spokesman Robert Gibbs said that he was not aware that
U.S. President Barack Obama was considering the possibility of granting
clemency to Pollard.
Pollard was sentenced to life in prison in 1987 on charges of spying on the
U.S. for Israel. He is incarcerated at a federal jail in North Carolina.
On Monday, Netanyahu met with Pollard's wife Esther, as well as Lawrence
Korb, who was the U.S. assistant secretary of defense at the time of
Pollard's arrest.
The two brought to Netanyahu a letter from Pollard asking that Israel
formally request his release.
Korb said that such a request could lead to Pollard's release.
Netanyahu raised the concern that a public request could in fact hurt
efforts to release Pollard. Esther Pollard and Korb said that it was a risk
worth taking.
After consultations on Monday night and Tuesday morning, Netanyahu decided
to send a formal letter to Obama on the matter.
"I intend to continue to act with determination for the release of Pollard,
both because of the State of Israel's moral obligation to him and so that he
can live with his family and restore his health after his prolonged
incarceration," Netanyahu said in a statement on Tuesday.

event_or_fact.property: such a request could lead to Pollard's release.
If the prime minister wants to raise this with the United States government again, obviously it is his option to do so
Prime Minister Netanyahu has raised this from time to time, both in his current incarnation and in his previous incarnation
he was not aware that U.S. President Barack Obama was considering the possibility of granting clemency to Pollard.
spying on the U.S. for Israel

it was a risk worth taking.

description.hltext_display: Key test vote in Senate for 9/11 health bill
description.author: ANDREW MIGA
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Senate is headed for a key test vote on a bill that would provide up $6.2 billion to aid people who became sick after being exposed to toxins at the World Trade Center ruins.
Bill supporters say they're confident they have the 60 votes needed to prevail on the vote expected Wednesday. But they worry that Republicans who oppose the measure could try to stall a final vote as the holidays near and Congress' lame duck session winds down.
The bill would provide medical and economic benefits over 10 years to survivors and responders to the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks.
It also would have to be approved by the House. New York lawmakers are pressing the House to remain in session for the vote.

description.hltext_display: 中国体坛三大花旦低调示人：一切尽在不言中
description.content:
一切尽在不言中
关键词：低调
张怡宁、郭晶晶、谢杏芳，来自“中国竞技体育绝对金牌之师”乒乓球、跳水和羽毛球的三位女性，可谓雅典奥运周期、北京奥运周期内中国体坛话题最多、最叱咤风云的三位女性。巧的是，她们都属鸡。之所以在2010年末将她们三人放在一起，不仅因为上述的共同点，还因为在事业与私生活方面，她们在这一年不约而同地选择了低调。 郭晶晶 任尔东西南北风
与谢杏芳和张怡宁相比，郭晶晶的情况更是“雾里看花”：谢杏芳已经退役，如今姻缘也有圆满结局；张怡宁已步入婚姻殿堂，退役与否只差点破窗户纸；但郭晶晶婚期无音，复出无期，有关她的坊间传闻和猜测最多，而她又偏偏是“低调三人组”中唯一从不回应的。
郭晶晶是否会退役？是否还会参加伦敦奥运会？这是所有人都关心的话题。今年9月底，郭晶晶虽然出现在国家跳水队40人备战大名单上，但领队周继红表示，这不意味着郭晶晶即将回归。
也许是由于有关伏明霞1996年退役，1999年复出并夺得次年悉尼奥运会冠军的先例，因此从2009年底后就一直“放大假”的郭晶晶，也被媒体认为有可能效法伏明霞。
但关乎郭晶晶是否还会复出的另一个重要因素，就是她与霍启刚的恋情。毕竟当年伏明霞复出时，还没有与梁锦松相识、相恋。从2005年郭晶晶与霍启刚的恋情曝光后，有关两人感情起落的新闻以及婚期的揣测就从未间断过，今年也一度有“霍启刚悔婚”以及“郭晶晶、霍启刚婚期已近”两种声音。郭晶晶本人从未对此作出任何回应，但媒体却根据蛛丝马迹猜测得不亦乐乎。
此外，今年围绕郭晶晶的其他各种话题也是五花八门，从“红外透视门”到“整容门”，再到近来“被杨澜抢去代言”的新闻，但郭晶晶仍是一言不发。
生性内向的郭晶晶，彻底选择沉默以对，很可能是她确实还没有作出最后的决定，她曾说过：“我不是一个喜欢想得很远的人，喜欢先选择一个近期目标，实现了再去想下一个。”果真如此，其实无论是“复出”还是“恋情、婚期”，又或者是其余一切的猜测、传闻，在郭晶晶的无言面前，“神马都是浮云”。
张怡宁
只想被淡忘
谢杏芳对婚事的低调，除了个性外，可能更多是在考虑男友林丹；郭晶晶对于婚事与复出的低调，可能是因为还没最后作出决定；但张怡宁对于退役与否的低调，则更像是心中已有打算，只不过想通过时间的流逝，以事实告诉所有人。
自从去年全运会期间低调成婚后，张怡宁是否退役的话题就被热议。虽然张怡宁本人一直坚持“我仍旧是国家乒乓球队的一员”，不过，随后就传出她与北京市体育局领导就有关退役问题进行沟通的消息。
两个月前，正在北体大攻读研究生的张怡宁再次谈起退役话题时，口气已不像先前那么坚决，表示自己已经考虑过退役问题。1个月后，张怡宁对此又有更明确的表达，她说：“退役何必要选择发表声明呢？我希望不被外界关注，就这样慢慢淡出人们的视野。”外界认为，张怡宁其实就差将“退役”二字直接说出来了。
进入12月，有网友爆料张怡宁已经怀孕4个月。此消息虽未经证实，但种种迹象表明，已经嫁为人妻，并且正在努力学习的张怡宁，已经不会回到乒乓球台前，再为伦敦奥运会拼搏了。张怡宁选择低调，不直接说出“退役”二字，一定有她的想法，她或许只是选择了“让时间去说明一切”。
本报记者 李远飞 J131
谢杏芳
去问林丹吧
2010年底国内体坛最抓人眼球的新闻之一，便是羽坛“神雕侠侣”终成眷属。不过，若不是网友通过微博爆料，林丹与谢杏芳领证结婚的事绝对能保密得不错。
谢杏芳是个低调、好静的人。虽然她也承认在林丹的影响下，自己已经变得越来越活跃，但在感情处理上，表现出来的依然是林丹高调，杏芳低调。不过，低调并不意味着不作为。2004年雅典奥运会上，林丹首轮出局的那一夜，正是谢杏芳一直通过电话及短信安慰、鼓励林丹受伤的心。这恐怕也是林丹多次提及“我与她一起经历了许多，有太多共同的回忆”的原因。
也许因为林丹是中国目前最炙手可热的体坛男星，肩负着2012年伦敦奥运会卫冕的重担。因此，即便在两人领证结婚前，谢杏芳仍旧保持着一贯的低调。当网友爆料“林丹的母亲透露,两人将在春节前领证完婚”的消息后，谢杏芳说：“我不知道啊！”甚至在两人领证后，网友贴出两人在婚姻登记处的照片时，谢杏芳还在解释，“那天恰好路过那里！”推无可推之际，她才又说：“去问林丹吧！”
无论如何，谢杏芳得到了应该属于她的幸福，也许正是因为谢杏芳低调好静、默默付出、忠贞坚持的个性，让林丹对她一往情深吧！

description.hltext_display: Boost for the Humanities
description.content:
/p> December 20, 2010
December 16, 2010
FREE Daily News Alerts
Tyche, the Greek goddess of chance, smiled on the University of Wisconsin at Madison this week.
The university announced Monday that it had received a $20 million grant -- $10 million of which will come from the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation, with the remainder matched by the state of Wisconsin over much of the next decade. The money will allow Wisconsin to hire new faculty members and support postdoctoral and graduate students in the humanities. None of the disciplines within the humanities have been specifically designated to receive money, save one: a $2.5 million endowed chair in ancient Greek philosophy.
"Philosophy and history are at the core of the cultural legacy that makes us, in part, who we are," said Biddy Martin, chancellor at Madison, who added that the grant will allow the university to do what is fundamentally most important: teaching students to think critically, communicate and engage in scholarship.
About $12 million of the combined Mellon-state grant will be used to fund a still-to-be-determined number of tenure-track faculty positions, which will overlap with and eventually replace retiring faculty members in the humanities. The positions will be identified and filled as needs are identified and as professors retire. Madison will use another portion of the money to fund approximately 65 two-year fellowships for graduate students in the humanities who are in the proposal and writing stages of their dissertations.
The Mellon grant is far from the largest gift ever made to the humanities or higher education -- nor is it even the biggest one made this week to a university (that distinction most likely belongs to the $50 million given to Yale's school of management by an alumnus). But it is unusual for state and private philanthropic money to join forces at this scale and for this purpose, said Don Randel, president of Mellon, which has long been known to support the humanities, including large grants at research universities. Randel said he approached Martin, whom he knew had worked successfully with Gov. Jim Doyle in the past, with the idea of asking the state to match Mellon's money. Though the pitch succeeded, in what Randel termed an "experiment," he said he was unsure the idea could be replicated elsewhere.
The timing of the grant is unusual, as it takes place in an era of austerity and cutbacks to public universities. These institutions saw state support dip 6.7 percent in the past year alone, according to research unveiled last month by the Association of Public and Land-Grant Universities. In such an environment, the humanities are often among the first targets, as with foreign languages at the State University of New York at Albany. These disciplines are not immune from budgetary pressures at private institutions, either, as demonstrated by the fate of the classics department at Centenary College in Louisiana.
The state of Wisconsin also has budget troubles of its own. The Wisconsin Policy Research Institute earlier this year forecast a $2.2 billion structural deficit in the state's budget over the next two years. Martin said it was her understanding that the state's match for the money came from money already earmarked for the universities in the state's system, though this could not be confirmed because Doyle's office did not respond to requests for comment. Doyle, a two-term Democrat who is leaving office next month, announced last year that he would not seek a third term.
But other factors aligned to make the grant possible. Two key figures in sealing the deal were Randel and Martin, both of whom are doctorally trained humanists -- Randel in musicology and Martin in German literature. In separate interviews with Inside Higher Ed, both advocated unequivocally for the importance of humanities. Randel argued that the study of ancient Greek philosophy, for example, better prepares future scientists, engineers and business leaders for life and careers than do more career-driven majors -- an assertion challenged by the continuing popularity of the business major.
“I think it’s a terrible mistake when young people and their parents believe they must pursue an undergraduate education that leads directly to a job with a title out of school,” said Randel. "I have no hesitation and do not apologize for encouraging young people to study these things -- even in times of economic stress."
In prepared remarks delivered Monday, Martin likened an education without the humanities to living without the benefit of memory, or of imagination. "We are, by nature, cultural beings. We are learners. Our cultural environment shapes us," she said. "If we fail to understand how it shapes us, we forfeit our freedom and our responsibility to think about what we learn and who we are."

description.hltext_display: Britney Spears credited for her professionalism
description.content:
Britney Spears has been lauded for her work ethic and professionalism by Swedish producer Shellback.
The hit maker is currently working on Britney?s new album, which is yet to get a firm release date. With the LP being the first from Britney since 2008?s Circus, all concerned are hoping for a triumphant return for the former pop princess.
Britney has previously spoken of her joy about the tracks she?s recorded, with Shellback congratulating the star on her dedication to the album. He believes they have managed to create a different sound due to Britney?s competence. "[Britney]'s actually damn professional. You read a lot on the Internet that Britney is not singing and mimes, but she is actually damn professional. She's done it since she was 16. And just rhythmic way, she is f**king awesome! And you do not have to go through and talk about the rhythms and stuff that you sometimes have to do. She's very easy in the studio," he told a local radio station. � Cover Media

description.hltext_display: XINHUA: NEW GREAT GAME IN SOUTH CAUCASUS
description.content:
News.am posts the article "More players and more pieces in the New Great Game" by Gaochao Yi published on Xinhua news agency.
"Though it started long ago, the game is still on. There are only more players with more pieces moving and moved on a bigger board, all for a newer rendition of the Great Game.
"Whichever way people prefer to describe the game - geostrategy or geopolitics - there has been a center-piece: interest in a geography that is important to world powers, past and present; that is, in whatever way these powers deem it as important."
"If the Caspian Sea can be taken as a dividing line, the west wing of the playing board has been more active in this past year than its eastern counterpart.
Natural resources, capital and routes linking up to the world’s existing and emerging markets for exports and politically tagged investments, not to mention militarily strategic outlets, are such interests in the South Caucasus which to the east links up with the Caspian Sea oil and natural gas riches and to the west links up with the Black Sea commercial and military pathways," the source reports."
"Sitting at one end of the board is the same old player, known as the Russian Empire, while at the other end now is an alliance orchestrated not any more by the British Empire but rather by the Americans and the military coalition they dominate, known as NATO.
However, the past year was somehow quiet in the South Caucasus thanks to reassessing and regrouping after the 2008 Georgia-Russia conflict and to a foot-dragging recovery from the 2008-2009 financial and economic difficulties," the website reads.
"Either as individual states or as component parts of the South Caucasus, the three countries of the region strived in the past year to play themselves instead of being played upon by others. And they all had their moves to make to play some part in the game.
For Georgia, claiming sovereignty over Abkhazia and South Ossetia and dealing with neighboring Russia has put the country under the spotlight from time to time, be it sideline talks concerning Russian accession to the WTO or direct talks in the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE) summit or its aspirations for affiliation with NATO," the author says.
"For Azerbaijan, reaffirming UN Security Council Resolution (UNSCR) definitions over the disputed Nagorno-Karabakh while trying to strike a balance over oil and natural gas exports between the old route through Russia and the new route via the Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan pipeline has drawn some international attention, and the Azerbaijanis have even warned of resorting to force to regain control over Nagorno-Karabakh," the source says.
"For Armenia, internationalizing the Nagorno-Karabakh issue by raising Kosovo deja vu and by warning it will recognize the self-proclaimed republic has plucked a string or two on the international chord. The country also has a side-front of its own with neighboring Turkey, from which it has been demanding a public apology and hopefully compensation for the 1910 massacre of Armenians.
Russia, the former Big Brother to the South Caucasus trio, is in a deadlock with Georgia but has been maneuvering carefully to maintain the balance between Azerbaijan and Armenia," the author stresses.
"Though the local players were assessing and reassessing the cons and pros, the losses and gains of the August 2008 conflict and the financial and economic crises, other players from outside the region have not rested in 2010. They also made moves on the board.
U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and EU foreign policy chief Catherine Ashton visited in tandem all three South Caucasus countries before NATO Secretary-General Anders Fogh Rasmussen visited and opened an alliance liaison office in Tbilisi, to reassure they care about and support the region.
NATO later invited the presidents of the three South Caucasus countries to its Lisbon summit, which further reassured the trio about the alliance’s backup," the author emphasizes.

description.hltext_display: Board shake-up
description.content:
Continued from Back Page
with Parkmead. It hasn't surprised me the share price has risen because the potential is enormous.
"If you think what happened with Dana, we very quickly had a share price at a multiple of where we started. That is the power of the oil business. Oil is looking very strong going forward."
Mr Cross owns 28.1% of Parkmead - a holding which is now worth about pound(s)22.5m.
He plans to turn Parkmead, which invests in exploration and advises oil companies and governments on petroleum economics, into an exploration and production company modelled on his Dana creation. Mr Cross held out for an even higher bid for Dana than the 1800p-a- share which won the day during a lengthy takeover battle with the South Korean bidder for the company.
He told The Herald yesterday: "I finished things up with the Koreans on a very friendly basis. When you are running a public company, your job is to drive the buyer hard to get the best possible price to shareholders."
Parkmead said that Brian Wilson and Faysal Hamza would retire as non-executive directors with effect from yesterday.
Mr Cross noted both had been on the board for several years and added: "They did a great job for the company."

description.hltext_display: 时评：何以填平房地产的质量“陷阱”？
description.content:
日前，黄骅市枫景华城小区地下车库里两根用于承重的柱子，水泥严重脱落、钢筋严重变形，对居民楼安全造成威胁。黄骅市政府迅速采取措施对楼上百余户居民连夜转移，并聘请质量检测机构对楼体基础及地下车库承重柱进行质量检测。两批相关专家已到场检测，第一批专家初步认定不会对楼房主体安全产生影响。(本报12月20日报道) 近年来，“楼脆脆”、“楼歪歪”等有关住房质量的重大事件相继曝光，及至今年10月北京大兴区某在建楼栋因质量问题被拆除重建，住房质量问题引发国人关注。在这种背景下看黄骅市枫景华城小区地下车库承重柱事件，注定会让上百业主产生心理阴霾。是故，即使第一批专家已经形成初步认定意见，而且在进行质量检测中由住户代表全程参与监督，业主依然担心楼层的主体安全问题。
这种担忧，根本上还是住房的质量危机。所以，“不会对楼房主体安全产生影响”的结论，不要轻易下。需要黄骅市政府按照目前的计划，组织专家组对地下承重柱及车库其他部位全部进行一次强度检测；也需要组织相关专家对地下车库承重柱是否影响到楼房主体安全，进行反复检测和论证；更需要在检测和论证过程中，由住户代表或者住户委托的相关专业代理人士，全程参与监督，从而最终拿出一个客观、公正、经得起检验的检测结果和结论。
我们当然希望最终结果是“不会对楼房主体安全产生影响”，但这并不妨碍做一个质量危机预案。譬如，设若对楼房主体安全存在影响，那么业主的财产权将如何维护和保障？再如，设若对楼房主体安全存有潜在影响，那么业主未来的财产权和人身安全，又如何保障？由谁来保障？毕竟，对于一座去年底才刚刚交房的小区，现在界定和追究责任尚相对容易，不能将现在的隐患埋藏于整个未来70年产权期内，任由时间去侵蚀隐患或者暴露问题――― 隐患埋藏得越久，或有的问题就会越棘手，乃至扯不清楚。
在现行的房地产质量保证体系中，开发商、建造商和监理商在某种程度上是利益共同体，后两者受雇于开发商，三者没有相互制约的关系，属于自我监管。揆诸法律层面，国家相关法律法规和各种强制性国家技术规范，在工程监理“一家化”以及竣工验收形式化之下，几乎形同虚设。《建筑法》和《建设工程质量管理条例》确定了房地产的质量保修制度，但是，缺少保修费用解决方式，缺乏专业的质量缺陷责任鉴定机构等问题，使住房质量保修制度往往停留于纸上。
而反观房地产市场，诚如北大房地产法研究中心主任楼建波的观察：一方面是房地产市场尤其是一线城市的房地产市场供需不平衡，市场需求大于供给，使得房子不愁卖，开发商不需要依靠质量去售楼；另一方面，对于建筑质量问题的处罚没有那么严重，也使得开发建设单位放松了对质量的要求。这种局面下，指望逐利的开发商以道德约束来保证住房质量，实在是太过虚弱。
由此可见，目前我们亟需一套清晰有力的房地产质量保证体系。去年5月份深圳拟出台《深圳经济特区房屋安全条例》，规定建设单位是房屋建筑产品质量安全的责任人，建设单位在新建房屋交付使用前，应办理基础工程和主体结构工程的质量保险，被保险的房屋在合理使用年限内出现质量缺陷的，保险机构支付相关治理费用。遗憾的是，这个我国首部房屋安全管理方面的专门法规，至今未见正式出台。但予人的启示在于：房地产质量保证体系必须明确建设单位的责任，然后由政府出台相关配套法规政策，进行社会化构建，譬如社会化的质量缺陷责任鉴定机构，以及住宅质量保证保险制度等。(燕农）

description.hltext_display: 12/22/10 Death Notices
description.content:
Ernest Beitel Jr.
Ernest "Lee" Beitel Jr., 72, of Mount Vernon, Wash., died Dec. 3 at his home. Mr. Beitel was born in Yakima. He worked as a rehabilitation counselor in Skagit County.
Survivors include two sons, Ernest Beitel III and Erik Beitel; and two sisters, Debra Hall and Cathy Bruegman.
Celebration of life will be held at a later date. Arrangements are by Skagit Cremation Services LLC.
Elisha Brooks
Elisha Jerry Kasiah Brooks, 7, of Yakima died Saturday at Children's Hospital in Seattle. Elisha was born in Lincoln, Neb. She attended first grade at Hoover Elementary School in Yakima.
Survivors include her parents, Jeffrey Brooks and Terri Boggs; her grandparents, Tonie and Eldred Brooks and Frank and JoAnn Boggs; and 16 siblings, Jordan, Tamerys, Jeffrey, Andres, Tiara, Jeffrey, Kevin, Areatha, Jacob, Lakyla, Jeffrey, Keyana, Jeleah, Jeshuah, Demone and Capreice.
Visitation will be today at the family home. Services will be at 1 p.m. Thursday at Valley Hills Funeral Home, Yakima. Graveside service will follow in Calvary Cemetery.
Jeffrey J. Cozzetto II
Jeffrey James Cozzetto II, infant son of Jeffrey Cozzetto and Cherish Price of Yakima, was born and died Friday.
Besides his parents, survivors include his grandparents, Jeff Cozzetto, Teresa Hatley and Scott Price of Yakima and Shelly and Terry Hull; and his great-grandparents, Luke and Sylvia Hatley, Nina Price and Gene and Arlene Kukal.
Graveside services will be at 1 p.m. today in Tahoma Cemetery. Arrangements are by Shaw and Sons Funeral Directors.
Raymond E. Pierce
Raymond Eugene Pierce, 84, of Aberdeen, Wash., died Thursday at home.
Mr. Pierce was born in Salem, Ore., and raised in Yakima. He served in the Army during World War II as a paratrooper. He was a teacher and coach in North River, Wash., taught four years at Hartline, Wash., and moved to Moclips, Wash., to serve as superintendent of schools for 12 years. He then moved to Skamania, Wash., where he was superintendent of schools for eight years.
Survivors include his wife, Joyce Pierce of Aberdeen; two sons, Clark Pierce and Robert Pierce; two stepsons, Anton Pritchard and Steven Hills; and four grandchildren.
A memorial service will be at 1 p.m. Dec. 29 at Harrison Family Mortuary in Aberdeen.
Irene C. Sumner
Irene C. Sumner, 67, of Toppenish died Sunday. Mrs. Sumner was born in Tulalip, Wash. She was an enrolled member of the Yakama Nation. She worked for more than 20 years as a home liaison for American Indian families in the Toppenish School District.
Survivors include a daughter, Janet Sumner-Janis of Wapato; a son, Sam Olney of Toppenish; two brothers, Daniel Olney Jr. of White Swan and Carl Olney of Missouri; and five grandchildren.
The funeral will be at 11 a.m. Monday at Colonial Funeral Home. Inurnment will be at 1 p.m. Tuesday in the Zillah Cemetery.
Elsie V. Wilson
Elsie Viola Wilson, 91, of Post Falls, Idaho, died Friday. Mrs. Wilson was born in Wilsall, Mont., and later lived in the Yakima area. She retired from Washington state service, where she worked as a seamstress and supervisor at Rainier School in Buckley, Wash.
Survivors include her husband, Jim of Post Falls; a daughter, Lynn of Newman Lake, Wash.; a son, Ken of Olympia; a brother, Cecil; and numerous grandchildren.
At her request, no services will be held. Arrangements were by English Funeral Chapel.
Tiena Karp
Tiena (Langhoff) Karp, 90, of Yakima died Monday. Mrs. Karp was born in Argyle, Minn., and had been a resident of Yakima for many years. She was a homemaker.
Survivors include a son, Ronald Karp of Sumner, Wash.; two daughters, Neva Hilfiker and Janell Clark, both of Yakima; two sisters, Hertha Block and Mable Hoffman; a brother, Wesley Langhoff, all of New Ulm, Minn.; eight grandchildren and nine great-grandchildren.
A memorial celebration will be Jan. 8 at 1 p.m. at Keith and Keith Ninth Avenue Chapel. Private inurnment will be in West Hills Memorial Park.
Mae S. Schlimme
Mae Sharon Schlimme, 71, of Yakima died Monday at Landmark Care Center. Mrs. Schlimme was born in Ortonville, Minn., and lived many places around the country. She worked as a waitress and in many nursing homes.
Survivors include three sons, Jeffrey Schlimme of Tacoma, Kenneth Schlimme of Antarctica and Thomas Schlimme of Auburn, Wash.; two brothers, Ray Callanan and Edward Callanan; two sisters, Vera Hyatt and Dodi Callanan; eight grandchildren and two great-grandchildren.
No services are planned at this time. Arrangements are by Shaw and Sons Funeral Directors.

description.hltext_display: 现金让利4万元 奥迪TT清仓价现车稀少
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：汽车点评网
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 09:30
近日，编辑从深圳进口奥迪汽车4S店了解到，目前时尚轿跑2010款奥迪TT还有少量现车供应，消费者到店购车可以享受4万元的现金优惠。具体型号和价格明细请参见下表：
2010款 TT典藏版
降 4万元
深圳地区4S经销商 2010年12月22日行情
奥迪TT每行驶5000公里进行一次常规小保养，更换机油、机滤含工时费在内的费用在1200元左右；大保养则是每1万公里进行一次，更换机油三滤的费用在2200元左右。与其它进口奥迪车型一样，奥迪TT同样享受两年不限公里数的整车质保。
奥迪TT
● 编辑点评：
随着2011款奥迪TT的上市在即，老款车型也进入了清仓处理阶段，给出的4万元现金优惠也不足为奇。目前2010款TT仅有少量现车，有兴趣的朋友特别是追求时尚和品位的朋友可不要错过了。

description.hltext_display: San Diego keeps playoff hopes alive
description.content:
Since being back with the Chargers this season, wide receiver Vincent Jackson has accumulated seven receptions for 141 yards and three touchdowns for a 20.1-yard average. Photo by Don Balch
While San Diego’s offense is firing on all pistons, the defense is also hot, with a shutout of Kansas City and an impressive goal-line stand against San Francisco. Photo by Don Balch
Following a disappointing loss to the Oakland Raiders on Dec. 5, the Chargers bounced back with nearly flawless victories over the Kansas City Chiefs and the San Francisco 49ers, improving their record to 8-6.
The wins have propelled San Diego into serious contention for a playoff spot with two games left in the regular season. Not coincidentally, much-maligned wideout Vincent Jackson has played a huge role in the Chargers’ most recent run of dominance.
“It’s nice having him back. He played really well and gave us a boost,” said quarterback Philip Rivers after the Kansas City game. “He adds another dimension to our offense.”
Although Jackson was held to 29 receiving yards against the Chiefs, his presence was a huge impact, forcing Kansas City to respect his big-play potential. With so much focus on Jackson, the Chargers running game blasted its way to 207 rush yards in the game.
“When he’s on the field, they (opponents) know they have to cover him and it’s a different deal,” head coach Norv Turner said. “There aren’t a lot of people who are just going to single cover him and play man, so it helps everyone else.”
In the 34-7 demolition of San Francisco, Jackson carried the offensive load, grabbing five passes for 112 yards and scoring a career high three touchdowns. That performance has put opposing defenses on notice that one of the best receivers in the NFL is back at top form.
While Jackson essentially missed the majority of the season before the 31-0 blowout of the Chiefs, that game also marked the return of rookie running back Ryan Mathews. The former Fresno State star had not played in three games leading up to the win. Mathews had missed time because of nagging injuries, but he was available for duty against the Raiders. Turner opted not to use Mathews in that game, which clearly left the talented rookie’s pride bruised. But Mathews chose to take the high road and his time on the sidelines may have provided some essential insight into the NFL game.
“It’s learning. I think the coaches know what they’re doing,” he said. “I just got a week better that’s all it was. I’m not really focusing on that.”
Motivated by the benching or not, Mathews has responded with 121 yards on 33 carries since the Raiders game.
With diminutive scatback Darren Sproles seemingly breaking out of a season-long slump combined with the punishing running of Mike Tolbert, the Chargers boast a three-headed monster in the backfield that’s potentially the most dominant in the game.
“For the defense not to know what kind of run or pass is coming is a great threat for us,” Tolbert said.
Tolbert has also shown off some dancing talent, breaking into a signature shuffle after each touchdown he scores.
“I’ve been dancing all my life. That’s how I have fun and have a good time,” said the light-hearted battering ram. “They call it the ‘dougie’ and I’m doing my own version of it.”
San Diego fans would like nothing more than to see Tolbert doing the “dougie” over and over again during a long playoff run.
Copyright 2010 San Diego Community News Group. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: 米饭好还是面包好
description.content:
据测量，每百克饭食所含热量约为120千卡，只相当于一个半苹果所含热量。相比之下，每100克馒头的热量在210千卡左右，主食甜面包的热量约为280千卡，饼干则高达450千卡左右。也就是说，就淀粉含量来说，同样体积的米饭，其水分含量较高，故淀粉含量要低于馒头、面包和饼干。 如果不是轧了又轧的精制米，糙米胚牙中含有百分之九的蛋白质，20%的脂肪，92%以上的维生素及大量的纤维素，可说是营养丰富。如果市场上只能买到精制米，那么可以增加多种蔬果及适量荤类，完全可以保持营养的均衡。
再说，人类的胃一向适应他们的食物，东方人的胃，就适合吃米饭。如改吃面食，有相当一部分人会有食物不耐受症。所以硬要学西方人，改成吃面包的习惯是不必要的。 (摘自香港《大公报》 文/思健)

description.hltext_display: 券商：后市震荡 关注化工和新能源
description.content:
周五，两市高开低走，午后出现一波跳水走势，截至全天收盘，沪指跌0.9%收于2877.9点。国金证券策略分析师杨建波表示，今日市场受上调成品油的刺激，在石化双雄带领下高开，有色、煤炭、房地产延续昨日强势，但个股分化明显。下午受韩国23日即将在韩朝边境大规模军演的影响市场出现一波明显的跳水走势，尾盘跌幅有所收窄。 纵观全天表现，盘面热点有扩散迹象但板块走势分化严重，人气仍处于谨慎中，成交量无法有效放大，预计后市仍将围绕2900点反复震荡。
他认为，虽然年底市场仍将面临许多不利因素，但后市震荡走高的概率较大，面对震荡的市场，操作上，建议稳健持股，既要避免短期追高的风险，又要保持稳定的心态，短线可关注化工新材料板块和新能源板块。

description.hltext_display: La noche del bufón
description.author: ROGER SALAS
description.content:
Lo bueno que tiene ver un mal ballet es que despierta la conciencia del espectador. Fuera del programa de temporada, el Teatro Real alberga estas funciones de la compañía rusa en la que hay muchas irregularidades en la manera de exponer el más grande de sus clásicos, además de algunas curiosidades muy en estilo vintage. La producción de El lago de los cisnes es reciente y entresacando hay cosas estéticamente pasables, como la escenografía (no hay créditos), que va por un sitio, hacia un estilo de síntesis que roza el minimalismo y que contrasta con el vestuario, en el que abundan los tópicos.
El gran escenario del Real aparece prácticamente desnudo, despojado de elementos corpóreos y el primer fallo clamoroso es una reducida formación que contando los solistas llega a 20 tristes cisnes (su canon es 32 elementos). La sensación de pobreza se acentúa con la calidad irregular de las bailarinas.
Después, el papel protagónico del cisne blanco-cisne negro que normalmente se reserva a una sola artista, aquí, como antaño, se divide en dos, una hace el ave blanca (la buena) y otra artista hace el plumado negro (la mala). Al ver salir a escena a la bailarina que hace el cisne blanco, Olga Bykova, se entiende: no podría encarnar el negro, pues se manifiesta con una técnica limitada y quebradiza, sin garra ni coordinación, deslavazada en los pasos a dos.
Del príncipe Sigfrido encarnado por Dimitri Khamidullin solo puede comentarse que su actuación fue lamentable, rozando el esperpento, eludiendo la coreografía y dando auténticos tumbos. Cuando al final se tiró en plancha sobre la escena se oyeron risas: no podía ser de otro modo. Y en medio de aquello, un buen bailarín, algo chapucerillo en sus terminaciones, pero con un evidente talento para el giro y el salto: Oleg Saltsev en el papel del bufón. También se ve buen artista a Denis Sapron (que viene de la Escuela Vaganova de San Petersburgo) en lo poco que hace en la danza española, donde está el otro detalle vintage: aparece asociada al brujo Rothbart con el cisne negro (encarnaciones del mal) y es que evoca la España negra, que así se concibió en origen. La orquesta dominó la situación dando un Chaikovski.

description.hltext_display: 未来新起点 一汽自主品牌第100万辆车下线
description.content:
收藏(-人收藏)复制链接 打印来源：TOM 汽车
【共-条评论】【我要评论】时间：2010-12-22 13:41
上午十点，“2010年中国一汽自主第100万辆下线庆典”在激昂的音乐声中拉开帷幕。以“中国里程•中国一汽”为主题的开场片将中国一汽五十余载的发展历程一一呈现在人们眼前。在万众期待下，一辆专为“自主年产销100万”打造的纪念版――更换鹰标的崭新奔腾B70在巨型LED彩幕的配合下缓缓驶出，直达中心舞台，成为中国一汽本年度自主第100万辆新车、万众瞩目的焦点。在气势恢宏的出车仪式结束后，中国一汽各子公司、技术中心、职能部室领导分别向徐建一总经理呈交承诺书，表达了各自面对“第四次创业――― 干自主、树品牌”的信心与决心。之后，在徐建一总经理的带领下，一汽集团旗下子公司及技术中心、职能部门及员工进行了庄严的“第四次创业”誓师。
经过五十余载的艰辛创业和数代人的不懈进取，中国一汽迎来自主年产销100万辆的盛事，标志着中国一汽正式踏上第四次创业征程，创造了中国一汽发展历程上的又一个经典时刻，也创造了中国汽车工业自主之路上的新里程碑。
相关新闻：
美腿！美腿！2010广州车展最销魂的美腿来了 （17张）[进入图集]

description.hltext_display: 银行年末短期理财大打“揽储战”
description.content:
临近岁末，各家银行的揽储压力越来越大。“你的存款任务完成了吗？”成为不少银行客户经理见面的问候语。而也有不少人反映，最近他们收到的银行理财产品信息特别多，收益也比平日里明显要高。各行紧绷的揽储压力从近期发行的短期理财产品上可见一斑，据最新数据统计，11月份各商业银行共发行1019款理财产品，环比增幅达53%，同比增幅45.9%。日均发行约34款。其中又以短期理财产品为主，6个月以内的产品接近六成。商业银行理财产品发行数量大增的原因，是商业银行希望借助发行银行理财产品改善储蓄存款搬家的窘况。 为揽储竟自掏腰包
“上个月为了保住一笔存款，我刚刚自己掏了3000元出来给客户。”一家大型国有商业银行的客户经理告诉笔者，这是他从业5年来第一次这样做。“压力实在太大了，以前是每个季度拉一次，现在基本上每个月都要考核，许多同事都叫苦连天呢！大家每天见面第一句话就是问这个事情。”不仅如此，最近银行还不断发行一些新理财产品，他们都要把这些产品推荐给客户。
“现在银行竞争愈加激烈，国家又连续三次调高存款准备金率，明年的日子估计也不好过。”一位银行的客户经理告诉笔者，前几天他刚刚联系了一位老客户，希望他能够把钱存过来，结果这位客户说已经存到另外一家小商业银行了。“他告诉我这家银行的名字时我大吃一惊，因为我都没听说过还有这么一家银行。而之所以如此就是因为那家银行给他更高的存款收益。”
“发理财产品也是为了揽储。”某商业银行理财经理介绍说，理财产品不打价格战，很难引起客户重视，只能靠提高理财产品收益和发行数量来吸引客户。后面两周短期理财产品发行还将迎来新高峰，预期年化收益率估计普遍会达到3%甚至更高。
银行理财产品发行量再创新高
据统计数据显示，最近几周银行理财产品数量急剧增加，连续两周增长50%。而11月份的数据已经出现了大幅增长。统计数据显示，今年11月份，无论是人民币理财产品还是外币理财产品，发行量均有不同程度的增长。11月，各商业银行共发行人民币产品796款，较上月增加378款，环比增幅90.4%。外币理财产品发行223款，较上月增加29款，环比增幅15.0%。其中，期限在6个月以内的短期产品发行857款，环比增幅59%。而1-3个月的产品有 342款，占比高达33.6%。
在发行量大幅增长的同时，产品收益率也有明显提高。10月份发行的869款理财产品中，仅有30.6% 的理财产品预期收益率上限达3%以上；进入11月后，39.4%的理财产品预期收益率上限达到3%以上；12月1日至3日发行的133款理财产品中，41.35%的理财产品预期收益率上限达到3%以上。
据银行理财经理介绍，之前由于股市行情比较好，不少人的存款都进入了股市，加上银行多次上调了准备金率，很多银行目前的存款额都不达标。在这种情况下，发行高息短期理财产品来吸引客户，就成为了银行在年底揽储大战中的一个重要杀手锏。
投资不能仅看年化收益率
日前，市面上短期银行理财产品品种丰富，收益率也不错，如果投资者有短期的闲置资金，可以考虑购买此类产品提高资金的收益率。理财专家提醒投资者，购买这些短期理财产品不能仅看年化收益率，对于一些超短期理财产品虽然收益很高，但可能只有资金量足够大才好，此外也要关注赎回条款。
理财专家认为，超短期的理财产品因为期限非常短，所以算下来回报的绝对值并不大，因此比较适合手头有暂时闲置的较大资金的投资者。对资金量不大，而且缺乏其他投资渠道的普通投资者来说，则可以考虑理财周期相对长一点的产品。因为相对而言，随着理财期限的增加，预期收益的绝对值也有所增加。
另外，投资者在购买银行短期理财产品时要注意赎回条款，以免一些应急用的资金不能及时到位。有一些短期理财产品，客户经理一般在销售的时候都会说这是一款可以每天都赎回的产品，但实际上，如果过了当天的中午还没有提出赎回要求，当天就无法赎回该产品了，而是要到第二天才能赎回。只有在当天中午之前提出赎回要求，才能在当天下午赎回该产品。此外，还有一种特殊情况，如果一些短期理财产品当日遭遇了巨额赎回，净赎回份额超过了前一交易日份额的一定比例，银行则有权依照约定暂停该产品赎回业务，投资者只能在第二天再重新申请赎回。对于看重流动性的投资者而言，一定要注意这些短期理财产品的具体赎回条款，以免造成不必要的麻烦。(易超波）

description.hltext_display: 澳洲闽南同乡会校友到访华侨大学 关心子女教育
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据福建侨网消息，12月17日，由华侨大学澳大利亚校友组成的闽南同乡会一行6人来校访问，华侨大学党委书记、校友总会会长李冀闽在李克砌纪念楼四楼接待室会见客人。校长助理曾路及外事处、校友处负责人参与会见。 李冀闽对返校校友表示欢迎，并介绍了学校开展华文教育的相关情况。闽南同乡会会长黄永聪表示，闽南同乡会一直致力于团结在澳洲各地的闽南乡亲，秉承、弘扬中华文化，希望在海外华侨子女的华文教育方面能与母校进行合作。
李冀闽对此表示欢迎。他称，华大一直致力于为海外华侨华人服务、为国家社会经济文化发展服务，多年来开展了形式多样的华文教育，并取得显著成效；对于澳大利亚的华文教育，双方可通过夏令营、游学等各种方式进行合作。
对于广大澳洲校友未能返校共襄母校五十华诞盛典，李冀闽表示遗憾，他希望澳大利亚校友会能尽快成立起来，加强与母校的沟通联系。黄永聪等表示成立校友会意义重大，回去后将尽力筹办。
闽南同乡会常务副会长陈刃表示，在闽南同乡会成立十周年之际，将举办一系列弘扬中华文化的活动，希望母校在此方面能给予支持。
李冀闽对此表示赞赏，他结合华侨大学经验就举办相关文化活动提出建议，表示双方可就具体事宜进行联系合作。

description.hltext_display: Sudan, China agree to invest in solar energy
description.content:
(KHARTOUM) Sudan and China have agreed to setup a factory for panel solar cells and boost investment to cover the needs of local and regional markets, reported Sudan's official news Agency SUNA on Tuesday.
Sudanese Minister of Industry Awad Ahmad al-Jaz (R) and chief economist of Chinese Ministry of Agriculture Zhang Yuxiang (FILE - Xinhua)
The new investment will be undertaken by Sudanese and Chinese companies from the private and public sector as agreed in a meeting held yesterday between Sudan's Industry Minister Awad Ahmad al-Jazz and a delegation of China's LuQu steel pole company. SUNA quoted Al-Jazz as hailing the progressing economic and industrial relations between the two countries, saying that the partnership between Sudan and China is "permanent." For his part, the head of the Chinese company delegation revealed that the volume of his company's investment in Sudan had recently reached 18 million US dollars after the company implemented a number of construction projects in the Red Sea State and central Sudan. SUNA said the meeting had agreed to establish a factory to produce panel solar cells and boos investment in the field of solar energy in order to cover the needs of local, Arab and African markets. China is the largest foreign investor in Sudan, particularly in the petroleum sector and buys two thirds of Sudanese oil output. China National Petroleum Corp. owns 40 percent the largest single share of the Greater Nile Petroleum Operating Co., a consortium that dominates Sudan's oil fields in partnership with the national energy company and firms from Malaysia and India. About 75% of Sudan's proven reserves of 6.3bn barrels are in the south, which is widely expected to secede in 2011, but the pipeline that carries the oil to export terminals and refineries runs through the north. (ST)

description.hltext_display: Calcinado en Sestao un vehículo que constaba como sustraído y afectados otros tres vehículos ...
description.content:
Un vehículo que constaba como sustraído resultó calcinado este martes por la noche y las llamas afectaron también a otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la zona, según han confirmado fuentes de la Ertzaintza a Europa Press.
Los hechos ocurrieron sobre las diez de la noche en la calle Marcos Grijalbo cuando se informó del incendio de un Opel Vectra estacionado en esa vía. El coche figuraba como sustraído y había sido utilizado por delincuentes habituales.
Como consecuencia del incendio, otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la calle sufrieron diversos daños, causados por el efecto de las llamas.

description.hltext_display: Euskadi ha recibido el Gordo de Navidad en 25 ocasiones, la mayoría en Bizkaia
description.content:
El Premio Gordo de la Lotería de Navidad ha recaído 25 veces en el País Vasco hasta el pasado año, la mayoría de ellas en Bizkaia. Este territorio ha sido agraciado con el primer premio de la lotería navideña en trece ocasiones, mientras que Gipuzkoa lo ha sido nueve y Álava tres, según datos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado recogidos por Europa Press.
Tu nombre Email destino
Enviado
BILBAO, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
El Premio Gordo de la Lotería de Navidad ha recaído 25 veces en el País Vasco hasta el pasado año, la mayoría de ellas en Bizkaia. Este territorio ha sido agraciado con el primer premio de la lotería navideña en trece ocasiones, mientras que Gipuzkoa lo ha sido nueve y Álava tres, según datos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado recogidos por Europa Press.
Bilbao ha recibido el Gordo de Navidad en 1814, 1908, 1933, 1937, 1955, 1957, 1960, 1963, 1970, 1986 y 2007. También en ese último año llegó al municipio vizcaíno de Elorrio y en 1986 a Miravalles.
En Gipuzkoa, San Sebastián ha salido agraciado con este premio en seis ocasiones (1888, 1910, 1920, 1975, 1986, 2003), Irún en 1937, Oñati en 2008 y Villabona en 1998. Por su parte, en Álava, ha recaido el Gordo de Navidad en 1930 y 2006 en Vitoria, y en 1998 en Oyón.
La comunidad autónoma en la que mayor número de veces ha recaído el primer premio es Madrid, con 78 veces. Le sigue Andalucía con 59 premios, Cataluña con 57, la Comunidad Valenciana con 34 veces, y el País Vasco con 25.
El año pasado el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, que se celebra cada 22 de diciembre, dejó 3.900.000 euros en Euskadi, donde se vendieron cuatro quintos premios. Álava fue el Territorio más afortunado, ya que una administración de Vitoria fue la encargada de vender 600 décimos, lo que supone tres millones en premios.

description.content:

행안부, 구제역 방역지원비 5억씩 지원
[머니투데이] 입력 2010.12.22 16:54
내블로그에 저장
[경기도·강원도 신규발생 4개시·군에 특별교부세 총20억 긴급 지원]
행정안전부는 구제역이 강원도 평창과 화천에서 발생하고 경기도에서도 포천과 김포로 확산됨에 따라 방역지원비로 특별교부세 5억원씩 총 20억원을 지원하고 긴급방역지원에 나섰다고 22일 밝혔다.
행안부는 또 이날 열린 `시·도 부단체장 회의`에 농림수산식품부 축산정책관을 참석시켜 구제역 방역대책을 논의하고 구제역 차단을 위해 정부가 지자체에 지원해야 할 사항들에 대한 의견을 수렴했다.
행안부 관계자는 "구제역 차단에 총력적인 지원을 하고 있음에도 구제역이 계속 확산되고 있다"며 "농림수산식품부와 협의를 통해 범정부적 지원이 필요한 사항에 대한 지원을 더욱 강화할 것"이라고 말했다.
[최종일기자 allday33@]

description.hltext_display: No joy for Australian rock lobster industry
description.content:
Prices for Australian rock lobsters have plummeted after China halted imports. [AAP]
The group representing southeast Australia's rock lobster industry says its members are resigned to riding out the current halt on exports to China.
Rock lobster prices plummeted after the Chinese stopped importing rock lobsters from Australia.
Australian officials on Wednesday met the group representing lobster fishers, processors and exporters from South Australia, Victoria, and Tasmania.
The industry group's Gary Morgan says the Hobart meeting heard there's still no sign of China resuming full trade.
"There's no sign, but then again there's also no indication that things are getting any worse."
"And I think that markets fluctuate, access to markets fluctuate, and I think what we're seeing is just one of those fluctuations."
"In fact I think it was mentioned today that this is something like 20-odd times that this has happened over the years."

event_or_fact.property: the Hobart meeting heard there's still no sign of China resuming full trade
And I think that markets fluctuate, access to markets fluctuate, and Ithink what we're seeing is just one of those fluctuations.

description.hltext_display: 信托探路保障房融资
description.content:
昨日，有消息称，在即将下发的《信托公司风险资本计算表》中，监管层将对保障性住房的信托融资产品，设定低于普通房地产信托产品的风险系数。此举意在鼓励信托公司为保障性住房建设提供资金。
随着楼市调控的加剧，银监会下发了《关于信托公司房地产信托业务风险提示的通知》，房地产信托的火热态势趋减，与此同时，保障性住房出现日益“缺血”的迹象。
据了解，2011年保障性住房项目将扩容至1000万套，这让地方政府很有压力，配套资金来源成为头等难题。为此，业内对信托介入保障房项目以缓解其融资压力的呼声愈发热烈。
据悉，目前天津市建立了全国首只保障性住房投资基金，通过信托平台募集资金投资于保障性住房项目，明年募资规模预计将达到16亿元，成为信托公司介入保障性住房建设的样本之一。此外，中信信托从今年初到现在已先后在江苏淮安和武进两地推出了三款保障房建设信托项目，且都是在通行的BT(即“建设-回购”)模式下，为开发商承建当地保障性安居工程项目产生的政府回购款提供流动化安排，后续保障房建设项目也都在跟进。此外，平安信托、中粮信托等公司也都以不同方式介入过保障房建设项目。 有消息透露，配套《信托公司净资本管理办法》的风险资本计算表和净资本计算表已经定稿，将于近期下发。风险资本计算表在前期征求意见过程中就有信托公司提出，应对保障性住房类融资信托产品设定较低的风险系数，政策制定者采纳了这一意见。
那么，保障性住房未来是否会占据房地产信托计划的半壁江山？诺亚财富高级研究员李要深表示，目前来看不太可能。“保障性住房项目的特点是低风险、低回报率，信托公司一旦介入，如何提高回报率成为这类信托业务销售面临的一大难题。”
“信托公司介入保障性住房项目，和介入一般房地产业务的操作方法一样，但是如果要提高信托公司的积极性，还有待地方政府提供更加灵活的政策。”某信托公司相关人士如此表示。
尽管前方障碍不少，该人士依然看好保障性住房的前景，“信托公司的视野不应该只停留在保障性住房上，如果再将社区配套的商业做好，形成规模效应，项目的收益率肯定会提高。”
为此，有市场人士建议，信托公司可以参照此前新加坡和中国香港地区的做法，将保障性住房和商业地产进行打包，这样既能留住长期稳健的投资者，商业地产的加入又有助于提高收益率。(潘洁)

description.hltext_display: EEOC Sues Kaplan
description.content: The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission on Tuesday announced a suit against Kaplan Higher Education, charging that the for-profit university was violating the rights of black job applicants by considering credit histories in deciding whom to hire. "This practice has an unlawful discriminatory impact because of race and is neither job-related nor justified by business necessity," said a statement from the EEOC. Kaplan issued a statement to Bloomberg saying that it conducted the credit checks only for jobs involving financial matters, adding that the company was "proud of the diversity of our workforce."

description.hltext_display: Joint Statement of Syrian-Turkish High Level Strategic Cooperation Council's 2nd Meeting (blame Israel)
description.content:
Joint Statement of Syrian-Turkish High Level Strategic Cooperation Council's
2nd Meeting
http://www.sana.sy/eng/22/2010/12/21/325079.htm
Ankara, (SANA - Syrian news agency)- The Second Meeting of the High Level
Strategic Cooperation Council between Turkey and Syria was held in Ankara on
December 20-21, 2010, under the co-chairmanship of Turkish Prime Minister
Recep Tayyip Erdogan and his Syrian counterpart Mohammad Naji Otri.
The Turkish and the Syrian Ministers responsible for foreign affairs,
foreign trade and investment, customs, and state planning, interior affairs,
defense, finance, labor, and social security, transportation, communication,
energy, oil and electricity, agriculture, forests and environment, public
works, housing and municipalities participated in the meeting.
During the meeting both sides;
- recalled their strong and deep-rooted historical, social and cultural
bonds as well as the brotherly and good-neighborly relations.
- expressed their satisfaction with the progress achieved since their first
meeting in Damascus on December 23rd, 2010.
- reiterated their determination to further develop, enhance, and deepen
their cooperation in all fields of their relations.
- emphasized that their relations are developing on the basis of mutual
respect and benefit between the two countries and their peoples.
- also stressed the importance of continued coordination and cooperation
between Turkey and Syria regarding regional issues, with the aim of
establishing lasting peace, stability and security in the Middle East and
Eastern Mediterranean.
During the meeting, the two sides thoroughly reviewed the efforts conducted
by vice Ministries and institutions of the two countries through mutual
visits, meetings and correspondence.
The Ministers form both sides held bilateral meetings and followed up the
implementation of the 51 documents signed in their own areas of competence
during the First Council meeting on December 23, 2009 and explored ways and
means of further developing areas of cooperation.
During the meeting the two sides decided on the implementation in the
immediate future of the following joint cooperation projects:
1. Laying the ground for the construction of Joint Border Gate at
Nusaybin-Qamishli Crossing on 26th of January 2011.
2. Laying the ground for the building of joint Friendship Dam on the Orontes
River before the end of January 2011.
3. Establishment of a joint Syrian-Turkish bank to facilitate the trade and
investment between the two countries in 2011.
4. Development of a joint project for the high-speed train services between
Gaziantep and Aleppo in 2011.
5. Completion of the interconnection of natural gas pipeline networks of the
two countries in 2011.
6. Completion of provision of a credit line by the Turkish Exim Bank to the
Syrian government worth 180 million Euros (equivalent to US 250 million) in
accordance with the memorandum of understanding signed to finance the
specified projects in Syria which will be undertaken by the Turkish
companies.
The two sides stressed that contributing to security and stability in the
region constitutes an important dimension of their cooperation, but
reiterating their commitment to previous agreements in the field of security
cooperation, the two sides signed an "Agreement on Joint Cooperation against
Terrorism and Terrorist Organizations", further strengthening their security
cooperation.
They expressed their satisfaction with the level of their bilateral security
cooperation and confirmed their determination to deepen this cooperation,
which also constitutes a contribution to regional security and stability.
They also noted that a number of meetings, workshops, seminars, courses and
technical visits have taken place between the representatives of the
relevant authorities of Turkey and Syria at various levels to enhance
cooperation in the fields of economy and trade, customs, agriculture,
standards, transportation and communication, health and housing since the
first meeting of the High Level Strategic Cooperation Council (HLSCC).This
is a welcome development confirming the fact that the agreements signed at
the first meeting have been implemented effectively by the two sides.
Turkish and Syrian sides are also determined to further enhance their
cooperation in the fields of maritime and aviation affairs.
The Prime Ministers reiterated their support for the continuation of the
"Turkey-Syria Property Commission" meetings which had been set up to find a
solution to the historical property issues.
They expressed satisfaction with the implementation of the Free Trade
Agreement (FTA) which went into force on 1 January 2007 and emphasized that
the FTA is one of the most important tools to increase trade between the two
countries.
Having agreed to strengthen further their comprehensive strategic
partnership in the field of energy in a spirit of equality, reciprocity and
mutual benefit, the two sides expressed their satisfaction over the level of
existing cooperation in the field of energy.
They also noted with satisfaction that the recent efforts for joint
exploration and production of hydrocarbon resources and in the field of
electricity and natural gas have made an important contribution to the
steady development of this cooperation.
The two sides noted the results of the third meeting of the Arab-Turkish
Cooperation Forum which was held in Istanbul on June 10, 2010, with a view
to strengthening Turkish-Arab relations in an institutional framework
serving the Turkish and Arab interests.
In this context, they made reference to the announcement of the
establishment of the Quadripartite High Level Strategic Council between
Syria, Turkey, Jordan and Lebanon on the sidelines of the said Meeting. This
multi-lateral cooperation mechanism is envisaged to lead the establishment
of an area of free trade and movement between these countries.
The two sides expressed their full support for a just, comprehensive and
lasting settlement in Cyprus under the auspices of the good-offices mission
of the United Nations Secretary-General and on the basis of the
well-established UN parameters, with a view to establishing a bi-communal
partnership on the basis of political equality.
During the meetings, the two sides also reviewed developments in the Middle
East, regional and international issues of common concern. They stressed the
importance of achieving peace, security, stability and prosperity for the
peoples of both countries and region. Developments in Iraq were among the
primary issues discussed during the meetings.
As friends and neighbors to Iraq, both sides agreed on the need to support
efforts to establish security and stability in the country, which would help
provide peace and prosperity for the Iraqi political groups which resulted
in the convening of the Iraqi parliament on November 11 and election of the
Speaker and the President. They also welcomed the establishment of the new
government led by Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki on the basis of the accord
among the political groups.
Both sides strongly emphasized the importance that they attached to the
preservation of unity, stability, independence, security and the territorial
integrity of Iraq.
The two sides stressed the importance that they attach to the preservation
of calm, stability and political unity in Lebanon. Emphasizing that the
stability in Lebanon is crucial for the entire region, they reiterated their
commitment to continue their efforts to help promote dialogue and
reconciliation among all groups in the Lebanese political spectrum.
Emphasizing the urgent need to find a comprehensive solution to the
Arab-Israeli conflict on its all three tracks, the two sides reiterated
their conviction that the just and viable solution must be achieved on the
basis of the relevant United Nations Security Council resolutions, the
Principle of Land-for-Peace, the Madrid Conference Terms of Reference and
the Arab Peace Initiative.
The two sides expressed concern with the fact that the peace talks have now
been stalled due to continued Israeli intransigence. Both sides reiterated
that Israeli settlement policy in the West Bank, East Jerusalem and other
occupied Arab territories are illegal under international law and
constitutes an obstacle to peace.
The two sides remain concerned with the continued plight of the Palestinian
people in the Gaza Strip. Emphasizing the urgency of the lifting of the
illegal blockade imposed on the Gaza people, they reiterated their
commitment to keep contributing to the international efforts aimed at
improving the humanitarian situation on the ground.
The Syrian side reiterated its appreciation for the honest and central role
that Turkey plays to achieve just and comprehensive peace in the region, and
welcomed its efforts in the indirect talks between Syria and Israel.
The two sides agreed to continue their coordination and cooperation in this
area with a view to achieving a lasting solution, which guarantees the full
Israeli withdrawal from the occupied Syrian Golan in 1967.
The two sides expressed their satisfaction with the support they extended to
one another's candidatures in the international and regional organizations.
Supporting the establishment of a Middle East zone free of nuclear, the two
sides reviewed the latest developments related to the Iranian nuclear issue,
and stressed the importance of finding a diplomatic solution to this issue,
while recognizing the right of all states to peaceful use of nuclear energy.
They also stressed on the universality of the NPT and the necessity that
Israel accedes to the NPT as non-nuclear state.
The Prime Ministers welcomed the signing of the eleven cooperation documents

description.hltext_display: RAWALPINDI, Dec 21: The prosecution has asked a trial court to transfer the case of two arrested accused in twin suicide attacks on former President Pervez Musharraf in 2003 to the military court.
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
RAWALPINDI, Dec 21: The prosecution has asked a trial court to transfer the case of two arrested accused in twin suicide attacks on former in 2003 to the military court.
The military court has already sentenced eight men to death for planning the suicide attacks in which 15 people were killed on the former president on December 25, 2003.
Special Judge Anti-Terrorism Court-I (ATC) issued notices to the lawyers of the accused, and Jamshaid Raza, for December 24, the next date of hearing. , the district public prosecutor, said the military court had already tried eight men and a woman in the case.
The woman was acquitted in 2005. The two accused should be tried under the Army Act, he said. The eight men, including junior army officers, were sentenced to death by a field general court martial for planning and executing the attacks.
The Anti-Terrorism Court last year acquitted Shazia Mubashir, daughter-in-law of Rana, a resident of Faisalabad, on the ground that she was already tried and absolved by the military court.
Civil Lines police arrested Rana and Jamshaid in August last year for their alleged role in the suicide attacks near Jhanda Chichi.
Rana is accused of driving the third vehicle laden with explosives he could not hit the convoy of the former president.

event_or_fact.property: The two accused should be tried under the Army Act

description.hltext_display: Season of Sharing -- Family seeks gifts for five children
description.content:
A one-income agricultural family of five seeks Christmas gifts for the children.
The oldest girl, age 7, wears size 7/8 pants/shirts/coat and size 13 kids shoes. She would like a Barbie. A second girl, age 5, wears size 5/6 pants/shirts/coat and size 121/2 kids shoes. She would like a plush Winnie the Pooh.
The youngest girl, age 2, wears size 3/4T pants/shirts/coat and size 71/2 kids shoes. She would like a baby doll.
Donations can be dropped off at Sunrise Outreach Center Families, 321 S. Eighth St. in Sunnyside, today from noon
to 1:00 p.m. For more inform-ation, call 509-837-8372.

description.hltext_display: 上海通用汽车以创领之势盛装亮相广州车展
description.content:
低排量演绎绿色新潮电动车拉近明日科技
影视巨星吴彦祖携手凯迪拉克SLS赛威2.0TSIDI、达人寿君超现场饶舌夸赞雪佛兰全新SPARK斯帕可、北美别克新君威GS超级运动版急速驾到，赛欧电动概念车揭开神秘面纱，上海通用汽车展台可谓星光璀璨……
绿色新品：发展更高性能、更加环保的低排量车型
雪佛兰全新SPARK斯帕可公布价格上市，全新定义微车概念
凯迪拉克SLS赛威2.0TSIDI全球首发并公布售价
北美别克君威GS超级运动版首次亮相亚洲
两款新车的亮相和上市价格发布掀起了展台的一股热浪。其中之一是《变形金刚2》中博派汽车人SKIDS的“真身”——雪佛兰全新SPARK斯帕可。伴着“中国达人”寿君超一曲即兴RAP表演，这款充满灵感的个性化高端微车正式进入中国，售价XX万元至XX万元。以全进口方式引入的全新SPARK斯帕可集颠覆传统的造型设计、丰富多样的功能性配备以及高效环保的燃油经济性于一身，尽显雪佛兰三大产品设计理念。全新SPARK斯帕可以1.0升绿色排量引领汽车界环保潮流，为推崇个体独特性的前沿年轻群体提供个性化的私人车内空间，在满足潮人先锋对于环保苛刻要求的同时，尽享雪佛兰独有的操控性能和乐趣。而由Tattoo涂鸦高手量车定制的独特展车更是尽显SPARK斯帕可鲜明的精神主张，为雪佛兰展台赚足了回头率。
另一款车型是全球首发的凯迪拉克SLS赛威2.0TSIDI，车展上也宣布了三款配置价格：精英型XX万元、豪华型XX万元、行政版XX万元。SLS赛威2.0TSIDI树立了低排量豪华商务座驾的性能标杆，以领先动力和尖端科技为豪华商务座驾注入激情掌控。2.0TSIDI涡轮增压直喷发动机是凯迪拉克百年历史上首款四缸涡轮增压发动机，其最大输出功率高达193kW，动力表现傲视群雄，这与凯迪拉克一贯倡导的“极致动力科技”产品精髓一脉相承。SLS赛威2.0TSIDI的上市标志凯迪拉克SLS赛威产品序列得以进一步充实，并预示凯迪拉克全力进入中国豪华商务轿车最大细分市场2.0升~2.5升排量区间。国际巨星吴彦祖亲临车展现场，并带来它和赛威2.0T共同主演的微电影《一触即发》精彩花絮，凯迪拉克与电影的深厚渊源又有了一次创新演绎。
别克品牌的两款新车也是展台上的聚焦亮点。从北美远渡重洋前来参展的别克君威GS超级运动版搭载高性能调校的2.0TSIDI直喷涡轮增压发动机，可爆发190kW最大功率、400Nm最大扭矩的强悍动力，升功率高达95kW/L，并配有可在三种操控模式中选择的FlexRide自适应驾驶系统，足以让那些热衷高性能的车迷们血脉喷张。预计明年一月上市的全新别克GL8豪华商务车是为国内领军企业打造的“首席商务舱”，该车从大气、豪华的外观内饰到动力科技、舒适配置都卓然超群，更率先将3.0LV6直喷发动机引入MPV市场，连同2.4LEco智能发动机和6速手自一体变速箱，展现了以绿色科技引领MPV豪华细分市场发展趋势的旗舰风采。
电动“双子秀”：全球技术引入与本土主导研发共迎未来
雪佛兰Volt沃蓝达增程型电动车上市倒计时
赛欧电动概念车致力普及家用电动车
EN-V电动联网概念车“后世博”传递未来交通梦想
对明日科技的展示是上海通用展台不容错过的重要看点，其中由雪佛兰Volt沃蓝达增程型电动车和赛欧电动概念车组成的“绿动未来”电动“双子秀”格外引人注目。将于明年第四季度在国内上市的雪佛兰Volt沃蓝达是全球首款增程型电动车，也是目前唯一一款能够在全天候、全路况下行驶且不必为电池电力担心的电动车。通过车载发动发电机的持续供电，沃蓝达的最大行驶里程可达到570公里；赛欧电动概念车以高安全性、高能量效率和高综合性能为设计目标，在造型设计上追求“新”与“实”的完美结合，是一款旨在实现中国普通家庭绿色环保梦想的新能源概念车。雪佛兰Volt沃蓝达与赛欧电动概念车既呈现了上海通用汽车为中国消费者提供多种形式、便捷实用的电动车解决方案的努力和尝试，也充分体现了上海通用汽车在电动车领域引进国际先进技术与本土主导研发“双轨并行”的积极探索。
在世博会期间备受游客喜爱的EN-V电动联网概念车也再次出现在上海通用展台，继续凝聚旺盛人气。这款娇小玲珑、时尚前卫的电动概念车创新融合了电气化、车联网和无人驾驶三大技术，重新定义了汽车DNA，与观众共同憧憬20年后的“零油耗、零排放、零堵塞和零事故”的城市和谐交通。

description.hltext_display: 海口三季度居住地价上涨环比增长6.36%
description.content:
近期部分城市优质地块出让溢价率偏高，引起社会广泛关注。国土资源部昨晚发出通知，要求打击囤地炒地闲置土地等违法违规行为，坚决抑制少数城市地价过快上涨趋势。记者从有关部门了解到，今年一季度，海口居住地价环比上涨35.92%，二季度海口居住地价环比上涨11.31%，而三季度的环比增长率为7.6%。今年以来，海口居住地价环比涨幅下滑了28.32个百分点，这说明在国家宏观调控大背景下海口土地市场平稳有序。 记者从市有关部门了解到，国土资源部的通知强调，未完成2010年保障性住房建设用地供应任务，保障性住房、棚户区改造住房、中小套型普通商品住房，三类用地供应总量未达到住房用地供应总量70%的市县，年底前不得出让大户高档商品住宅用地。同时要防止出现高价地，稳定市场预期。对存在超面积出让、捆绑出让、毛地出让、住宅用地容积率小于1、出让主体不合法等违反政策规定的出让公告要及时撤销。
据了解，市国土部门强化土地供应计划管理，合理确定年度土地供应计划，特别是确保了廉租房、经济适用房、旧城改造安置房等项目用地指标。国土部门将计划新增1000亩土地，用于廉租房、经济适用房、限价商品房、公租房等保障性住房的建设。截至目前，海口市已分期分批开工建设保障性住房项目17个，建设住房21177套，建筑面积190万平方米，已开工套数占今年省政府下达任务指标套数的133.62%。
中国土地勘测规划院最新报告显示，三季度海口居住地价继续上涨，海口地价总体水平为每平方米1924元，环比增长6.36%，同比增长52.7%；商业、居住、工业地价分别为每平方米1823元、2520元、482元。其中，居住地价增幅最大，环比上一季度上涨7.6%，同比去年第三季度，上涨幅度高达70.96%。今年一季度以来，海口居住地价环比上涨幅度逐步下降，这也说明我市土地市场平稳有序。(记者 光明)

description.hltext_display: PBMS music program enjoys a crescendo
description.content:
Music students in the Pacific Beach Middle School advanced band perform in the Dec. 11 Pacific Beach Holiday Parade. Photo by Don Balch
The Pacific Beach Middle School music program is nearly halfway through its first year as a full-time program.
John O’Donnell, instrumental music director, was brought on last year as a part-time music teacher. But with the support of school administrators, parents and the dedication of students, he started full-time with an expanded program for the 2010-11school year.
The program’s success has been visible to the community.
Most recently, school band members played in the Pacific Beach Holiday Parade on Dec. 11 and performed during the Crystal Pier Tree Lighting festivities Dec. 5.
“We are trying to put our programs out in front of the community so they see us,” O’Donnell said.
O’Donnell’s goal is to build the music program into a steadfast reason for students to attend the school, since the San Diego Unified School District (SDUSD) is a school-choice district.
“It’s very soon going to become more than a full-time program,” O’Donnell said.
The momentum for the program continues to build from a May 21 gold win for the Pacific Beach Middle School Intermediate Band at the Forum Music Festival in Orange County.
O’Donnell is hopeful that January will bring the start of a new after-school jazz band program.
Currently, Mission Bay High School boasts its well-known Dixieland Jazz Band. The goal would be to prepare students for the high school program with skills gained at the middle school level.
Middle school music programs provide students with the opportunity to explore music prior to beginning high school. Students are more willing to take risks and develop musical skills at a younger age, O’Donnell said.
Among the program offerings are a seventh- and eighthgrade beginning band program, a seventh- and eighth-grade strings program, and a sixth-grade strings program.
Music education enhances brain development, confidence and social skills for its students, O’Donnell said.
The sixth-grade programs for strings and band are the most popular right now, O’Donnell said. The classes have 35 students each.
Instruments for the program are provided by the school, students who rent their own or by the nonprofit group the Community Council for Music in the Schools, which supplies students with low cost rentals of refurbished instruments.
O’Donnell, himself, tracked down instruments no longer needed for other programs in the SDUSD and secured them for his students.
O’Donnell said the support from the community and parents is most impressive.
“We have a great community of parents here,” O’Donnell said. “If we didn’t have the parent community that we have, this would not be here.”
For more information about upcoming performances, visit www.sandi.net/pbmiddle.

description.hltext_display: "김성민, 속옷에 마약 숨겨 3차례 밀반입"
description.content: 김성민이 필리핀에서 구입한 필로폰을 속옷 또는 여행가방에 넣어 국내에 반입한 것으로 밝혀졌다.22일 서울중앙지검 강� �부(김희준 부장검사)에 따르면 김성민은 2008년 4월 필리핀 세부의 한 호텔에서 약 30만원을 주� 필로폰을 산 뒤 막탄공항에서 비행기를 타� 인천공항을 통해 귀국했다. 이 과� �에서 마약류를 속옷과 여행가방에 숨겨 출입국심사대를 통과한 것으로 알� �졌다.지난 8월까지 총 3차례에 걸쳐 상당량의 필로폰을 국내 반입한 혐의를 받� 있다. 또한, 5월과 9월 수차례에 걸쳐 주거지인 서울 역삼동의 한 오피스텔에서 필로폰을 주입하� 대마초를 흡연한 혐의도 받았다.한편, 검찰은 22일 김성민을 구속기소하면서 "마약사건과 관� �된 연예인이 3명 � �도 더 있다"며 수사확대 방침을 밝혔다.� �지원 기자 [cinezzang@joongang.co.kr]

description.hltext_display: 윈도폰7 스마트폰, 6주만에 150만대 판매
description.content: 스마트폰, 6주만에 150만대 판매 박수형 기자 psooh@zdnet.co.kr 2010.12.22 / PM 02:51 , , ()는 지난달 발표한 운영체제(OS) 기반 스마트폰이 6주간 150만대 가량 팔렸다고 21일(현지시간) 공식 웹사이트에 공지했다. 그러나 씨넷뉴스는 가 이150만대 이상 판매됐다고 하지만 통신사나 소매업자를 통한 수치가 아니기 때문에 실제로 얼만큼의 사용자가 쓰고 있는지는 알 수 없다고 21일(현지시간) 보도했다. 윈도폰 비즈니스 마케팅 담당 애킴 버그 부사장은 판매량이 예상치에 부합하느냐에 대해 "판매량이 늘고 있고, 결과는 기대했던 만큼이다"고 대답했다. 그는 또 "이 새로운 플랫폼이기 때문에 경쟁사 모바일 운영체제(OS)와 비교하는 것은 사과와 오렌지를 비교하는 것"이라고 주장했다. 현재 판매량은 다른 모바일 플랫폼 초기 실적과 비슷하다는 점도 강조했다. 기반 스마트폰은 지난 10월 21일 유럽과 아시아에서, 미국은 이보다 조금 늦은 11월 8일 공식 출시됐다.

description.hltext_display: 郑州第五批1500户经适房购房资格开始公示
description.content:
昨日，第五批1500户经济适用房报名申请情况已通过核准，开始在网上公示，公示时间从即日起至12月31日。
有异议的可向该中心投诉举报，电话为67883316、67883317。
根据郑州市经济适用房管理办法的规定，申请者家庭人均月收入低于城镇居民最低生活保障标准的4倍。
据介绍，计划在12月底前再次向社会公开推出一批经济适用房房源，数量不少于6000套。(记者 胡审兵)

description.hltext_display: TURKEY WORKING TO PREVENT HOUSE VOTE ON ARMENIAN GENOCIDE BILL
description.content:
Turkey is pulling out all the stops to convince US lawmakers not to proceed with a possible vote on the Armenian Genocide Resolution (H.Res.252) in a House vote tentatively scheduled for Tuesday, reported the Turkish Hurriyet Daily News on Monday.
Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan sent a letter to President Barack Obama outlining the gravity of the situation, while other high-ranking Turkish political figures have warned that a positive vote could have a deep effect on US-Turkish relations
Turkey is redoubling its efforts to prevent a possible U.S. House of Representatives vote Tuesday on Armenian Genocide claims,
"In the letter Prime Minister [Recep Tayyip Erdogan] drew attention to the seriousness and sensitivity of the situation. He called President Obama to make active efforts in order to prevent the resolution from going to the House. Erdogan reminded [the president] of the efforts of Ankara to normalize relations with Armenia," a Turkish Foreign Ministry official told the Hurriyet on Monday.
"Foreign Minister [Ahmet] Davutoglu, the Turkish Embassy in Washington, Turkish and U.S. Azerbaijani lobbies and Turkish-U.S. friendship groups are urging U.S. officials to avoid the resolution," the same official said.
According to Hurriyet, Turkish diplomatic sources said Ankara has received overwhelming support from the upper echelons of the U.S. government, citing Deputy Secretary of State Philip Crowley’s statement Friday that the State Department was categorically against the potential vote.
Davutoglu spoke with U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton last week and asked her to halt the adoption of the resolution.
Turkish Embassy staff in Washington have been holding talks with high-ranking U.S. executives in the White House, the National Security Council and the departments of State and Defense to prevent the vote, sources said.
The Turkish-U.S. Friendship Group in Congress has also been sending letters to members of Congress arguing against the resolution and calling on members close to Turkey to become part of the efforts against the resolution.

description.hltext_display: Johnson's swing stunned England: Pietersen
description.author: Greg Buckle
description.content:
Outspoken England batsman Kevin Pietersen says Australia's Mitchell Johnson caught the tourists by surprise in Perth but it won't happen again.
Dropped for the second Test and recalled for last week's third Ashes Test in Perth, Johnson took 6-38 and 3-44 to guide Australia to a 267-run win to level the five-match series at one-all.
"We knew he could swing it but we didn't realise he could swing it that much," Pietersen told reporters on Wednesday.
"He obviously did some really good work in the week that he had off, but we're going to be a lot better prepared for it here in Melbourne, so we'll play him a lot better."
Fierce rivals since the 2009 Ashes series, Pietersen and Johnson were at each other's throats in the Perth Test and the mood wasn't helped by Pietersen's apparently sarcastic attempt to repair the friendship by asking for the Australian's phone number.
Johnson later told a WACA press conference Pietersen was a "smart arse".
"I didn't give him my phone number, that's for sure," Johnson said.
"I don't think he was being friendly. I did say something to him but I can't say what."
Asked about his relationship with Johnson, Pietersen dead-panned: "I don't have a relationship with Mitchell Johnson."
As controversy rages over several incidents involving the Australian and England teams during last week's third Test in Perth, Pietersen says the verbal confrontations were nothing out of the ordinary.
Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" from Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath during England's previous Ashes tour four years ago.
Australian pace bowler Peter Siddle clashed verbally with England batsman Matt Prior when Prior was dismissed during the Perth Test in one of several heated incidents during the match.
But Pietersen says the tension out on the field is no different to any other Ashes encounter.
"I think you guys feed them some good lines," Pietersen told reporters.
"They talk a lot. Nothing's different.
"There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series.
"Blokes get a bit red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams.
"But there's nothing that's been overboard."
England can retain the urn with victory in Melbourne or the fifth Test in Sydney.
Pietersen said he had goose-bumps thinking about playing in front of a possible world-record crowd of 91,000 on Sunday at the MCG.
And he was confident pace bowler Jimmy Anderson would be fit to take his place in the England side despite picking up a side injury.
With Stuart Broad out of the tour with injury and young quick Steve Finn looking fatigued during the WACA Test, Anderson's withdrawal would cause a further shake-up of the touring side's attack.
Anderson bowled well in the opening two Tests in Brisbane and Adelaide before his form dipped in Perth after flying home to England for the birth of his second child.
Tim Bresnan or Ajmal Shahzad would come into the England side for their Ashes debut if Anderson was ruled out.

description.hltext_display: 达拉斯德州大学孔子学院举办第6次汉语教材图书展
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据国家汉办网站消息，美国达拉斯德州大学孔子学院在所属孔子课堂HEB学区的贝尔高中举办了第6次汉语教材及文化资源图书展。
在贝尔高中校长詹姆斯・班尼斯特、图书馆工作人员及其汉语教师的大力支持下，汉语教材及文化资源展在图书馆顺利举办。此次展出的书籍图文并茂，内容丰富，种类繁多，吸引了很多中国文化爱好者和汉语学习者，他们不停地向孔子学院老师咨询汉语学习和中国文化方面的问题。
在书展的同时，孔子学院和贝尔高中专职汉语教师一起为同学们准备了具有中国文化特色的文化活动，如:中国剪纸、中国围棋、书法演示等。该校师生踊跃参与，亲自动手，不仅学到了不少中国文化的知识，而且真正体验到了中国文化的乐趣。很多同学激动不已地向大家展示自己写下的第一个中国字， 并表示他们希望今后能有更多的机会了解和体验中国文化。詹姆斯・班尼斯特校长代表学校向达拉斯德州大学孔子学院表示感谢。
书展结束后，孔子学院代表国家汉办将所有展出书籍赠送给贝尔高中，以表示对该校孔子课堂项目的支持。(田绪军 田祥斌)

description.hltext_display: "보석보다 빛나는 가치"···USB '마이메모리아'
description.content:
"보석보다 빛나는 가치"··· '' 이장혁 기자 hymagic@zdnet.co.kr 2010.12.22 / PM 03:16 , , , , , , 소중한 사람에게 마음이 담긴 선물을 고민해야할때다. 마음같아서는 골드바라도 해주고싶은게 당연지사. 하지만 가격대비 실속있는 선물을 고르는것이 쉽지많은 않다.
여기 고급스러운 디자인과 그에 걸맞는 기능을 탑재한 럭셔리 프리미엄 메모리 ''가 그런 고민을 해결해줄 수 있을거 같다. ''는 받은 순간부터 기분좋은 선물이다. 선물용 포장을 기본으로 제공하고 또 내부 박스도 왠만한 제품 박스와 견줄만하다. 보석함 스타일 패키지와 선물용 백이 함께 제공되기 때문에 선물용으로도 손색이 없을 정도다. ▲ 를 구매하면 선물용 포장백과 보석함 스타일의 패키지가 제공된다.''는 일반적인 usb메모리와는 확연히 다르다. 제품 소재부터 금도금(골드), 도금(실버)으로 품질을 높였다. 여기에 정품 컷 크리스탈로 고급스러운 디자인을 강조했다. 는 다양한 제품부터 패션에 이르기까지 10만여점 이상의 개성 넘치는 컬랙션을 선보이는 쥬얼리 크리스털의 대명사로 정평이 나있다. ▲ 는 금도금과 도금, 그리고 정품 스왈브스키 크리스털 컷 제품을 사용해 더욱 고급스러움을 강조했다.
하드웨어도 뛰어나다. 슬림함을 강조하기 위해 COB(Chip On Board) 원칩기술을 적용했다. COB 원칩기술은 하나의 칩에 모든 부품을 충격뿐 아니라 기존 의 취약점이던 정전기에도 강한 내구성을 자랑한다. 특히 핵심 부품인 낸드 플래시는 삼성, 마이크론, 인텔의 와이퍼를 적용해 더욱 안전한 품질을 제공한다.
생활방수 및 방진을 가능하게 하는 밀폐 특수공법 적용으로 물이나 먼지 등의 오염물질로부터 저장되어 있는 소중한 데이터를 보호해준다. ▲ 는 다양한 오염물질에도 강한 내구성을 자랑한다.
기능적인 부분도 눈에 띈다. 시큐리티 툴을 사용해 비밀번호를 설정하고 보안 및 비보안 영역으로 파티션을 분할, 안전하게 데이터를 관리할 수도 있다. 또 스토리지 포멧 기능으로 를 부팅 디스크로 이용할 수 있다.
게다가 사용자의 건강까지 고려해 유해물질로부터 안전한 ROHS 인증을 받았다. 건강까지 생각한 친환경 제품이다. ▲ ROHS 인증을 받은 , 일반 목걸이줄에 걸면 멋진 펜던트로도 활용이 가능하다.기본으로 제공하는 휴대폰 줄 외에 ''를 일반 목걸이줄에 걸면 럭셔리한 펜던트로도 활용이 가능하다. 슬림한 디자인에 무게도 가볍기 때문에 상황에 따라 패션 액세서리는 물론 본연의 외장 메모리기기로 활용할 수 있다. ''에 대한 자세한 설명은 홈페이지를 참고하면 된다.

description.hltext_display: Sismo de 4 grados Richter sacude la costa sur del Perú
description.content:
Un sismo de 4 grados de magnitud en la escala de Richter remeció este martes las ciudades de Pisco y Tambo de Mora, región Ica (costa sur de Perú), sin causar daños ni víctimas, informó el Instituto Geofísico (IGP).
El movimiento se produjo a las 16H55 local (21H55 GMT) y con epicentro a 13 kilómetros al sur de Tambo de Mora y una profundidad de 37 km.
En lo que va del año se han reportado más de 148 sismos en diferentes regiones peruanas que han fluctuado entre 3,6 y 6,5 grados Richter, según el IGP.
La región Ica es golpeada por sismos de regular intensidad desde que en agosto de 2007 se produjo uno de 7,9 grados, cuyo epicentro fue en la ciudad de Pisco destruyendo el 80% de sus casas dejando cerca de 600 muertos.
En lo que va del año se han reportado más de 148 sismos en diferentes regiones peruanas que han fluctuado entre 3,6 y 6,5 grados Richter, según el IGP.
Perú se encuentra sobre la zona denominada Cinturón de Fuego del Pacífico, una de las regiones de mayor actividad sísmica en el mundo.

description.hltext_display: Corea del Sur lanza una nueva ola de maniobras militares
description.content:
Corea del Sur anunció este miércoles una nueva ola de maniobras militares, tres días después de haber realizado ejercicios en una isla bombardeada por Pyongyang, lo que había disparado la tensión en la península coreana.
El ejército anunció que iba a realizar el jueves maniobras militares, terrestres y aéreas, con disparos reales, cerca de la frontera con Corea del Norte.
Estas maniobras se realizarán en Pocheon, a 20 kilómetros al sur de la frontera entre las dos Coreas, indicó un portavoz del ejército, que precisó que los ejercicios serán importantes. En varias ocasiones se han realizado maniobras similares en Pocheon, agregó.
Participarán en estos ejercicios 800 soldados, así como helicópteros, seis aviones de combate, tanques, misiles antitanque y lanzacohetes múltiples.
El ejército también anunció que este miércoles comenzaron unas maniobras navales que durarán cuatro días y que se desarrollan frente a la costa Este de la península coreana, en el Mar de Japón. Estos ejercicios se realizarán a casi un centenar de kilómetros de la frontera con Corea del Norte y en los mismos participarán seis buques de guerra y helicópteros.
El objetivo de las maniobras es entrenarse para responder en caso de intrusión de submarinos o de buques de patrulla de Corea del Norte en aguas surcoreanas, indicó el ejército. Los ejercicios "demostrarán la solidez de nuestra preparación militar", dijo el comandante del Primer Batallón Armado, Choo Eun-Sik, a la agencia surcoreana Yonhap. "Vamos a lanzar severas represalia si el Norte se aventura a otro acto de provocación como el bombardeo de Yeonpyeong", añadió.
El lunes, Seúl realizó breves ejercicios militares con fuego real en la isla de Yeonpyeong, a pesar de las amenazas de graves represalias lanzadas por Pyongyang. Corea del Norte finalmente decidió no responder.
El pasado 23 de noviembre, Corea del Norte bombardeó Yeonpyeong, en el primer ataque de una zona de civiles desde el fin de la Guerra de Corea (1953), matando a cuatro surcoreanos y provocando una protesta internacional.

description.hltext_display: World record snowmobile jump event on New Year's Eve cancelled
description.content:
San Diego Community News Group
10 hrs ago | 104 views | 0 | | 1 | |
Levi LaVallee was injured during a training run last week, forcing the cancellation of the planned “Red Bull: New Year. No Limits” event, scheduled to be held at the Embarcadero downtown on New Year’s Eve. LaVallee is expected to make a full recovery. Courtesy © Garth Milan/Red Bull Photofiles
DOWNTOWN – As the result of a training injury to Levi LaVallee on Dec. 14, the world-class snowmobiler will be unable to attempt breaking the snowmobile distance jump record scheduled to take place downtown on New Year’s Eve. This is the first “Red Bull: New Year. No Limits” event that has been cancelled since the series started in 2007.
LaVallee was injured in a training session in Southern California. The 28-year-old Minnesota native was immediately transported to a local hospital, and was listed in stable condition. He is expected to make a full recovery.
LaVallee has planned an attempt to break the snowmobile distance jump record of 301 feet over Embarcadero Marina Park. In training, LaVallee recorded a 361-foot jump, which will be submitted for world-record certification.
For more information, visit www.redbullusa.com.
Copyright 2010 San Diego Community News Group. All rights reserved.
