description.hltext_display: 日職／曾被洋基打到哭 韓投金炳賢再赴樂天測試
description.content:
繼20日「高麗特急」朴贊浩加盟歐力士猛牛之後，21日曾被洋基打到哭的金炳賢也跟進，繼上個月16日之後，再度赴樂天金鷲隊接受測試，期望能受到青睞，延續職棒生命，監督星野仙一看完之後仍未決定，表示明年春訓，再度請到來樂天測試。
金炳賢這次測試，樂天同樣沒有結論，不過韓國媒體《首爾體育》卻報導，雙方可能在年內談約。
樂天對於金炳賢評價頗高，能擔任先發也能擔任後援，而球員本身也有轉戰日本的強烈意願，然而球隊目前的問題是金存在著洋將身份。樂天正評估野手路易斯（Randy Ruiz）、投手莫瑞歐（Jaun Morillo）及前洋基右投雷斯納（Darrell Rasner）的去留，星野還是期望能得到金炳賢，球團將於近日討論網羅的可能性。
今年僅31歲的金炳賢1999年加盟響尾蛇，是球隊倚重的救援投手，曾先後效力響尾蛇、紅襪、洛磯、馬林魚等隊，在大聯盟9年期間，出賽394場，戰績54勝60敗86救援成功，防禦率4.42。今年初他曾與巨人簽小聯盟合約，但春訓時被釋出，隨後轉往獨立聯盟發展。
不過最令人印象深刻的是2001年世界大賽，金炳賢遭到洋基隊長基特本人砲轟，讓響尾蛇隊陷入落戰，尤其第五戰被布羅休斯（Scott Brosius）擊出追平全壘打後，更無法置信地蹲在投手丘痛哭，成為近年熱戰的經典畫面之一。所幸，響尾蛇最後仍奪冠，金炳賢也成為首位拿到冠軍戒的韓國球員。（看精采照片及影片請到：http://www.nownews.com/2010/12/22/341-2675710.htm)
此外，金炳賢2003年成紅襪一員，在季後賽竟然向球迷比中指，也飽受爭議。
↑賢在紅襪時，竟向球迷比中指，飽受爭議。（圖／達志影像／美聯社）

description.hltext_display: يلهب الأسعار بالسودان
description.content:
الاستفتاء تزايدت شكاوى الناس في السودان من ارتفاع أسعار السلع، خاصة الأساسية منها كالسكر والدقيق والزيت، خلال بضعة أسابيع، وبلغت الزيادة في بعضها نحو 80% وسط حالة من عدم الاستقرار تشهدها الأسواق قبيل استفتاء تقرير مصير جنوب السودان المقرر إجراؤه في التاسع من يناير/كانون الثاني المقبل.
دفع هذا الانفلات في الأسعار علي عثمان طه نائب الرئيس السوداني إلى توعد محتكري السلع، وطالب الناس بالإبلاغ عنهم، في حين شن نواب حزب المؤتمر الوطني الحاكم هجوما غير مسبوق على وزراء القطاع الاقتصادي بسبب هذه الزيادات، وأمهلوهم مدة قصيرة لاحتواء الأزمة. وطرح الوزراء مجموعة حلول من بينها فتح الاستيراد للسلع وإعفاؤها من الرسوم.
وكان من المفروض أن يمثل وزير المالية والاقتصاد الوطني أمام المجلس الوطني (البرلمان) الثلاثاء للإجابة عن تساؤل بشأن المخزون الإستراتيجي، لكنه اعتذر.
فأسعار الخبز زادت عبر تقليل عدد الأرغفة التي تباع بجنيه سوداني (الدولار يساوي نحو ثلاثة جنيهات سودانية) من ستة إلى أربعة أو ثلاثة في بعض المناطق مع صغر حجم الرغيف، وزاد سعر السكر والأرز واللحم والزيت والعدس بنسب تراوحت بين 20% و80%.
الكثير ممن تحدثت إليهم الجزيرة نت في شوارع الخرطوم بشأن لهيب الأسعار تكلموا بصراحة لكنهم طلبوا عدم التصريح بأسمائهم بسبب ما وصفوه بالفترة الحرجة التي تمر بها البلاد قبل الاستفتاء وعدم إثارة غضب الأجهزة المعنية.
العمال المياومون تضرروا كثيرا من الزيادة في الأسعار (الجزيرة نت)
شراء بالأجل
في منطقة الحرفيين بوسط العاصمة قال أحد أعضاء فرعية النقاشين -وهي جزء من النقابة العامة للحرفين- إن الفئة التي يجلس بينها ليس لها تأمين صحي ولا بطاقة تموينية ويشتغل أفرادها بأجرة يومية وتبعا لحالة السوق، فقد يعمل الواحد منهم بضعة أيام في الشهر فقط، وجلهم إن لم يكونوا كلهم يعيشون بشراء البضائع بالأجل.
واعتبر المتحدث نفسه أن العمالة الأجنبية التي جاءت بها بعض الشركات والمستثمرين أضرت كثيرا بهؤلاء الحرفيين.
مياوم في الحفر يعول أسرة من خمسة أفراد مع والدته التي تدير تجارة بسيطة، يقول إن زيادة الأسعار زادت محنته، خاصة وأنه أحيانا يعمل بضعة أيام في الشهر فقط ولا يكفله مدخولها فأنى له أن يكفل أهله.
سائق سيارة الأجرة عمر سليمان صالح يعول بدوره سبعة أفراد بنحو 450 جنيها هي كل ما يجنبه من عمله، قال إن وضعه المالي كان في الأصل مأزوما، لكن الزيادة الجديدة في الأسعار زادته تأزما.
ويضيف عمر أن التأمين الصحي والعلاج أصبح ترفا عند أمثاله بعد أن قضى شراء الطعام على ما يحصل عليه، كما اعتبر العديد ممن التقتهم الجزيرة نت أن العدس والأرز أصبحا طعام الأثرياء حيث ارتفع ثمنهما كثيرا بعد أن كانا طعاما للأغلبية الساحقة.
وفي السوق العربي أكد البقال عبد القادر علي أن زيادة الأسعار أثرت على المبيعات بنسبة نحو 25% بسبب تقليل الناس كميات استهلاكهم، في حين قال بقال آخر هو عبد المحمود إن التراجع بلغ في بعض الأحيان 50%.
محمد الناير قال إن عدة عوامل أدت إلى هذه الزيادات (الجزيرة نت)
المخزون الإستراتيجي
وبشأن هذه الأزمة قال الخبير الاقتصادي محمد الناير إن عدة عوامل متضافرة أدت إلى هذه الزيادات، من بينها بالفعل القلق غير المبرر قبيل الاستفتاء، والذي دفع مستثمرين إلى إخراج أموالهم أو وقف مشروعاتهم، إضافة إلى وجود طلب غير طبيعي على النقد الأجنبي والسلع، سواء فرديا أو جماعيا، مع تراجع العملة الوطنية أمام الدولار والعملات الأجنبية مما جعل العملة غير ثابتة، وهو ما يهز الاقتصاد مباشرة.
ودعا الناير إلى إعادة تقويم سياسة التحرر الاقتصادي وتصحيح أخطاء التطبيق خاصة لدى التجار، وذلك عبر جهاز استشعار مبكر يراقب مخزونات البلاد الضرورية، وعند الشعور بنقص سلعة أو استغلال تجار تتدخل الدولة وتطرح السلع بسعر مناسب.
وحث الناير المسؤولين على تفعيل كامل لدور المخزون الإستراتيجي من خلال توفير مال دوار، بمعنى الشراء من المنتج عند الوفرة بسعر تشجيعي يحفزه على زيادة الإنتاج والبيع للمستهلك وقت الندرة بالسعر المناسب، وهو سعر الشراء مع هامش ربح معقول يحفظ المال من التآكل بسبب التضخم.
الجزيرة نت

description.hltext_display: Santa Monica Chiropractic Doctor Helps Auto-Accident Injury Victims Find Relief
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Santa Monica, CA, 22-DEC-2010: , D. C., M. P. H., has been recognized for her ability to help individual injured in find the relief from pain that they are seeking safely and naturally. The doctor has developed methods and techniques that will help the body to heal more quickly and allow an individual to resume their regular activities quickly.Many people do not realize the severity of their injuries when they are in an accident for several days or weeks. However, by visiting Dr. Kerew as soon as possible after an accident, many individuals have reported that they are able to avoid the debilitating pain that often occur as tissue and muscles swell and nerves are impacted by compressed discs.The doctor conducts a series of tests and examinations to identify what areas of the body have been injured and discussed an individual's normal lifestyles and activities. After analyzing all of the information collected, the doctor develops an individualized plan that will include gentle manipulation to realign the discs in the neck and spine and relieve pressure on the nerves in the spine.The doctor will also make recommendations regarding diet and exercise to assure that the body is receiving the vitamins and nutrients that are required for the muscles to become stronger and the body to become more flexible. Deep tissue massage is often done to reduce inflammation in the areas of the body that have been injured so that there is no pressure placed upon the bones in the body.To receive more details about the methods and techniques used by , D. C., M. P. H., to address the injuries suffered by individuals who have been involved in , visit http://www.lynnkerew.com today. Individuals and members of the press wishing more information regarding this press release will find contact information below., D. C., M. P. , A Professional Corporation3435 Ocean Park Blvd. Suite 101Santa Monica, CA 90405Telephone: 310.399.0337Fax: 310.399.3944Email: lynnkerew@gmail.comWebsite: http://www.lynnkerew.com

event_or_fact.property: they are able to avoid the debilitating pain that often occur as tissue and muscles swell and nerves are impacted by compressed discs.

description.hltext_display: 汽车MEMS� 感器市场将在2010年达到纪录高点
description.content:
据iSuppli公司，随着汽车生产活动复苏和传感器元件供应商重建库存，汽车微电机系统(MEMS)传感器市场将在2010年增长到最高纪录规模。
2010年汽车MEMS传感器出货量将达到6.623亿个，比2009年的5.012亿个大增32.1%。iSuppli公司的数据研究显示，上述预期出货量包括补充2009年衰退期间耗尽的库存，甚至将超过2007年经济衰退前创下的6.4亿的高点。
汽车MEMS传感器出货量回升，代表着从2009年低迷水平开始复苏，而且未来几年将有进一步扩张的空间。2009年出货量降到最低点。
但是，由于市场在2010年劲增之后趋于正常，2011年增长将会放慢，预计出货量仅增长7.3%。生产将在2012年再度加速，2014年增长率将高于13%，如图4所示。
重要驱动因素，新的应用
驱动汽车MEMS增长的一个重要因素，是在乘用车中使用支持电子稳定控制(ESC)和轮胎压力监测系统(TPMS)等强制安全技术的传感器。
美国和欧洲已率先制订关于此类安全系统的法律，澳大利亚和加拿大等其它国家也迅速跟进。韩国正在采纳类似的规定，预计日本也将采取同样的措施，这将加快全球范围内的总体采用率。iSuppli公司认为，日本和韩国推行ESC和TPMS给汽车MEMS供应商创造的额外机会，未来五年将在这些地区额外创造大约1.2亿美元的营业收入。
中国也将在汽车MEMS市场占有重要地位。与美国或欧洲汽车相比，中国中低档汽车中的电子内容是前者的50%左右甚至更少，但传感器的份额将稳步上升，最先用于动力总成应用之中，以降低污染中国城市空气的碳排放，然后作为安全传感器用于安全气囊和ESC系统之中。
在为供应商提供较大汽车MEMS传感器生产机会的新应用中，最突出的包括使用气体传感器控制车内空气质量；红外热电堆用于监测湿度；微辐射计用于辅助夜视系统，以及MEMS振荡器用于增强后视摄像头。
但是，传感器融合将是一个有争议的问题。虽然在电子驻车制动(EPB)系统中用于测量倾斜的加速计销售未来五年将在欧洲加快增长，但EPB前景也受到ESC系统的打压，ESC系统中已经包含为驻车制动提供所需的倾斜信号的两轴加速计。
传感器融合使用现有的传感器信号，并增加应用算法，以增强现有的系统，例如，ESC带有坡起功能等。这不利于传感器供应商，他们必须依赖涉及独立系统的机会，来提供额外的传感器。另一方面，基于倾斜的汽车警告系统不访问ESC系统中的加速计，需要单独的加速计。
其它将促进传感器使用的应用，包括乘客保护系统，该系统通过加速计或安装在前保险杠中的压力传感器来探测冲击；起步-停车系统，需要压力及其它非MEMS测量，在汽车发动机关闭时提供关键数据。
面向消费者的供应商也在进军该市场
iSuppli公司还注意到，有些面向消费领域的MEMS传感器供应商也在进军汽车市场，扩大了该领域中的厂商范围。
尤其是，意法半导体是面向消费和移动应用的主要MEMS供应商，迄今一直专注于汽车警报和导航等非安全性关键应用，现在已凭借一款高g加速计进入了安全气囊市场。预计意法半导体将利用其巨大的规模经济，这可能给该产业带来额外的价格压力和新的成本结构。

description.hltext_display: LM mayor should get her facts correct
description.content:
Dear residents and business owners of La Marque:
I apologize for what you have endured these last several months with all that is going on in our city. I will vow that we will continue to do what is right regardless of what political side we are on.
I have kept silent for the sake of taking the high road of professionalism; however, Mayor Geraldine Sam wrote a guest column Tuesday, and I can’t continue to let her use my name for the sake of pushing her agenda.
Residents, the mayor said we are going broke.
We are not broke.
According to our auditor, we had one of the best audits that the city has received in years. Our monthly revenues generally run around $1 million, and we have exceeded that.
We have a great team in place to prevent water theft, the court’s revenue is up, we received a credit from worker’s comp because our injuries are down, and our employee insurance did not go up for the first time in history.
If we were broke, we wouldn’t be working to repair nearly 50 roads in the city, making payroll and providing professional services that we continue every day.
The mayor stated I used the city credit card for personal expenses. I never have. The city credit card was at its limit only once because of Texas Municipal League Conference registration, hotel and airline expenses for Geraldine Sam, Connie Trube and me, in addition to other business expenses for that month. The credit limit is low.
Excessive absence of more than 60 days is not true. I have used 17.75 days in earned comp time and 7.75 days in vacation time. That equals to only 25.5 days.
My previous employer did not fire me; I resigned to pursue another opportunity.
The contract was voted on and passed by a majority of city council. If fired or let go, then the manager would be paid out the remaining of the contract.
As the contract nears the maturity date, then the payout becomes smaller; $10,000 to assist in a job search only was a negotiating item in the contract. I am a natural negotiator; the mayor failed to negotiate.
The investigation into the fire department was only $24,888 and not $77,000 as she reported. The $77,000 was for attorney fees for all departments and assistance with the many open records request the mayor and her followers have done.
It is true the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is free to the employee, but not to the city when defending itself.
It is not free if the EEOC levied fines and penalties if it found the city did something wrong or failed to act. The employees came to their employer with their complaints and not to the EEOC.
I would be doing a disservice to this city if I referred them to the EEOC and not take care of the problem once I became aware.
A vendetta against the fire department is false.
Holding it accountable is true.
Residents, please see our website at www.ci.la-marque.tx.us and go to the Financial Transparency Reporting section.
We have gold status by the Comptroller Leadership Circle of being financial transparent. You can view for yourself all checks and moneys being spent.
Eric W. Gage is city manager of La Marque.

event_or_fact.property: a guest column Tuesday, and I can?t continue to let her use my name for the sake of pushing her agenda

description.hltext_display: Sa Re Ga Ma Pa gears up for its finale
description.content: Music reality television show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa will celebrate a musical Christmas this season with maestro Ghulam Ali and genext singer Mika. According to reports from the sets of the Zee TV reality program, Ghulam Ali and Mika Singh have agreed to take part in the finale episode that will be broadcast on Christmas day, i.e., the 25th of December. While ghazal ace Ustad Ghulam Ali will be the star attraction of the Sa Re Ga Ma Pa finale, young ghazal singer Ranjeet Rajwada will also be present on the sets of the Zee TV reality show on the 25th December episode.The contestants who have reached the final stage of the competition are Bisakh Jyoti from Kolkata, Kamal Khan from Patiala and Abhilasha Chellam from Pune. Media reports suggest that the participants will have to deliver renditions to ghazals, sufi songs, western numbers and popular Bollywood tracks. Needless to say, the best performer will go home with the Sa Re Ga Ma Pa trophy in hand.In a statement to the media, Ranjeet Rajwada said that he was very excited when invited to judge contestants of Zee TV Sa Re Ga Ma Pa because it would give him the opportunity to share the same stage with ghazal specialist and his inspiration Ustad Ghulam Ali. And now that his wish has come true, he is eagerly waiting for the program to go on air on the 25th. The finale of Sa Re Ga Ma Pa begins at 8oclock evening on Christmas day.

event_or_fact.property: he was very excited when invited to judge contestants of Zee TV Sa Re Ga Ma Pa because it would give him theopportunity to share the same stage with ghazal specialist and his inspiration Ustad Ghulam Ali.

description.hltext_display: Disabled vie for better access in Montreal
description.content:
Enter the verification code as it is shown below without spaces. (Case-insensitive)
Enter Code:
Image Code Verification
Automated programs can't "read" the code you see in the box: only humans can. When you enter this code, it ensures that your order is going to a real person.
If you don't see an image, make sure your browser is set to display images and try again. If you're not sure what the code is, make your best guess. If you're incorrect, you'll get another chance to enter a different code on the next screen.
MONTREAL — Members of the Regroupement Activisted Pour l'Inclusion Québec (RAPLIQ), which represents the disabled, is asking the City of Montreal to do more to improve wheelchair access to metro stations, according to CBC News.
Since the city began installing elevators in 2008, six of Montreal's 68 metro stations have been made wheelchair accessible and two more will soon have wheelchair access, however, RAPLIQ say the work isn't being done fast enough.
Adding a wheelchair-accessible elevator costs about $15 million per metro station, but three quarters of the cost is paid for by the provincial government. For the full story, click here.

description.hltext_display: Superata da Facebook, Twitter, chat e Skype Severgnini
description.author: www.corriere.it/italianswww.beppesevergnini.com
description.content:
La posta elettronica preferita dai navigatori più anziani Il successo dei social network, più immediati e informali
di BEPPE SEVERGNINI
«I only use email to communicate with old people», uso l'email solo per comunicare con gli anziani. Di roba così, in rete, se ne trova finché si vuole. Non si capisce, quindi, lo stupore del collega del New York Times. Si vede che non ha un adolescente in casa.«Segnali che sei un old fogey, uno all'antica: guardi i film in videocassetta, ascolti dischi di vinile, usi la pellicola per fotografare. E ti piace usare l'email». Così esordisce il giornale di New York in una corrispondenza da San Francisco, la patria spirituale dell'informatica americana. Non è la condanna a morte della posta elettronica. Solo una prova delicata di epitaffio. Non la prima, come dicevamo.
Confesso: un cinquantenne prova un piacere sadico nel vedere che i trentenni si sentono travolti dalle novità. La buona, vecchia mail - che noi abbiamo imparato e loro davano per scontata - sarà presto superata. Facebook, Twitter, chat, Skype, perfino l'immarcescibile sms sono più immediati, informali, gratificanti. L'email obbliga a un minimo di preparazione: un account di posta, un destinatario con un indirizzo, magari qualcosa nel «subject» (argomento). Bisogna aspettare che il destinatario risponda: e non sempre lo fa. Occorre evitare gli errori di ortografia, e magari fingere di essere educati. Nessuno, in Italia, chiude una email con «In attesa di favorevole riscontro», se non ha assunto sostanze molto forti. Ma un saluto prima della firma lo usano tutti.È questa sovrastruttura che i ragazzi trovano pesante, in America come in Italia, a Londra come a Pechino. Una email non può - o non dovrebbe - contenere solo «:-O», per spiegare che il mittente è sorpreso. Facebook, per esempio, s'è accorta che la riga del «subject» (l'argomento) resta spesso vuota (al massimo qualcuno batte hi! oppure ehi!). Così ha deciso di eliminarla insieme a cc (copia) e bcc (copia nascosta). FB non è un paese per vecchi; l'email sì. Yahoo e Hotmail - celeberrimi siti di posta elettronica - hanno perso il 16% dei visitatori in un anno; solo Gmail, prodotto di casa Google, è cresciuta del 10%.
Chi ama e usa l'email ha motivo di ritenersi superato? La risposta è: quasi. Utilizzare frasi complete può sembrare normale, a un anziano trentenne. Ma gli adolescenti non comunicano così: parlano per codici, monosillabi e grugniti che in una mail risulterebbero goffi. La punteggiatura, che nelle mail resiste, per i ragazzi è diventata come l'acne: se non c'è, meglio.
La chiocciolina (@) è una specie in via di estinzione? Probabilmente sì. Poco male: l'email ha avuto una vita intensa. Intensa - basta vedere gli auguri seriali da cui veniamo inondati in queste ore - ma breve. Quindici anni, diciamo. L'impatto sociale inizia nel 1995. L'email è come le ragazze della televisione: c'è sempre una più giovane in agguato.
Le lettere di carta hanno resistito meglio: cinquanta secoli? Qualcuno ancora ne manda, anche se l'abitudine è ristretta ormai a tre categorie di persone: molto romantici, molto anziani, molto eccentrici. Accadrà presto anche agli utenti di posta elettronica. «Ti mando una email» sembra il titolo di una commedia romantica all'americana, di quelle dove si baciano a dieci minuti dalla fine e tutti applaudono. Vederla fa sempre piacere, ma la vita funziona in altro modo.

description.hltext_display: Kultur: Wuppertal: Über 250.000 Gäste sorgten für Besucherrekord im Von der Heydt-Museum
description.content: Wie jetzt Museumsdirektor Gerhard Finckh mitteilte, wurde das Haus im zurückliegenden Jahr, seit Gründung des Museums vor 100 Jahren, noch nie so gut besucht wie 2010. Insgesamt wurden über 250.000 Gäste gezählt, die eine der vielen Ausstellungen im besuchten. Momentan wird die Schau "Bonnard - Magier der Farbe" gezeigt. Diese wurde von Kunstkritikern zur besten Exposition im Jahr 2010 für das Land Nordrhein-Westfalen gewählt. Die Ausstellung mit Exponaten des französischen Expressionisten Pierre Bonnard kann bis Ende Januar 2010 besichtigt werden.

description.hltext_display: Mais 294 profissionais serão graduados pela Unimontes
description.content:
Será na próxima terça-feira (21), às 20 horas, no ginásio poliesportivo Presidente Tancredo Neves, a solenidade de outorga de grau unificada de 294 acadêmicos de sete cursos de graduação do Campus Universitário Professor Darcy Ribeiro, da Universidade Estadual de Montes Claros (Unimontes).
Serão graduados alunos dos cursos de Administração (33); Ciências Contábeis (41); Ciências Econômicas (17); Direito (116); Medicina (33); Odontologia (24) e Pedagogia (30).
Eles terão como patrono geral o presidente da empresa Vallée, Ronan de Freitas Pereira, também integrante do Conselho Curador da Fundação de Apoio ao Desenvolvimento do Ensino Superior do Norte de Minas (Fadenor).
A solenidade será presidida pelo reitor João dos Reis Canela, contando com a participação de integrantes da comunidade acadêmica, autoridades e convidados.
Em 20 de janeiro, também no Poliesportivo, será realizada outra solenidade de colação de grau unificada, com a participação de acadêmicos de outros 16 cursos ministrados no campus-sede.
Ainda estão previstas as solenidades para os alunos dos campi em Janaúba, Januária, Brasília de Minas, São Francisco, Espinosa, Salinas, Paracatu e Unaí, além do Núcleo de Joaíma. Até o final de janeiro, a Universidade Estadual de Montes Claros vai alcançar a marca de 43.321 profissionais qualificados ao longo de 48 anos de existência.

description.hltext_display: Stress-free Life for Nurses
description.content:
5 hours ago
Nurses are said to be one of the most efficient professions across the globe. They assist the doctors with respect an operation, especially in major ones. Because of such a very hectic schedule, they tend to have developed stress which may lead to depression afterwards. According to people in the medical profession, if one person suffers from anger, a lot of worries roaming around his mind. It may then lead to depression (probably caused by heartache, an emotional outburst or distress). The cause of which is acute stress which stayed in his system for a long period of time.
That is considered to be the most manageable stress because all that they need is talk to a person trustworthy enough to be leaned on. You know of a person who suffers from stroke or heart attack? That is usually characterized by stress which so severe enough to cause palpitation on the person. But the worst of all is that the person suffering from chronic stress thinks that he is in a very difficult situation which he can no longer bear. As such, he decides to kill himself or ends up being killed by a heart attack.
So, for nurses who are likely to suffer from stress, just breathe in and breathe out. Listen to your friends and loved ones once in a while. Jam with them or take time to relax. Biking or jogging is something which can lead the person to a healthy life instead of being miserably stressed out. Another one is treat yourself the best way you can. You can start with your outfit, you can choose more comfy and fashionable scrubs like those listed in the collection of greys anatomy scrubs.
Because they have for their subject features of innovative styles, mixture of comfortable and best fabrics and softest cloths, they can truly meet your fashion standards. Greys anatomy scrubs offers you various styles like knitted lab jackets and scrubs. For that matter, they can be considered as a great gift for you. Not just that! Because Christmas Day is coming nearly and nearly, you can also consider greys anatomy scrubs as an option in your choice of gifts for your co-nurses and friends in the hospital.
Giving is more satisfying than receiving, right? It is because once you give something, it is just the same as giving a part of yourself, usually a part of your heart. So, my friends in medical uniforms, you do not have to stress yourselves out by thinking on how to solve all of your duties at an instant. That is quite impossible! All you have to do is to wait for the right time, and just cross the bridge when you get there.

description.hltext_display: Coalition Letter supporting strong ethics rules & OCE established in 110th Congress
description.content:
House Speaker-designee John Boehner
H-204, The Capitol
Washington, DC 20515
Dear Speaker-designee Boehner:
Our organizations are writing to strongly urge you to support, without any weakening changes, the gift, travel and other ethics rules adopted by the House in 2007 in response to the Jack Abramoff scandals.
We are pleased to see that, according to Roll Call (December 16, 2010), Representative Greg Walden (R-Ore.) said on December 16 that "he doesn't 'anticipate any change' to the Office of Congressional Ethics in the 112th Congress, as members of the House GOP transition team concluded it will not issue recommendations about the future of the fledgling office."
As you know, our organizations strongly support the OCE, a critically important ethics reform from the last Congress and believe it is essential that the OCE continue in the next Congress with its authority, powers and funding fully intact.
We also strongly urge you to oppose any efforts to weaken or backtrack on any of the existing ethics rules and standards of conduct that have been adopted to protect the integrity of the House and the interests of the American people. We further urge you to seek ways to strengthen the existing ethics rules and standards in order to ensure that members of the House are held to the high ethical standards that citizens expect from the federal officeholders who exercise great power over their daily lives.
The organizations include the Campaign Legal Center, Common Cause, CREW, Democracy 21, the League of Women Voters, Public Citizen and U.S. PIRG.
The ethics rules adopted in 2007 included new restrictions on lobbyists and lobbying organizations paying for trips, gifts, meals and entertainment for Members, and ended the practice of Members paying cut-rate amounts to use corporate planes for their travel.
These rules also established pre-approval requirements for trips financed by persons other than lobbyists and lobbying organizations and timely disclosure of these trips after they occur. This is an area where the rules and oversight apparently need to be strengthened, in the wake of the Caribbean trip that was the subject of a House Ethics Committee investigation based on the recommendation of the Office of Congressional Ethics.
Another important rule adopted in 2007 prohibited House members from participating in events held at the presidential nominating conventions to "honor Members" and financed by lobbyists or by private entities that retain or employ a lobbyist.
This rule was adopted to stop the abuses that had occurred at national conventions where lavish parties paid for by lobbyists and lobbying organizations were, in essence, parties thrown by House members and financed by influence-seekers.
In December 2007, the House Ethics Committee issued a guidance to House members that opened gaping loopholes in this rule. In a letter sent on December 18, 2007 to the Ethics Committee, reform groups stated:
The Committee's guidance, issued on December 11, 2007, provides a clear roadmap for Members and lobbyists on how to circumvent and ignore the new rule at the party conventions next year. The door is opened wide by the Committee for lobbyists and lobbying organizations to continue their past practices at conventions of sponsoring and paying for lavish parties to "honor" Members - abusive practices that led to the adoption of the new rule.
With the presidential nominating conventions coming in 2012, we urge you to provide the leadership necessary to overturn this unjustifiable guidance and restore the "convention parties" rule to its original meaning.
In conclusion, we urge you to take all steps necessary to preserve and, where necessary, strengthen the House ethics rules and standards of conduct that exist to protect the interests of the American people in an honest and ethical House of Representatives.

event_or_fact.property: he doesn't 'anticipate any change' to the Office of Congressional Ethics in the 112th Congress, as members of the House GOP transition team concluded it will not issue recommendations about the future of the fledgling office.

description.content:

Ages 13 years to 19 years

The Detached Youth Project offers a drop in service where young people can come into to discuss any issue that may affect them, the staff offer advice and information on issues such as sexual health, employment and training. Young People can just pop in for a chat and a cup of coffee in a safe environment. description.hltext_display: Лист салата, двойной перелом и 20 000 евро
description.author: Retailer.Ru
description.content:
Конфликт, Carrefour, Франция
Суд французского города Монпелье обязал торговую сеть Carrefour выплатить 20 тысяч евро пенсионерке, которая сломала ногу, поскользнувшись на салатном листе в одном из гипермаркетов сети, пишет во вторник агентство Франс Пресс.
Инцидент произошел в 2006 году, когда жительница Сен-Жан-де-Веда (Saint-Jean-de-Vedas), которой в этом году исполнилось 76 лет, отправилась за продуктами в местный гипермаркет.
Суд постановил, что пожилая покупательница получила двойной перелом бедра во время посещения фруктово-овощного отдела магазина, который не был убран надлежащим образом, и обязал компанию-ответчика выплатить пострадавшей компенсацию.
Конфликт, Carrefour, Франция
22 Декабря 2010, 11:35 РИА Новости
( Версия для печати )

description.hltext_display: Obama wants health insurers to defend large hikes
description.author: vcolliver@sfchronicle.com (Victoria Colliver, Chronicle Sta
description.content:
Health insurance companies that increase premiums by more than 10 percent would be required to justify those higher rates publicly, according to new rules proposed Tuesday by the Obama administration.
Under the proposal, premium increases of more than 10 percent in 2011 for individuals and small businesses would set off a review by states or the federal government to determine whether those rates are unreasonable.
While federal health officials said the new policy would help curb unjust increases, there is nothing in the law that allows the federal government to stop the rate increases even if they are deemed unreasonable.
"California consumers have been suffering under these staggering health rate increases for years," said Betsy Imholz, special projects director for Consumers Union, the nonprofit publisher of Consumer Reports. She said the new regulations would help lift "the veil of secrecy" around what goes into rate increases.
California drew national attention this year when tried to raise rates as much as 39 percent for its 700,000 policyholders in the state who buy coverage as individuals.
The proposed increases helped jump-start the debate over national health legislation and prompted the state to conduct an independent actuarial review of the rate increase filing. After the review found that had erred in its rate calculations, the company reduced its increases to an average of 13.5 percent.
The Legislature responded by passing a measure, which was signed by the governor and will go into effect Jan. 1, that goes further than the federal law. It makes insurers ensure the accuracy of all rate increases for small business and individuals, as well as those imposed on large businesses that exceed 10 percent. The increases must be certified by an independent actuary.
The state Senate failed to pass a bill this year that would have given California regulators the authority to reject unreasonable increases.
The 10 percent threshold announced by the Department of Health and Human Services is a reasonable level to prompt a review, Imholz said. The regulations still need to go through a public comment period before taking effect.
Anthony Wright, executive director of Health Access California, agreed, but with a caveat. "This scrutiny can have an impact on rates, but it is not full-blown authority to reject or deny rates," he said.
Another consumer group, Consumer Watchdog of Santa Monica, criticized the federal government for not requiring justification for all rate increases.
"The new rules rely on public disclosure to shame insurance companies into charging consumers fairer prices, and this symbolic stoning may work to hold down increases in some cases," said Carmen Balber, director of the group's Washington, D.C., office. "However, regulators must ultimately have the power to modify and deny premium increases."
Some policyholders also remain skeptical about the new federal regulations, because many of them have received notice their rates will go up Jan. 1, in part because of changes required by the federal health law.
Joanne Cannell, an independent kitchen and bath designer in San Francisco, is facing rate increases of 30 percent in January.
Cannell, 60, said her insurer, Blue Shield of California, offered plenty of reasons the rates were going up, and she isn't convinced the proposed federal guidelines would make a difference. "I'll believe it when I see it," she said. "I think they'll be able to justify them, and it won't do any good."
Debbie Karel of San Francisco also is looking at rate increases well above 10 percent.
"My basic feeling is that it's a step in the right direction, but it doesn't sound like it will help me if there's nothing that will make them stop doing it," said Karel, 60, who also is a Blue Shield customer.
States retain the primary responsibility for regulating the health insurance industry, which the California Association of Health Plans, a trade group representing health insurers, said was appropriate.
Under the proposed regulations, each state would conduct its own reviews, unless the federal government determines the state doesn't have an effective system to protect consumers.
E-mail Victoria Colliver at vcolliver@sfchronicle.com.
This article appeared on page A - 1 of the

description.hltext_display: Alles für die Katz: iPad-Apps für Vierbeiner
description.content:
Das digitale Zeitalter hat längst Einzug in unser Alltagsleben gehalten – und auch Haustiere können sich den neuen Medien nicht mehr entziehen. Katzen als Zielgruppe für Apps heißt der neueste Clou der Computerindustrie. Während Menschen in PC-Games die Welt retten, können die Samtpfoten dank der Anwendung nun ihre Mäuse auf dem Bildschirm jagen. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
Gelassene Arroganz ist eine Eigenschaft, die man Katzen durchaus nachsagen könnte. So schnell lockt die Mieze generell nichts hinterm Ofen hervor. Es sei denn, der Apple-Computer iPad kommt ins Spiel – das lässt dann selbst den coolsten Stubentiger nicht mehr kalt. Zumindest dann nicht, wenn dank der Anwendung „iPad Game for Cats“ sein Jagdinstinkt geweckt wird. Diese App können Haustierbesitzer kostenlos herunterladen und dann dabei zusehen, wie ihr Fellknäuel in den Bann der neuen Medien gezogen wird.
Das beweist auch ein von den Machern der App auf Youtube eingestelltes „Werbe“-Video . Darauf zu sehen: Kitty-Cat auf Mäusejagd. Auf dem Display bewegt sich eine virtuelle Maus hin und her – und hält das Kätzchen dabei zum Narren. Dieses kann kaum seine Pfötchen vom Bildschirm lassen, hat aber natürlich keine Chance, den schwanzwedelnden Computer-Nager tatsächlich zu fassen. Dass die App definitiv auf Vorlieben von Katzen abzielt, wird gegen Ende des 41-Sekunden-Clips klar. Ein Hund gesellt sich nämlich zum Katz- und Mausspiel dazu, guckt sich das Treiben einen kurzen Augenblick an, um sich dann wieder zu trollen.
Die App ist eine von vielen, die auf die Neigungen oder Instinkte von Vierbeinern abzielen. Die Anwendung „Cat Piano” etwa installiert auf dem Apple-Computer ein Keyboard, das realistische Katzen-Töne von sich gibt – was eine Mieze regelrecht zum Ausrasten brachte, wie ein weiterer Web-Clip demonstriert. Spaß hatte in dem Fall wohl vor allem der Haustierbesitzer, der per Tastendruck den Katzenjammer der besonderen Art hervor- und damit seinen kleinen Liebling ordentlich durcheinanderbrachte.
Ob das nun wirklich Sinn der App war, ist die nächste Frage. Lustig anzusehen ist es aber allemal.

description.hltext_display: Спотривная хроника
description.content:
Вчера Москве состоялась отчетно-выборная конференция Российской федерации баскетбола (РФБ). Новым главой федерации единогласно избран Александр Красненков. Президент петербургского Спартака был единственным кандидатом на этот пост, поэтому выборы проходили на безальтернативной основе.
Заметим, что совмещение президентских постов в клубе и федерации чревато конфликтом интересов. Впрочем, и до этого особенные управленческие достижения во главе Спартака у Александра Красненкова вспомнить трудно... Что до Сергея Чернова, то бывший руководитель РФБ после очернивших его скандалов стал... почетным президентом этой организации.
Тем временем петербургский баскетбольный Спартак в рамках регулярного чемпионата ПБЛ уступил на своей площадке команде Локомотив-Кубань из Краснодара со счетом 64:77. Для женского Спартака последний матч также окончился поражением: московское Динамо в овертайме переиграло петербурженок со счетом 95:94.
На чемпионате мира по плаванию на короткой воде в Дубае (ОАЭ) сборная России заняла второе место в общекомандном зачете. На счету наших пловцов 4 золотые, 4 серебряные и 2 бронзовые медали.
В заключительный день соревнований россияне завоевали три награды серебро и две бронзы. Лучших показателей добилась сборная США, у которой 25 медалей (12, 6, 7). На третьем месте в общекомандном зачете команда Испании 10 наград (4, 2, 2).
В Дании финишировал чемпионат Европы по гандболу среди женщин. В финале сборная Норвегии переиграла Швецию 25:20. Норвежские девушки выиграли первенство континента четвертый раз подряд. Они получили путевки на чемпионат мира-2011 и Олимпийские игры-2012. Сборная России, которая является действующим чемпионом мира, выступила в Дании неудачно только седьмое место.
В американском Лейк-Плэсиде завершился четвертый этап Кубка мира по бобслею и скелетону. Россияне Александр Зубков и Дмитрий Труненков стали серебряными призерами среди двухместных экипажей. А вот четверка Зубкова была дисквалифицирована.
Уже второй этап подряд завоевывают медали наши скелетонисты: неделю назад призером стал Александр Третьяков, а на сей раз Сергей Чудинов завоевал первую в карьере золотую медаль Кубка мира.
Параллельно на другой американской трассе в Парк-Сити проходил четвертый этап Кубка мира по санному спорту. Россиянин Виктор Кнейб взял бронзу, опередив олимпийского чемпиона немца Феликса Лоха.
